1a1(mngon brjod): mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos 'chi med mdzod ces bya ba paN+Di ta 'chi med seng ges mdzad pa bzhags//
1b1(mngon brjod): rgya gar skad du/ a mar ko Sha nA ma/ bod skad du/
1b2(mngon brjod): 'chi med mdzod ces bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag
2a1(mngon brjod): 'tshal lo// gang gi mkhyen brtse'i rgya mtsho ni// gting med sdig med yon tan rnams// mi zad rten gyi blo ldan rnams//
2a2(mngon brjod): de yi dpal dang bdud rtsi'i phyir// rgyud gzhan rnams las bsdus nas ni// so sor legs sbyar mdor bsdus pa// rdzogs par
2a3(mngon brjod): brjod do sde tshan gyis// ming dang rtags kyi rjes bshad pa// shes bya pho mo ma ning la// phal che gzugs kyi dbye ba dang // 'ga'
2b1(mngon brjod): zhig lhan cig spyod pa dang // 'ga' zhig de yi khyad par sgrub// dbye ba bshad phyir zlas dbye dang // gcig gis lhag mar ma bsdus shing // 'dir ni rtags rnams med pa dang // ma bshang go
2b2(mngon brjod): rim spangs byas nas// gsum gyi rtags la gsum zhes bya// 'khrig pa'i tshig la gnyis zhes bya// rtags bkag lhag de na bu mtha' dang // a tha dang po sngon cha min// mtho ris 'god
2b3(mngon brjod): med bde 'gro dang // skyo med gsum rtse skabs gsum gnas// lha yi 'jig rten rol gnas mkha'// gnyis mo mi nang gzhi gsum pa// 'chi med rgas med skabs gsum lha// rnam
2b4(mngon brjod): par sad dang bcud ldan dang // tshigs bzang ba dang yid bzang dang // gsum rtse dbang ldan mtho ris gnas// mi sbyin mkhas spyod legs par bris// mi sbyin dga' dang A di'i bu// r-i yig
3a1(mngon brjod): bu dang rmi lam med// mi 'chi ba dang bdud rtsi zas// mi yi zhal dang mchod sbyin zas// ngag gi mnga' can lha min dgra/ tshogs bzang ba dang lha rnams nyid// skyes 'bri 'am ni lha mo nyid// nyi ma sna tshogs nor lha dang //
3a2(mngon brjod): dga' ldan dang ni 'od gsal rlung // rgyal chen rigs dang bsgrub bya dang // drag po dang bcas tshogs kyi lha// rig 'dzin chu skyes gnod sbyin dang // srin po dri bo mi 'am tsi// sha za gsang ba grub pa dang // 'byung po 'di rnams lha las byung /
3a3(mngon brjod): lha min b+h+yor skyes bcud mi lda ni// gtsu skyes sbyin byung dang ba'i sgra// pa sangs slob ma sbyin byed du// dz+nyAn gyi lha dang lha rnams smod// bde gshegs sbyangs rgyas thams cad mthun// chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// kAn+da
3a4(mngon brjod): bzang po bcom ldan 'das// bdud 'dul 'jig rten rgyal ba po// mngon shes drug ldan stobs bcu pa// gnyis med gsung dang rnam par 'a dzin// thub pa'i dbang po dpal stug dang // ston pa thub pa nyid rnams so// shAka thub shAkya
3a5(mngon brjod): seng ge dang // don rnams grub pa zas gtsang sras// gau tam dang nyi mar gzhan// lce mo sgyu 'phrul sras rnams so// tshangs pa bdag skyes lha lus rga na// mchog la gnas dang mes po dang // gser gyi ma la dang 'jig rten dang /
3a6(mngon brjod): byung gdong bani byed po dang // pad+ma'i skye gnas nyis can dang // sna tshogs bsgrub byed pa d+ma'i gangan// byin byed skye dgu'i bdag po dang // rigs byed rnams byed sna tshogs byed// khyab 'jug nag po na ra'i bu// a bang+tha thos rdul mo
3b1(mngon brjod): buH/ dbang po'i dbang phyugA ma tog lnga// sgra n+dan+da gsod dang smyung gi bu// rlung sgyus sbyin dgra bad kar mig/ mkha' lding rgyal mtshan glang rjer grags// mi 'dzag gos sar rA gzhu can// sna tshogs sde dang 'gro ba 'joms// steng gi dbang po dang
3b2(mngon brjod): gzhan skyes// lag gi bzhi pa 'khor lo'i phyag/ pad+ma'i lci ba sbrang rtsi'i dgra/ 'dug gnas lha dang gom gsum gnon// lha mo dga' ba dpa' bo'i rgyud// dpal gyi bdag po skyes bu'i mchog/ me tog phreng ldan stobs ldan 'joms// 'khar
3b3(mngon brjod): ba'i sgra dang 'og dbang skyes// kun 'gengs lha mi ni 'joms pa dang // rdob byed dpal gyi be'u sku mtshan// nor lha'i bu dang de bzhin du// a nA ka yi rnga can no// stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyang gsod // stobs lha mi 'dzag sngon skyes dang // nam glu'i
3b4(mngon brjod): bdug po dga' byed // 'dod skyong gshol gyi mtshon cha dang // tA lA sa mtshan dang rtun shing gA sho la// l-igs 'gugs dang ni bod pa'i lag/ klu 'joms pa dang stobs ldan no// myos byed yid srub gisong byed dang // rab stobs dang ni
3b5(mngon brjod): yi tog/ tshangs bcom bsnyems dang lus med dang // 'dod pa meda'i lnga dran pa dang // sdom pa'i dgra dang yid las skyes// me tog mda' dang gzhan ma skyes// me tig gzhi can dga' bo'i bdag/ chu srin rgyal mtshan bdag las byung // tshang
3b6(mngon brjod): spong i dang 'gro ba'i tog/ me 'gags pa dang u khi bdag/ mtshon byed pang gnas pad+ma can// gos sngon can dang snar ma'i bu// chur rgyan dpal mo 'phreng byed yum// dung can lnga skyes dpal mo'i bdag/ 'khor lo legs mthong
4a1(mngon brjod): can dang s+ho/ sa nas gyu ma tha dgas/ san sa na / rabyas pas dag sa sa ma shAng sgrub// m+b+ha khri /
4a2(mngon brjod): bde 'byung phyugs bdag zhi ba dang // ma rung thogs dbang phyug chen po dang // dbang phyug gsod byed dpal ldan dang // bde byed ka tsug zla dang // ljang ba'i dbang po dgra sti'i dus// ri dbang ri skrod chom byed dang // 'chi ba las rgyal klu/ gos
4a3(mngon brjod): tsan/ skyo ming gan dang 'joms byed bdag/ drag yul ral can dpal gyi phrin// mgul nag zad pa 'ched pa dang // go san gas ni po// sna chags mig dang tshig gsum pa/ ma ga/ dzub ku sa khyen dang // la pa'i khwa
4a4(mngon brjod): stanA dam pa na// brog pa dran 'joms 'joms byed do// spyan gsum grong khyer gsum mthar / ga gA 'dzin pa longs pa'i sgra// sku mchog rgyul mchin mchod sbyin 'joms// na mkha'i sgra can srid dang 'jigs// gnas byeng du byed
4a5(mngon brjod): me'i bdag/ chus gang dag byed ral pa bcings// sgo med byeb dang sgra ldan gzu// dri yi 'khor ni 'joms byed dang / tshangs pa la sogs ma mo rnams// khyab bdag khyab byed dbang phyug la// chung ngu la sogs brgyad dang ldan// dka' bzlog
4a6(mngon brjod): ka ti'i bu mo dang // ser skya nago po gangs ldan bu// dbang mo zhim srid ma dang // dag mo gsong ma kun la shis// ri skyes rdzong gnas lo ma med// tshim byed gtum mo 'gro ba'i ma// log 'dren bgegs kyi rgyal po dang // ma gnyis pa dang
4b1(mngon brjod): tshogs kyi bdag/ mche ba gcig pa ha la gnas// lto ba 'chang dang glang po'i gdong // smin drug bu dang sde chen dang // 'dam bu'i cha lnga skyes gdang drug pa// ri skyes dga' byed skam byed dang // sde dpon mo sbyong skad byed dang // mang po las skyes sprul
4b2(mngon brjod): byed 'dul// gtsug lud can blon sa ga skyes// ma drug pa dang mdung thogs dang // gzhon nu dang ni khrung khring 'joms// khrab stobs smin pa 'joms par byed// rgan po la sngon shis bai rjod nyin// gang po 'khong dang grong 'joms dang // rgyal byed nus
4b3(mngon brjod): ldan legs bris gtso// mchod sbyin brgyab mtho ris bdag/ legs skyabs ri 'joms rdo rje can// dbyig ldan 'phel 'joms char 'bebs dang // gnas kyi bdag po lnga yi bdag/ stobs ldan dgra dang legs brjod dang // rmugs byed 'joms
4b4(mngon brjod): dang 'phrog byed na// mtho ris rgyal po tshul med 'dzums// ya da~Mg+h+na du dang bzod dgas rengs// gzhan bsnams bzod dang sbyin la zhon// kun 'joms mig sbyong ri skyes ldan// dA yi btsun mo skyugs gang skyes// lags brjid ma dang dbang mo'o//
4b5(mngon brjod): grong khyer mche ba med ldan dang // rta ni mtho nyan+da kha lo yi// ma ni yid grub dga' ba'i tshal// khang bzangs rnam blar rgyal byed dang // rgyal byed dang ni sprin 'joms bu// sprin gyi glang po mtsho skyes dang // sa bsrung bu dang chu 'dzin grang // sgra
4b6(mngon brjod): sposgrogs rdo rje mo ma yin// lag ldan 'bigs byed thog dang ni// rtse mo brgyab sgra can bde// sgrogs bum za byed gnyis dag go/ mkha' thog mkha' gnas mo ma yin// lha yi drang srong mi sbyin sogs// tshes bzangs lha yi mdun sa dang / badra
5a1(mngon brjod): rnams bdud rtsi bde bar 'thung // chu bo dal 'bab mtho ris klung // na mkha'i gaM gA bcud ldan ri// ldan po ri rab gser gyi ri// rin chen brtsegs pa lha yi gnas// lnga po lha yi ljon shing ste// man+da ra ba rgya mtsho skyes// legs khyab
5a2(mngon brjod): dang ni dpag bsam shing // 'phrog byed tsan dan skyes bu 'am// tshangs pa'i gzhon nu rnam byed bu// mtho ris sman pa ma rta'i bu// sna skyes tha kar skyes pa dang // kun mkhyen tha skar skyes gnyis dge/ chu skyes mo ste meng po'o// mtho ris smad 'tshong dbang
5a3(mngon brjod): chen sogs// sgra ngan spangs drang dbyangs 'dems sogs// gnas skabs gsum na dri za'i glu/ 'khyog 'gro med dang rnyed za dang // byin za nor las rgyal ba dang // chu yi skye gnas 'bar ba can// skyes thob lus mi skyong ba dang // shing 'phel skems
5a4(mngon brjod): byed lam nag dang // 'bar ba'i sgra can snga dro sad// rten pa 'od zer chen po dang // chung byed sprin byed mtsho byed dang // rnye mar krung gi grogs po dang // gtsug phung can dang rno ban dang // gser gyi thig le bsreg rdzas za// bsreg byed mtshun gyis
5a5(mngon brjod): byed dang // 'od bdun nyer bzhi mya ngan byed// sna tshogs 'od zer 'od nor can// dge byed chu 'khrus brang skyes dang // rgod ma skyes dang mA rta'i me// lha mchod gnyis po 'bar ba dang // me lce yul me 'ab me dang // nyul ldan 'di ni mo yin no// gsu
5a6(mngon brjod): rnams me stag me skar dang / shin tu gdung ba tshad can mtshungs// chos kyi rgyal po pheM ga shin bdag/ mtshungs 'jug gau shin gyi rgyal po dang // mthar byed ya mu na yi spun// zhi byed gshin byed rgyal po gshin// grangs can dbyug 'dzin
5b1(mngon brjod): mdun gyi lha// TI ma'i bu dang mtha' can no// srin po ro zan sha rten za// sha za khrag 'bung kun tu rgyu// mtshan mo rgyu dang na ma la spyod// sna tshogs mdog can gsod bdag skyes// 'gro 'dzin bsod nams skye bo dang // bden bral rjes 'jug srung ba pa// mchog
5b2(mngon brjod): sems mchog sbyin zhags pa can// chu skyes bdag dang chu bdag go// dbugs 'byin reg ldan ma mos 'phel// rta ga 'gro rta len dri len dang // dri 'dang rlung dang myur 'gro dang // skye 'gre'i srog dang 'gro ba'i dang // nA mkha'i bdag po 'gro ba pa// gang
5b3(mngon brjod): byed gang ldan rab 'joms so// srog dang thur sel mnyam gnas dang // gyen du rgyu dang khyab byed rlung // 'di rnams lus la gnas pa'o// skyod byed rgyug byed myur 'gro dang // mgyogs 'gro shugs ldan de nas ni// myur mgyogs la gor skyen pa
5b4(mngon brjod): yud/ cig car ma thogs de ma thag/ skad cig mi 'gor dar tsam mo// kun tu rgyun tu ngal med dang // mtshan med par med rgyun mi 'chad// rtag tu ltas med res 'ga' min// de nas phul 'byin 'bad pa dang // shin tu drag po'i te bor dang //
5b5(mngon brjod): 'bung brdo mthar byed shin tu gzhung // nAn tar nges par brtan pos kyang // tsam mdo bri med nges 'bad dang // sems med myur sogs ma ning ngo // sems yod rnams la gsum kAr 'gyur// lus ngan dang ni mig gsum grogs// gnod sbyin
5b6(mngon brjod): rgyal po gsang po dag dang // mi yi chos ldan nor sbyin dang // rgyal po'i rgyal po gter gyi bdag/ mi 'am ci dbang rna ma thos bu// 'od yangs tsha bo mi la zhon// mchod sbyin mig rgya e la'i rgyud// dpal ste bsod nams skye bo'i dbang // sna
6a1(mngon brjod): chags shing d+had yi rgyal// bun dbul mos mtshan pa can// rna ba'i gnas dang grong khyer ni// mkha' gnas me tog can yino// ma 'am ca dang ci skyes bya/ yi gdang can 'gro mgyogs sa// gtar dang mdzad kyi 'ang la// pang can drang
6a2(mngon brjod): la sogs gter// lha rtsen rol gnas gnyis po mo// 'gro med kun khyab rgyas byud dang sgra sgrogs mkha' dang bar snang dang // kun 'gro mtha' med lha la ma gan mo/ mi g.ye ba dang khyab 'jug gnas// kun gsal rnam grob smras su ya/ phags
6a3(mngon brjod): ston gsal gnas dang // kun khyab 'phrog byed nyid kyang ngo // snga d+ho gung drang phyi dro'i phyogs/ share dang lho dang nub dang ni// bying gi phyogs ni steng yin no// phyogs rnams gsum pa rnams su 'gyur// dbang po mad dang mA ga yon bdag/ bden bral chu dang rlung pa
6a4(mngon brjod): ni/ lus ngan dbang ldan bdag po rnams// shar phyogs la sogs ri mo bzhin gnas// mtsho skyes pad kA phyir log khrus// sra mos gsal byed mi tog sau// sa kun la grags cha 'dzes te// 'di rnams phyogs kyi spang paraglang dzin dmir sor drang
6a5(mngon brjod): ser skya dpe med rim pa las// zangs snu ma dang so logs ma// yan lhag mdzes dang gsal byed do// ma ni po m+bi zad phyogs myin rnams// phyogs dbus phyogs mtshams mau yi rtag/ nang dang phyi rol min pa la// khar yug dang na mu rda dzad can// A 'dzin
6a6(mngon brjod): chu 'bongs chu khur dang // sgra sogs chu yi bzhon pa dang // rgyu 'dzin rlan 'dzin glog can dang / chu sbyin gsher 'dzin rtsa sor 'joms// tshur cor dgar byed chu 'gyed dang // du ba'i skye gnas chu skyar gnas// sprin gyi phreng ba zhes pa dang // sprin skus sprin
6b1(mngon brjod): las byung ba gsum// 'brug dang sgra chen sprin gyi sgra// sgra can nyid la sogs pa'o// bde 'thung dang ni sgra brgya pa// sgra 'gyed chu skyes skad cig 'od// glog dang rnams gsal 'khyug byed dang // skyod byed sdod med nyid kyang ngo // thog gi sgra dang rdo rje'i sgra// sprin gyi
6b2(mngon brjod): 'od zer chu 'dzin skyes// dbang po'i mtshon cha brgya byin gsuM// de bzhin drang 'khyog ces bya'o// char bzhod dang dri yi gegs// than chen char 'gog mnyam pa'o// rgyun 'bab yongs lhung drag cha re ro// char rdul chu rdul chu yi zer// rdo rje'i char dang
6b3(mngon brjod): ser ba'o// sprin 'okhrig nyi mo ngan byed do// mun po 'thib pa'i skyes bu 'am// mi mngon mi gsal ba dang ni// bsgribs pa dang ni g.yogs pa dang // mi snang ba dang khe bos pa'o// bsil zer sim byed ka bur dang // dbang po ku mud gnyen byed dang // bdud
6b4(mngon brjod): rtsi'i 'od dang 'od dkar can// rtsa yi dbang po mtshan mo'i bdag/ 'tsho byed zhugs byed rgya mtsho skyes// 'grib byed cha gra tar ri dwags mtshan// gnyis skyes rgyal po ri bong 'dzin// rgyu dkar rgyal po mtshan mor byed// cha dang dum bu bcu dug go/ gzugs ni mo
6b5(mngon brjod): min dkyil 'khor gsum// dum bu cha nus dum phyed dang // byed ma mnyam po'i yan lag can// zla 'od kun phan sim 'od do// rab dang rab tu gsal ba dang // bdag can nyams can mtshan ma can// rtags can mtshan nyid mtshon byed can// kun mdzes
6b6(mngon brjod): mchog tu mdzes pa dang // mdzes sdug legs ngo mtshar po'o// char skya khu 'bangs gangs skyes dang // mchod bya de nas kha ba spungs// de yi tshogs pa gangs yin no// bsil ba'i yon tan de don 'dra// bsil dang bser dang grang zhing 'khyags//
7a1(mngon brjod): lhags pa lhags dang lhags dar dang // bdun gyi po gzhan gyi rtags can no// brtan gnas dang ni rlung steng bu// ri bo 'phangs dang bum pa skye// grogs po lha mi bu de bzhin// zil gnon rgya can chos mnyam ma// mi ltung 'gro byed 'od can
7a2(mngon brjod): dang \u0f7fskar ma dkar po 'phur byed mo// gsal ba'i bu mo tha skar sogs// skar mA rta ldan rgod ma tsan// sgrub byed nyid ni sa ga'o// rgyal ni grub pa tshim byed do// mon gru munye dang nor ldan yAn// khrums dang ba lang rkang pa mo// mgro ni ri dgas mgo zhes
7a3(mngon brjod): bya / de la lo yi dang po'o// de yi steng phyogs 'gro ldan gyi// skar ma rnams ni gnas pa'o// lha bdag lho yi slob dpon dang // dbyangs bdag blo ldan lha'i h+la la// 'tsho byed phur bu smra ba'i bdag/ sna tshogs gtsug pud can gyi bu// mya ngan snyan dgas
7a4(mngon brjod): lha min pra// 'od can pa sangs sA na drong kas bu// mig dmar sa skyes sa las byung // lus dmar dang ni la ni tI 'u// bla bu gsa' mnyam dong nyi pu dal 'gro spen// mun pa sgra gcan mtho ris mdzes// seng ge'i bu dang zla ba
7a5(mngon brjod): 'tshe// 'od zer 'gro byed la sogs pa'i// drang srong bdun po sna tshogs dang // khyim rnams shar pra dus sbyor te// de ni lug dang glang la sogs// nyi ma da 'gyed bsten bya dang // mi sbyin skyes dang bcu gnyis bdag/ nyin byed 'od byed snang byed
7a6(mngon brjod): dang // rab tu gsal byeng rnam gsal byed// 'od ldan mi gzugs te bdun pa// rta ljang can ni tsha bar cin// rnam 'gyur chos 'od mngal na sdug/ cher 'bebs 'od 'gro gso bar byed// namakha'i nor bu sgrol byed pa shis// sna tshogs
7b1(mngon brjod): 'od zer rnam snang byed// 'od kyi nor can gza' yi bdag/ 'od zer bdag po snang byed bdag/ 'od can 'joms byed 'od stong pa// gdung byed 'od 'byin 'od zer gzugs// gnas byed dmar ser dbyug can gyis// nyi ma'i 'od la yongs su bskor/
7b2(mngon brjod): mi kha lo sgra rnyings dang // brla med 'od srung lung sngon skyes// yongs bskor yongs su bkris pa dang // nye bo'i hrI ma'i dkyil 'khor can// 'dred byed 'od byed na mkha' 'jal// phyogs 'gro 'od 'gro chu 'thung yod// gsal ba 'od byed sri
7b3(mngon brjod): bu gsod// mo dang skyes bu gsal byed mo// 'od dang gsal ba snang ba sgron// snang gsal 'od mdangs 'od zer dang // 'od dngas gsal sgron mo ning ngo // mun sel mun 'joms mtshan mo sel// cung dro bag dro dro tsam dang // dro ba de ldan
7b4(mngon brjod): gsum yin no// tsha blo rab tsha tsha drag go/ de bzhin smig rgyu ri dgas srid// bgrang byi dus dang slar byung dang // nye bar 'gro dang de nas ni// phyogs rtsa 'phel 'grib 'di gnyis mo// de sogs tshes dag gnyis dag go// mun bsal nyi mo bya spangs
7b5(mngon brjod): bsal// yang na ma ning rtse gnas 'jog/ mun dang sanyin dang rab sade sreg/ na mo langs pa dang rib lnga gsal// nyi ma'i mtha' dang dgongs mo dang // bsam gtan dang ni ba skyes so// snga dro phyi dro nyi ma gung // mtshams gsum de nas
7b6(mngon brjod): bya bral dang // bsam gtan gnas dus kyi chen mo dang // thun gsum dal ster bsam pa spangs// snang bzlog nam dang rdul dang ni// thun sbyor chags dus snang med dang // muni mtshan mun pa'i nam dang ni// snang mtshan zla ba dang ldan pa//
8a1(mngon brjod): ma 'ongs da ltar gnyis ldan pa'o// mtshan mo du ni phyogs ldan no// mtshan mo tshogs pa zhags rnams dang // mtshan mo'i dang po nam gyi gdong // nam phyed mtshan phyed gnas pa nyid// thun dang mel tshe gnyis dag mtshungs// tshigs dang
8a2(mngon brjod): mtshams dang tshes gcig dang // bco lnga yi ni mthar thug pa// phyogs kyi mtha' ma bco lnga gnyis// zla ba gang ba 'jal byed rdzogs// cha nyams rjes 'gro gang ba dang // mtshan byed mtshan mo mthong bar byed// gnam stong lhan cig byed dang mthong// nyis
8a3(mngon brjod): zla ba lhan cig gnas// zla mthong zla ba gzhon nu'o// zla ba nyams pa cha nyams so// nyer 'tshe gza' ni 'jug par byed// nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan gzung // nyer skur sgra byed spangs pa'o// mi/ yis bsregs dang ngar bzhin sgyur// gcig tu sbyor bas me tog ldan//
8a4(mngon brjod): nyinyon byed mtshan mo byed pa po// mig 'dzum bco brgyad de yi gnas// de ni sum cu cha shas so// de yi sum cu skad cig go// de ni bcu gnyis yud tsam yin// dron sum cu nyin zhag go// de rnams bco lnga phyogs yin no// phyogs ni sngon ma phyi ma ste// de gnyis
8a5(mngon brjod): zla ba dkar nag go// mchu sogs zla bla gnyis gnyis ni// dus tshigs de gsum bgrod pa'o// nyi ma lho drang byang bgrod ni// lho gcig la ni gnyis yin no// nyin mo mtshan mo mnyam pa'i dus// nyin mtshan mtshungs dang dus mnyam mo// me tog ldan
8a6(mngon brjod): pa'i zla ba nya// rgyal gyi zla ba gang yin de// ming ni rgyal yin mtshungs la sogs// de bzhin gzhan ni bcu gcig go// ri dgas mgo can nus ldan mgo/ skal po zhes bya gsum yin no// me tog rgyal blo nus zla gnyis// dka' thub chu zla de nas
8b1(mngon brjod): ni/ 'bras zla dka' thub sposgo bla'o// nag pa 'drod pa dus spang zla'o// sa g+ha sbrang dus me tog can// gtsu ba snron zla ga cad mA dang // chu stong zla ba gro zhun dang // na mkha' dang ni thos zla'o// sprin bzang khyu mchog rkang pa dang // ba lcang rkang dang khrums zla mtshungs//
8b2(mngon brjod): ba skar ltad mo'i zla ba dang // klu dbyangs zla ba smin drug dang // mang po 'dzin deng smin drug zla// dgun stong dgun smad mo ma yin// dpyid dang me tog ldan dus dang / bde byed so ga tshangs dang // nges par sre gas dang dro ba'i dus// drod phebs drod 'ongs tsha
8b3(mngon brjod): ba'i dus// mo// dbyar mo mang pau'i tshig char 'beb// de nas ston ka mo yin no// dus tshod drug po 'di rnams ni// po/ mgo sngogs zung rnams rim pa las// lo dang bgrang ba 'gro 'od dang // 'dor byed mo min ston dang mtshungs// nyin zhag dang ni
8b4(mngon brjod): zla bas 'gyur// buM yi lo yis lha rnams kyi// lha yi zung ni stong phrag dag/ gnyis ni tshangs pa kal+la ste// de dag mi rnams kyi kal+la// mtho ris rnams kyi zung rnams kyi// bdun cu rtsa gcig/ 'jig pa'i kalpa pra la ya// nyal dang zas dang kal+li'i
8b5(mngon brjod): mtha'// me min rlig 'phel skyes bu srung // bya ngan 'thung dmangs byed dag mdzad// rko byed bzang po spangs sdig pa// nongs pa nyes spyod nyes byas so// chos ni mo min bsod nams dang // dge ba legs byas khyu mchog go/ dga' mgu rangs
8b6(mngon brjod): dang spro ba dang // yi rang dgyes dang mnyes pa dang // nyams dga' sdig zad zhi ba dang / mi dge spangs dang lags sgo'o// dge dang bsdogs 'os zhi ba dang // bzang po phan thob bkra shis legs// bskal pa bskal thob 'dod thob dang /
9a1(mngon brjod): ngan sal bad lags ma ma so// snrud bas danas gsum dang ga/ sngog dang bsod rnams bdal sogs// shin tu bca dang dul byu dang // dang mchog dang sa dam // dri rnams mnyam pa tsun nas
9a2(mngon brjod): sbrul ldan dge ba bsags rgyab can// sbrus bsgos lhas bstan skal ba dang // mo ston byas las dang sngon las so// rgyu dang byed pa sa bon no// ngas ldan thog ma'i byed pa'o// zhing shes bdag dang skyes bu ste// gtso bo rang bzhin mo yin
9a3(mngon brjod): no/ khyad par dus byas gnas skabs so// yon tan snying stobs rdul dang mun// skye ba skyod po skyes pa skye// ny+dzar bskrun nye bar 'byung rnams so// srog can sems can skye ldan dang // skye bo skye dgu lus can no// sems dang sems pa snying
9a4(mngon brjod): dAdang nItaHsgrog byed 'phrog byed yid byed yin// blo gros yid 'dod spobs pa can// blo dang shes rab nyal slong dang // yid ldan mthong dang dmigs ldan sems// legs rtogs go shas bsam pa'o// mi brjed 'dzin nus dran bzang po// rtog pa
9a5(mngon brjod): yid kyi las dang ni// sems kyi longs spyod yid la byed// dpyod dang bgrang byed rnam par dpyod// lhag par dpyod dang rtog pa dang // sems dang the chom som nyi dang // nom nur dang ni yid gnyis so// de nas mtshungs pa gtan phebs nges// log
9a6(mngon brjod): par lta ba med pa pa// gnod sems 'tsho ba pa dang ni// mtshungs pa grub mtha' bzung ba'i sems// 'khrul pa log shes nor pa'i sems// khas lan phyogs bzung ngam 'cha' dang // nges pa mnyan bya yang dag thos// bdag gir byas
9b1(mngon brjod): drung khas blangs dang // sngo sor mnyan pa ting nge 'dzin// thar dang blo dang shes pa gzhan// rnam shes bzo dang bstan bcos so// grol ba ma 'dres mya ngan 'das// rab bsngags nges ljags 'chi med dang // thar pa dang ni spangs pa'o// de nas mi shes ma
9b2(mngon brjod): rig dang // rmongs pa dang ni ngar 'dzin blo// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang // yul 'di spyod yul dbang 'dod rnam// yul can yul dang dbang po dang // las kyi dbang po kha la sogs// yid dang mig sogs blo yi dbang // chu rten bskab mo yin no// mang
9b3(mngon brjod): drudung lanA tshwa tsha ba dang // kha dang sbyang dang ro rnams ni// skyes bu de ldan drug byo'ang gsam+b+ha// rnam nyid sbyar spos d+hi dang ni// skye bo'i yid 'brog kun mos dang // ring 'gugs brjod bya'i yon tan min// mtshungs pa 'bod byed ring du khyab// dri bzangs sna
9b4(mngon brjod): tshim 'dod dri dang // dri zhim leg sa 'thul kha la chags// ru li dri dang ni dri ngan no// mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o// dkar po dge byed dkar gsal dang // mdog dkar gzhan gcod dkar snum dang // skya bsang dag mdog yid bsdebs dang // mdog
9b5(mngon brjod): dkar mig stobs dkar dang sgrub// skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o// cung skya dang ni 'ol kha'o// nag po sngon po dkar min dang // sngo bsangs mdog nag nag lhad dang // ser po ser shang yung ngam dog/ ljad khu ljang ser lo ma'i mdog/ dmar po le rgan
9b6(mngon brjod): khrag gi mdog/ dmar ba ut+pal dmar po dang // maM gsal dmar rtsa skya rengs mdog/ dkar dmar 'dres pa dmar skya'o// ser nag dang ni nag ser ro// dmar nag du kha mchin kha'o// gser me dog gser skya skyer kha dang // dkar
10a1(mngon brjod): ser dur kha ba gi haM mdog/ sna tshogs zal po 'dres ma dang // khra bo kha dog sna tshogs pa// yon tan dkar po la sogs po// yon tan rtags can de ldan 'gyur// tshangs byung b+hA ra ta yi skad// sgra dang brjod pa dngangs can dang // tha snyad
10a2(mngon brjod): gsung dang smra ba dang // gtamra dang lo rgyas tshig ces bya// bur chag dang ni sgra nyams pa// rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni// ting su pa'i mtha' can tshig/ bya ba'am ni byed ldan pa// thos pa mo rig byed man ngag/ gsum po de ni chos su sgrub// snyan
10a3(mngon brjod): dadags nges brjod mchod sbyin te// 'di gsum rig byed gsum pa yin// slob sogs thos pa'i yan lag go/ o yig pra Na bau bdag mtshungs// sngon rabs sngon du byung ba'o// a dAt+ta sogs gsum dbyangs rnams// rtsod pa dang ni chad
10a4(mngon brjod): ba'i lugs// rtog ge rig don bstan bcos dag/ gtso bo'i ngag ni bka' lung ngo // snying po'i mtshan nyid lnga yin no// rab sbyar rtog pa gtam rnams dang // brda yis ston dang go dka'o// dran pa chos dang bcas pa rnams// legs par bsdus dang
10a5(mngon brjod): bsdus pa'o// tshig sdud pa dang bsdus pa'i don// gang zhig brjod dang skye bos thos// gtam dang lo rgyus kha skad dang // bka' mchid yin te de nas ni// ming dang zhes dang mtshan dang ni// mngon par brjod dang ming brjod ming // 'bod pa dang ni skad
10a6(mngon brjod): ga tod dang // yang dag 'bod pa mang pos 'bod// rnam par rtsod dang tha snyad dang // nye bar 'god dang smra ba'i sgo// nye bar 'jal dang dper brjod do// mna' dang gros 'don skyes bu'o// 'dri dang rjes sbyor shes 'dod do// slar smra ba dang ldan tshig mtshungs//
10b1(mngon brjod): log par sngon sbyor ngan brjod dang // de nas log smra sun 'byin mngon 'dod dang // legs smra sgra ni rjes chags skye// mchod tshig grags pa yang dag shes// bstod tshig bkur tshig bsngags pa smra// sbyor tshig gnyis gsum brjod pa'o// sgra gsang
10b2(mngon brjod): mthon po sked po che// gcong skad mo dang rnam 'gyur dang // mya ngan 'jig sogs las byung sgra// mi sngags sdigs tshig nges par rgol// yongs smod sun 'byin khro tshogs dang // gshe dang smod dang brgyad po dang // rngan char dang ni tshig rtsub dang // mngon smra
10b3(mngon brjod): tshig ngan smra 'bebs tshig/ glang de skyon ni nyer dmigs po// de la yongs su brjod pa'o// de la g.yo ba gang yin pa// A kro sha ni 'khrig tshig yin// khams bde dang ni 'di smad do// la pa lo ba don med tshig/ rjes su smra ba la yang smra//
10b4(mngon brjod): mya ngan tshig dang gdung ba'i tshig/ tshig 'gog 'gal ba brjod pa'o// phan tshun brjod dang smra ba dang // 'gal ba dang bral// shin du legs smra legs par brjod// gsad tshig gsang ba'i gtam dang ni// tshig gi skyes dang tshig spring dang //
10b5(mngon brjod): ngag gi dbye gsum phyi ma la// mi dge'i tshogs ni sdig pa yin// dge ba'i tshogs ni legs pa'o// shin du mnyan dang zhi ba dang // legs par smra dang yid la 'bab// khro bo'i tshogs ni tshig rtsub po// 'tshang 'bru ba dang mtshang slong ngo // drang gtam
10b6(mngon brjod): dga' byed bden pa dong // de nas 'gal dang rang tshig 'gal// phan tshun 'joms par bya ba'i tshi ga/ yig 'bru tshig mi gsal dang rig/ cha ga stabs myur du brjod pa'o// chu 'thor gtam dang mchil gtam mo// 'brel med dang ni ngom
11a1(mngon brjod): gtam/ yi ge med dang brjod bya bral// don stong tshig dang brdzun don can// de nas mi gsal mi mngon tshig/ de nyid med dang slu ba'i tshig/ bden dang de bzhin mi slu dang // yang dag 'di rnams gsum de ldan// sgra dang nges sgrogs grags/
11a2(mngon brjod): pa dang / tAsgrogs pa tsa tse ku co dang // lhang tsher sgrogs nges smra ba dang // ding 'ur dang ni bu sgra sgrogs// smos grag skad 'don dbyangs rnams so// de nas shod sgra shrad sgra ni// gos dang lo ma rnams kyi sgra// rgyan rnams dang ni sril khrol sgra// bi wang sgra ni ni kA
11a3(mngon brjod): med// mi gsal kra med kra med sgrogs// pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs pa// mi gsal pra kA med la sogs// tsa tso dang ni ku tse dang // dud 'gro'i sgra ni bA si ti// mo ni sgra brnyan brag cha'o// glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs// 'khor nyan drang srong sa 'dzin
11a4(mngon brjod): dang tra/ drug skyes par mA blo gsal dang // lnga pa zhes bya bdun po 'di// rgyu dang 'grin las skyes pa'i dbyangs// kA ka lI ni sgra cha phra// mi gsal brnyan pa d+ha ni'o// sngags ni zab mo'i dbyangs yin no// tI ra 'thon po gsum po gsum// sa ma nI ni che la gcig/
11a5(mngon brjod): pheg bI wang sgra ni bal+la kI/ rnam par spro dang zhan pa ni// rgyud bdun yongs su bsgrags pa'i sgra// pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra// rnga la sogs pa sbubs kyi sgra// gling bu la sogs bu gaur sgra// sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs// rnam pa 'di bzhi rol mo'i sgra/
11a6(mngon brjod): ti tra to zhes bya'o// lnga po 'dir dbye ba// rnga rings udz+ra ka gsum dang // pa d+ha ka dang d+ha ka rdar grags// 'jigs byed rje dang rnga bo che// rnga rnga mo mig/ ko Ni bi wang la sogs sgra// pi wang dbyug pa pra b+ha la// rtsa ba'i shing 'khyog/ ke lam pa ni khob pa'o//
11b1(mngon brjod): thag pa'i gnas dang 'ching ba'o// rol mo'i dbye ba rnams// Da ma ru dang mun+ta dang // DiN+Di dang ni rdza rnga dang // rnga/ klu rnga dang ni gzhan yang ngo // gar ma dang ni rol rtsed mtshungs// dal dang myur dang bar ma la// ta twe oM g+ho g+ha na rim// las cha la// bya ba'i dus
11b2(mngon brjod): kyi tshad la ya dang ni sa mya'o// de nas mo min gar dang ni// zlos gar rol rtsid blo dang mi/ rtsed 'jo dang ni 'cham pa'o// rnga gsum gar dang glu dang ni// rol mo gar byA 'di ni gsum// mo gzugs b+hAk+Shat+sa dang nI// b+hU kut+tha dang zhes bya ba'i gar// skyes bus bud
11b3(mngon brjod): med gzugs bzung na// gar gyi tshogs can ar+d+ha ka/ sring mo'i bdag po A buta to// b+ha ba zhes pa rig ldan no// de nas A bu ka ni pa// rgyal tshab gzhon nu nyid la ni// b+ha ra Ta dA ra ka zhes so// rgyal po b+han+da ro ko lha// daM yi bu b+ha ra TI dA ri ka/ lha mo gang
11b4(mngon brjod): la dbang bskur ba// gzhan rnams la ni b+ha TI nI// a bra h+ma N+ya gsod mi byed// rA dza shwA le mnga' ris so// am pa ma'o de nas ni// byis pa bA pu zhes bya'o// 'phags pa la ni ma ri Sha// sring mo che ba in+ta ka/ niSh+Ta zin pa yin te mtshungs// haN+The
11b5(mngon brjod): hany+dza ha las bod// dman dang g.yog mo grigs mo so sor ro// oM ga ha ro yan lag bskyod// byany+dza ka ni tshul dag mtshungs// zin pa'i yanA lag dag ni gnyis// gsum ni e gi ka dang ni// sA tI ki mi dran pa'o// sgeg dang dpa' dang snying
11b6(mngon brjod): rje dang // jam dang rgod dang 'jigs su rung // mi sdug drag shul dang ni gsum// sgeg pa rtsang dang 'bar ba dang // spro ba 'phel ba dpa' ba yin// snying rje thugs rje brtse ba dang // dbang byed gtong dang rjes su brtse// rjes su khro ba nyid kyang ngo // de nas
12a1(mngon brjod): dgod dang bzhad gad mo// mi sdug mi legs dag ni gsum// 'di gnyis ngo mtshar rmad byung mtshar che dang // phul byung dang ni de nas ni// 'jigs rung mi bzad 'jigs par byed// dngangs byed skrag byed 'jigs pa dang // 'jigs sde 'jigs can
12a2(mngon brjod): 'jigs par byed// drag po dang ni drag shul gsum// bcu bzhi/ dngang skrag nyam nga pag tsha dang // sA d+ha sa ni 'jigs pa'o// yid kyi rnam 'gyur b+ha ba yin// a nu b+hA ba rnam 'gyur ro// mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyalo khengs// ngar byed sems nyid khengs pa'o// mi gus
12a3(mngon brjod): yongs smon zil gnon dang // mi rtsod zhum byed mi ma tshid dang // mi gus mi shes brnyas dang smod// mig dman 'tshe rA ngo zhum pa dang // 'dzem dang ngo che de gzhan 'dzem// bzod pa dang ni nus pa'o// brnab sems pha rol nor la chags// mi bzod pa ni
12a4(mngon brjod): phrag dog go// yon tan nyes sgo a stu ya// 'grangs dang 'gal dang rnam par 'gog/ yid gdung mya ngan gdung ba mo// phyi nas gdung ba rjes gdung dang // rnam par rnyil pa 'gyod pa'o// khro ba 'khrul pa tshig dang khros// mi ga nas gzhan spun khrong khro mo//
12a5(mngon brjod): gtsang mar spyod pa tshul khrims so// spro ba sems ni rnam par 'phrul// dga' dang mos dang yid mthun dang // sems sbrum dga' dang de nas ni// 'jo dang 'dod dang mngon 'dod dang // kam dang re ba 'dod spro dang // mngon 'dod yid kyi shing rta dang // 'dod dang /
12a6(mngon brjod): mngon zhen srid pa dang // u pa d+hi ni chos sems skyes// a d+hi yid kyi gdung ba'o// sems dang dran byed bsam mno'o// yid gtsigs shin tu sems pa mtshungs// spro ba dang ni dga' ba'o// de'i brtson 'grus shin tu nus pa'i cha// ngan g.yo mo
12b1(mngon brjod): min sgyu dang brdzu// khram dang ngan thabs thog dang ni// zol dang ngan g.yo bcos ma'o// bag med pa dang shes bzhin med// ya mtshan ngo mtshar ltad mor che// mtshar che ba// bud med rnams kyi 'jo sgeg dang // rnam 'gyur rnam 'phrul rol pa dang // de bzhin skul
12b2(mngon brjod): dang zu ra gyis ston// 'di rnams bya ba hA bA'o// de rnams las skyes sgeg pa'i nyams// rtsed mo kyal ka bzhad gad dang // ku re min log rtse 'jo dang // snyad ka 'khyog tshig mtshon pa'o// byis rtsed rtsed mo kyal ka'o// lus 'bab sos dang rdul yin no// pra ye
12b3(mngon brjod): ya ni sems nyams so// snyad smra rnam 'gyur sbed pa'o// mtshungs pa tab tob 'tshabs pa dag/ grwa chad rgod dang kun nas dga'// yid rgod 'dzum bya bar yid du mad+hu langs pa spu dga' ba'o// dud mo 'tsho nge 'chi ma 'dzag/ g.yal ni gsum ste dza~M b+ha Na/
12b4(mngon brjod): slu tshig bi sam+b+ha da'o// nyes pa dang ni 'dred pa mtshums// gnyid dang nyal dang gzims pa dang // rmi lam lags phab ces kyang bya// shin du gnyid log rab tu smos// smin bsdus bzhin bsdus khro gnyer mo// khro bas lta ba mig log go// yang dag grub dang rang
12b5(mngon brjod): bzhin dang // rang gzugs ngo bo nyid dang dngos// de nas g.yo ba dang ni 'dar ba'o// de nas skad cig nyer dga' dang // mchod rten dga' ston ltad mo'o// mtho ris kyi sde'o// / 'og sa rkang 'og stobs ldan gnas// bcud 'og klu yi 'jig
12b6(mngon brjod): rten no// bu ga glo bug skar khung dang // khung dang bu gu pu gu dang // pad+ma'i bu ga gsal ba dang // mthong ba rlung 'byung mkha' dngos dang // sa'i mthong bug sgo sa'i sgo gsum// mdong byed mo min mun pa dang // snang mad rab rib smag dang ni// mun nag mun
13a1(mngon brjod): 'khrigs shin tu sdug/ mun mdangs shA mun za zi dang // kun khyab dang ni mun khyab bo// ri granas kA drA'i bu dang ni// de yi dbang phyug lhag ma dang // mtha' yas nar rgyas sbrul rgyal dang // de nas/ ba lang sna dang thig le'i sku// dong gnas
13a2(mngon brjod): nyal byed rlung zas gnyis// myur la gro dang ni chu sbrul lo// mtshungs pa/ grwal ris dang ni dug mad sbrul// khri can dang ni rkang bzhi dang // shun pa rjes dang go cha grol// sa la 'khyog dang sa la phye// lag 'gro myur 'gro gyi gyu 'gro/ 'phye 'gro mche dug dug
13a3(mngon brjod): 'dzin dang // 'khor lo 'khyog 'gro rnam 'dzin dang // 'khyil pa rkang sbas mig gis thos// lto / gdangs can zar bu mgo/ rgyu ba rings zas ngan khung du nyal// brang 'gro rkang gis 'gro ba dadong // 'phel ka gdangs can rlung gi zaso// gsum yin
13a4(mngon brjod): sbrul las byung ba ni// gdongs ka dang ni pa ni gnyis// dug dang rus pa la sogs so// mtshungs pa sbrul lhogs shun pa'o// mi gsal rngub dang khrag gi dug/ skyes bu ma ning kA kro lA// dug/ nag po'i phung po dug hA la// dug dug dug tshangs pa'i
13a5(mngon brjod): bu dug/ rab tu gsal dang 'joms byed sbyar// bu ste dug dbye 'di rnams dgu/ dug gi sman pa dug sil dang // sbrul 'dzin dang ni sbrul khaMs 'tsho/ dmyal blo dang ni ngan 'gyu'i thilnga// 'dod 'brus bral dang ngan 'gro 'ong // de yi dbye ba cha bA
13a6(mngon brjod): phyogs mnir mad dang ni dru brod // yod bac+doMs 'dzem so thig ni ga sogs// sems can dmyal ba la sa skye sa ni// yi rigs rab med chub che// dpol min pa dang phun tshogs min// gzhan gyis 'khyom dang ngan khyab bo// man go dga' mi
13b1(mngon brjod): bzod tshor ba bsngo// zug rngu zug gzer na ba dang // sdug bsngal yid 'grogs skye las skye// bro 'tshal gcod sbyor 'jigs pa len// du rnams gsum du dbye bas 'gro/ rgya mtsho chu 'dzin zla bas 'phrol// pha rol 'gro ba dang chu klung bdag/ chu srol dang ni 'dra
13b2(mngon brjod): ldan dang // chu can mtsho chen dug can mtshe// rin chen 'byung gnas chu gter dang // chu srin bdag po chu bdag gi/ de yi rab dbye 'o ma'i mtsho// ba tshwa'i rgya mtsho de bzhin gzhan// chu ni mo ste mang po'i tshig/ gzhi can dang ni bur du lhung // 'dod byed 'bru yan nor
13b3(mngon brjod): ldan dang // btung bya chu dang mi 'chi dang // 'tsho byed 'byung byed rten gnas dang // lus 'ching 'dzag dang gso byed dang // rgyas byed kun sgo bsnyen byed dang // btang 'gro skyong byed ltung bya dang // za byed ltung byed bde ba mchog/ sprin gyi me tog sprin gyi bcud// gsu
13b4(mngon brjod): gnyis byed pa rnam 'gyur ro// dpa' rlabs gnyer ma khram gnyer rim// de nas klong dang dpa' chen 'khrug/ steng 'phar dang ni rab 'khrug yin// 'khyil can 'khor chu chu 'khor dang // chu thigs thigs pa chu 'thor po// chu yi zer ma mo yin no// rgyun 'khyog dang
13b5(mngon brjod): ni gya gyu 'gros// yur ba dang ni rnang ma'o// 'gram dang 'gog byed chu ngogs dang // 'jugs dogs dang ni chu 'gram gsam// pha rol tshu rol phan tshun ngogs// de yi bar na rgyun lam mo// chu bo gnyis ldan mo min zhing // bar gling gang la chu 'gram dbus//
13b6(mngon brjod): chu bos nyer bzhag de ni rkang // phyi ma'i ngogs dang bye ma'i thang // 'bying byed rdzab dang 'dam dang ni// mo mina'i dam dang 'jim pa'o// chu bo skyur ba chu 'bab sa// bud dang shwa zhi sa bya ba'o// glu rabs rtags gsum gru sgrol sa// mo gru dang sgrol byed sta ri'o//
14a1(mngon brjod): rgyal dang rtsal 'phyan 'dzin no// rgyun dang rab 'bab 'bab chu'o// gru tsas mnyan pa'i gla yin no// chu lung dang ni shing 'bab chu// gling gzhan rgya dang gru yi tshong // rna ba 'dzin dang gdos pa 'dzin// bya ra ba dang grus 'gro ba// steng na yon tan shing
14a2(mngon brjod): las so// gru skul dbyug pa 'phon byed yin// gre skya dang ni g.yo ba byed do// gru sbyar mo shing gi rtog rtse'o// chu gzhong chu 'thor snod yin no// gting med gsum ste gtsang dang dngas// 'dam khung mi dngas rnyog pa can// gzhal dang zab mo gting rings so// de
14a3(mngon brjod): bzlog dang ni chad yod do// gting med mthil la mi reg go// rgyal chen chu mi nye ba'o// dol dang nya yi rgya yin no// lcags kyu dang ni nya 'bigs so// spu rings nya dang dz+ha Sha nya// 'gro ldan rnam par skyong ba dang // sgong skyes rnam 'phyo go cha can// de nas 'gro ldan sha ku lAN+Da
14a4(mngon brjod): ka/ mche stong ldan dang nya tha dang // steng 'phyo byis pa gsod dag mtshungs// na la'i nya dang tsi li tsam// proSh+Ti hra srab char gnyis so// sgo nga'i nya bran tshogs pa la// po ta d+ha na de nas ni// nya snar ma/ nya yi nya yi nya gal nya// rdo rje can dang ti mi nya// nya mid la sogs
14a5(mngon brjod): de nas ni// yA dI si ni chu skye bo// de yi dbye ba bis gsod dang // sram dang shang+ku// chu srin sogs// sdig pa dang ni karka Ta// gul 'gro ru sbal kAts+tsha'o// 'dzin khri chu yi srin rings so// na kra chu srin bum pa'i mgo/ sa yi 'khri shing sa srin tal// dab
14a6(mngon brjod): byig go d+ho ka mtshungs so// khrag 'thung srin bu pad pa'o// mo ni mang tshig pad pa'o// mu tig skye gnas mu sto mu tig bai raM// dung ni kam+bu ra yin mo// dung phran dung gi sin mo'o// 'bu lkogs can dang sprugs pa'i bu// 'phyo 'gro sbal ba dbyar skyes
14b1(mngon brjod): dang / shA lcang rgyal mtshan dadur// sa 'bru pra mo tal phran no// sbal phran dang ni char skyes po// ru sram pra ma du ma'o// nya yi bye brag dga' ma ra can ma// zhwa phyis nya skyogs zhes bya'o// chu yi gzhi dang chu nyal lo// de la gtong mod cha hrada'o// chu yo spyang skyong lhong
14b2(mngon brjod): ka 'khyil// khron pa chu nyal skyes bu'o// khron chu brus chu ku pa'o// chu dong yang na po yin no// khron pa'i rtsig pa tra ki'o// bI nAHha ni kha khyer ro// rdzing dang de yi chu la ni// A khA ta dang lhas bskang dang // pad+ma'i 'byung ldan sgra ldan no// mo min/ chu yi snying ldan
14b3(mngon brjod): rdzing dang mtsho// lteng ka rdzing bu stang lteng dang // rdzi ngo mo tshe dang rdzing rings dang // 'obs dang yongs su bskor ba'i chu// drangs pa'i chu dang yur chu dang // btsug shing chus bskor bskrun shing chu// de nas gtsang po 'bab chu dang // rba rlabs can dang nya lcibs can//
14b4(mngon brjod): ngogs can dang ni sgra ldan sgrogs// 'bab ldan dang ni gling ma can// gzhol 'gro rgyun ldan mtshor 'bab bo// go gI khyab 'jug rkang pa dang // dza hA'i bu mo lha yi chu// shing rta bu mo lam gsum 'gro/ rgyun gsum 'jigs byed bu mo dang // nyi ma'i bu mo
14b5(mngon brjod): kA lin+ti// zhi ba'i sring mo ye mu nA// re bA dang ni nar ma dA// zlas byung ri bo'i bu mo dang // lag pa'i chu bo rtag tu 'bab// dpung pa phyin dang dkar 'bib bo// chu bo shi ta brgyar gyes dang // zhags grol bi pA Ta ni mo// sho Na gser gyi lag pa yin// drangs
14b6(mngon brjod): chu lung chu chu phran dang // 'dam bu can dang spa can dang // zla ba'i cha dang dbyangs can dang // kA be rI dang 'bab ldan no// gzhan yang dbye ba chu 'dras 'dres// gnyis po wa ti chu khang ngo // gsum rnams phyi ma dag la'o// lhar bcas rdzing bu'i chu la na//
15a1(mngon brjod): dA bi ka dang sa ra bo// dri bzangs chu tshim 'phro ba dang // dmar po yi ni mtshams yin no// u dA la dang stobs ngan no// de nas sngon po chu skyes dang // in+bi ba ra ut+pal sngo// dkar po ku mud ke ra be// shA lU ka ni de rnams rtsa ba yin// chu
15a2(mngon brjod): yi lo ma bum can dang // chu yi sngon po shaM bA la// chu'i sde'o// ku mud tshal dang ku mu da// dAr pa dang ni sdong bu'o// de la sogs pa pad+ma'o// yang na pheM ni pad+ma'o// sdong bu skyes dang mas 'bigs dang // u tA la tshan 'deb slong dang // mu rman 'dab ma
15a3(mngon brjod): brgya pa dang // chur nyar 'damaM skyes chu yi ro// chu skyes metshe skyes ngar ba skyes// zo 'bru'i phreng ldan bus ke R+ka ra chu 'khrungs// puN+Da rI ki chu skyes dkar// de nas chu skyes dmar po dang // ut+pal dmar po pad+ma dmar// sdong bu dang ts+li ba dang // de nas mo min
15a4(mngon brjod): rtsa ba dang // bi sha chu skyes la sogs rtsa// pad+mi 'i rtsa ba mo min no// ka ra hA Ta pad+ma'i sgrogs// pad+ma'i skra dang ke sha ra// mo min no// 'dab ma 'khyil dang lo ma gsar// swa bon mdzod dang ze 'bru'o// bshad/ mtho ris mkha' dang phyogs dus
15a5(mngon brjod): blo// sgra sogs gar dang bcas pa dang // sa 'og gdengs can dmyal ba chu// de rnams kyi ni tshogs bcas bshad// sa 'og gi sde'o// 'chi med seng ge zhes pas mdzad pa'i ming dang rtags kyi rjes su bshad pa las mtho ris la sogs skabs
15a6(mngon brjod): dang po yan lag dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / sa yi sde mtshan grong khyer dang // ri bo dang ni nags tshal dang // sman dang ri dgas la sogs rnams// mi dang bram ze rgyal rigs dang // rje rigs dmangs rigs yan lag bcas/
15b1(mngon brjod): ke ba'i yan lag bcas 'dir brjod// sa gzhi skrun byed mi g.yo ba// mtha' yas bcud ldan sna tshogs bgengs// 'gyur med 'dzin byed rten byed dang // 'chang byed g.yo byed rgyal byed dang // 'od srungs byin dang gnas dang nI// kun bzod gser ldan nor 'dzin
15b2(mngon brjod): dang / yangs can dbyig 'dzin chu skyob dang // sa dang sa gzhi skyed byed bzod// sa chen zhag gor mchod byed do// sa dang mri ti ka zhes so// rab dngas sa bzangs yid 'ong sa// sa gaushin 'bru kuni skye bo dang // sa ngan dang ni tsha'i sgo can// ba tshwa can dang tshan
15b3(mngon brjod): can dang // gnyis pa dag kyang gzhon gyis rtags// thang dang byas pa'i thang ka'o// mtshungs pa mya ngan thong dgon pa// gnyis te ma bskos ma smos mtshungs// gsum ni de nas 'gro ba dang // 'jig rten dang ni gnas rten dang // sa brten skye 'gro 'jig rten
15b4(mngon brjod): no// 'di ni b+hA ra ta yi yul// sa rA ba ti'i chu gang las// de phyogs dang po shar dang lho// dang po dang ni steng gi phyogs// nub dang byang dang / mtha' kho ba dang ni kla klo'i yul// yul dbus ma d+hu ma dang ni// 'phags 'khrungs bsod nam so sa gzhi dang /
15b5(mngon brjod): 'bigs byed gangs ri dag gi dbus// mnga' ris dang ni skye bo'i gnas// yul phyogs dang ni nye 'khor ro// ga sum ni ltos kyi mthar thug pa// 'damA bu phar cher 'dam bu can// ku mud ldan pa ku mud mang // spa yi tshal ni sgra mang po// lo ma rtsa
15b6(mngon brjod): skyes ldang ba dang // 'bru skyes pa ni bang gi la// chung mang chu dang ldan pa'o// po/ mu khyud ldan pa de bzhin sgrub// mo ni gyo can rdza duM can// gseg ma dang ni rde'u can// de la sogs pa'i yul rnams te// de bzhin gzhan yang shes par bya// bye ma
16a1(mngon brjod): can dang gtsang shod yul// char 'bab 'bru rnams phun tshogs skyong // gtsang po'i ma dang lha yi ma// ji ltar rim pa/ rgyal po bzang ba'i yul dang ni// rgyal po bzang po dang ldan dang // gzhan la rgyal po can zhes so// bal b+has ni gros
16a2(mngon brjod): kaM/ gauSh+TI na~M ni sngon byung lcag/ rnam grangs de rnams sa'i zho re la// rdzing dang yur ba mo dang pho// grog mkhar grog tshang grog mo'i khyim// skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo // lam dang 'gro pya bgrod pa dang // shul lam 'jug bya goms dang lam// 'khor ba dang ni rkang
16a3(mngon brjod): gcig pa/ shin tu 'jug bya lam bzangs dang // bden lam mchod par bya ba'i lam// lam ngan sdug 'gro bi pa thA// g.yon lam kA pa tha ni mtshungs// lam med a pa thaM yin no// lam 'dom sa dang bzhi mdo dang // mtha' dang ring po lam stong dang //
16a4(mngon brjod): dgon pa bgrod dka' lam dang ni// gab+hu ti ni mo rgyang grags rung // na lA khro ni bzhi brgya'o// dril bu'i lam ni khral pa'o// de ni grol khyer nyer grol lo// sa'i sde mtshan no// / grong khyer mo ste skyong byed dang // rgyal lam 'bab gnas tshong
16a5(mngon brjod): bdal dang // 'jigs med dang ni mi bskyod gnas// gzhan gang rtsa ba'i grong khyer las// grong khyer de ni lo ma'i grong // smad 'tshong gnas dang 'jug gnas skye bo'i gnas// kun 'jug ha ste tshod 'dus dang // tshong lam dang ni srang lam dang // srang dang
16a6(mngon brjod): tshong khang rgya 'grems sa// ra ba'i rmang dang 'gram mo yin// ra ba bskor ba lcags ri dang // rim pa/ 'obs tshal mtha' yi mu khyud de// rtsig pa mo dang brtsegs pa dang // rtsig pa'i bar rus kI ka saM// khang pa khyim dang gnas dang ni// 'jug bya
16b1(mngon brjod): chags dang gnas bzhi dang // mtshan mtha' nges 'gro rtag pA dang // gnas khang phibs 'og 'dun gnas so// 'dzin gnas skyes bu mang po'i tshig/ skyabs 'og dang ni khang khyim dang // 'dug sa khang pa gnyis dag go// gnas sa dang ni khyim rnams
16b2(mngon brjod): so// khyim bzhi yod pa 'gro ldan no// thob rnams l-I ma'i spyil po dang // rtswa skyes spyil po mo yin no// mchod rten mchod sbyin gnas dag mtshungs// rta yi rA ba rta khang dang // A be sha na ba ro yi gnas// pra pA chu yi khang pa'o// ma the slob gra la sogs
16b3(mngon brjod): gnas// gany+dza tu ni chang mi'i khyim// gaR+Sha gA re nang gi khyimo// a ri d+l-i ni bu btsos khyim// glo skar khra ma ga bAk+Sha/ 'dun sa mo min skye bo'i gnas// bsil khang la sogs nor ldan gnas// khang bzangs lha dang sa bdag khyim// zhal khang
16b4(mngon brjod): mo min rgyal po'i khab// 'du khang rgyal po'i pho brang dang // bkru shis ma dang kun bzung dang // g.yung drung 'khyil ba la stsogs kyang // dbang phyug rnams kyi pho brang gi/ bkod pa'i rab tu dbye bar 'gyur// sa bdag pho brang mtha' mar ni// btsun
16b5(mngon brjod): mo'i khang pa srung mA tsan// dag pa'i mtha' can srung ma tsan+da// ya the ma ya phubs mo yin no// sgo drung sgo mdun sgo rtswa ni// phyi rol sgo yi khyams yin no// sgo kha sgo phibs 'jug pa dang // yon lag bzhi mdo srang mdo dang // shing 'og rdo yi ma thim
16b6(mngon brjod): dang // ri bzhi de yi steng du gnas// glo'i sgo mtha' ma'i ske yin te/ phyogs mtha'i sgo ni rtsibs sgo'o// chu babs thog gi tha ma dang // de nas thog dang chu skyob dang // gdung sgur shing 'khyog thog shing skra// phug ron skyong dang bya skyibs can// skyes bu 'am ni
17a1(mngon brjod): ma ning ngo // mo/ sgo dang srung byed sgo mo dang // stegs bu dang ni snam bu dang // rta babs mi min sgo yi gyi// grong khyer sgo dang sgo mo che// mda' yab grong sgo glang po'i sen// de la sen mo gsum yin no// sgo glegs sgo rnam mnyam pa'o//
17a2(mngon brjod): sgo gtan 'phang gtan ma ning mo// mdzeg skas dang ni tham skas so// skas ka dang ni ya gad do// phyags ma dang ni dge byed yin// rdul dang phyag dar des 'phangs so// sgo bdun skyabs 'gro nges 'jug dang // nges 'gugs so// mtshungs pa grong bar grong
17a3(mngon brjod): mtshams so// khyim gyi sa gzhi khang pa dang // mo min no// grong mtha' nye ba'i grong zhes min// mtshams drang so mtshams gnyis po mo// 'brog khyim rtsa yi khang pa yin// 'o tshed byed sha ba ri yi khyim// grong khyer gyi sde mtshan no// / sa
17a4(mngon brjod): 'dzin rtse can sa gzhi 'chang // mi 'phrogs 'dzin byed tshigs can dang // ri bo sa skyob gyen du 'phyur// ri dang mi g.yo brag rdo brtsegs// 'jig rten snang ba khor yug dang // ri bo sum brtsegs rtse gsum myatshungs// nub ri phyi phyogs sna
17a5(mngon brjod): 'dzin no// shar phyogs sngon ma'i rI yin no// gangaso ldan dang ni 'gog byed dang // 'bigs byed dang ni mA l+ya ya/ yongs su bskor dang spos ngad ljang // sal+lo/ ma la mo// ma nA ke/ ke lA shaHshA nu mA na pI/ kr-i NA tAM/ man+da ra/ AM shI naHkai shu
17a6(mngon brjod): ko&tsiny+tsA she shwa raM// 'di rnams ri yi bye brag ste gzhan las byung ngo // gzhan yang gangs ri rtsegs la sogs// mi 'gro/ rdo ba sbeng byed gor ma dang // btsog po dzu po rtun dang rdo// brtsegs pa mo min rtse dang rA// ltung gnas g.yang sa
17b1(mngon brjod): rI gzar dang // ri zhol mo mr-inA r-i D+ha dang // ri ltengs pang ri mas ri 'joms dang // mo min no// chu canu chu dang ldan po dAH/ chu 'brab chu sgra can dang skogs/ ri sul ngam grog mo min no// lha gnas khyams dang phug dang khung // rgyu dang ri ni nyil ba dang // shwa dang ri
17b2(mngon brjod): yi bud ces bya'o// rkong sa mo ste 'byung khungs yin// ri yi rkang pa ri phran no// ri rtsa ri log sa gzhi dang // ri steng dang ne sa gzhi mtho// ro bo'i khams ni ldong ros sogs// btsag ran dang ni khyod par can// nags ri nag sa tshal ma ning ngo // khri shing la
17b3(mngon brjod): sogs rnams kyis g.yogs// ri'i snga'o// / 'brog dang dgon pa stong pa dang // stug po dben gnas nags tshal dang // dgon pa chen po nags stug po// khyim dang tshul dang nges 'gro dang // skyed mos tshal yin// nye 'khor tshul dang byas pa'i
17b4(mngon brjod): nagasany+dza1\u0f7fde bzhin gang du smad 'tshong dang // tshogs can khyim dang nye ba'i 'tshal// shing gi ldum ra can// skyes bu rtse gnas skyed mo tshalA// rgyal po'i gzhi dang nye ba'i 'tshal// yin no// de ni lha yi rab dga' tshal/ kong khyer mtha' yi bkod pa'o//
17b5(mngon brjod): tshwar ma phreng ba gral dang ni// khrims chags bkod pa gr-i la rim po// nags drang tshal ni tshog pa yin// myu gu dang ni wa lu skyes// shring dang sa skyes yal 'dab can// ljon+da pa rkang mthung chur mi ltung // 'gro 'gog shing dang lo ma tsan// sdong pa
17b6(mngon brjod): ljon shing shing 'gro med// nags ni me tog mtha' mar 'bras// me to ka med pa'i 'bras ldan+da nags// sman ni 'bres smin mtho ra 'jig pa// 'bras bu 'dzin pa mo sham minaH mo shamaM 'bras med shing thog med// 'bru ldan 'bras cen shing
18a1(mngon brjod): thog can// rab shar nyer bya yang dag rgyus// sgrub grol rnam phye 'phro ba can// me tog kha bye rnam rgyus yin// mo shram min sogs gsum yin no// snong dum brtan po rtsa gog dang // yal ga rtsa thung k+Sha ba'o// sdong po skab mgul pa dang //
18a2(mngon brjod): 'khri shi nga 'gu geng lcug ma dang // 'khri shing lo ma yal 'dab dang // lcug ma dang ni tshang tshing ngo // 'gro mdo la sogs bskyed pa ni// stod dang sbreng dang blang ba'o// mo min mgul dang stod rkang ni// rtsu ba yal ga las byung zhing // mtshungs pa yal ga lcug
18a3(mngon brjod): ma ste/ sdod pa'i yal ga yal 'dab dang // rtsa phran dang ni ral pa'o// yal ga'i rtsa ba 'phyang ba dang // rtsa las 'khri shing rtse mor son// mgo dang rtse mo co do ni// yang na pho'o// rtsa ba rmang dang rkang pa'o// snying po rkang par mtshungs pa'o// lpags mo lkogs shin
18a4(mngon brjod): mo min no// me shing // ya me shing 'od shing sren shing mo// khog stong na can yang ni po// ni skyem mo// ltung byed dom grib byed dang // 'dab ma shing lo lo 'dab bo// yul 'drab mo min yal tshogs dang / chen
18a5(mngon brjod): ling mo min no// shing sogs rnams kyi 'bras bu 'bru// brin te skye gnas rab tu bcings// ma smin 'bras bu sha la Ta// me tog skam po bla na ste// de gnyis rtags gsum// 'gyur dang sbal min ma ning ngo // gzhon nu dang ni gsar bu po// kha
18a6(mngon brjod): bye ba dang gyes pa dang // bu che tshigs 'chas mo min no// mo/ yid dgas puSh+pa me tog dang // ku su ma rnams mtshungs pa'o// me tog bcud dang me tog ro// me tog rdul dang yid 'ong rdul// gnyis dman 'bras la byung kun// a ru ra
18b1(mngon brjod): sogs mo yin no// A shAt+tha dang be Na pa// p+lak+Sha dang ne yA gro d+hi// eng gu daM ni 'bras bu 'bru// 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu dzaM b+hun+ti// dzaM bu dzAm pA yin no// me tog rigs la sogs pa rnams// rang gi rtags/ 'bru dang 'bras bu/ thi dA mya la sogs pa
18b2(mngon brjod): rnams// rtsa ba me tog ma ning ste// pU Ta lA/ byang chub shing dang lo ma bskyod// bip+pa la dang glang po'i zas// a shrAt+tha de nas ni// sgyer rtsi ur+d+ha d+hAtrI dang // so rtse la gnod sgyur mo'o// de la zho 'bras me tog 'bru/ so rtswa nyams byed ces pa'o//
18b3(mngon brjod): u dum bA ra 'dzam bu'i 'bras// mchod sbyin yan lag gser 'o ma// yongs 'du sa brtol rnga yab can// ku mud lo ma 'dab zung can// lo ma bdun po shun pa 'thug/ shA ra dI dang dug lo ma// dong kha dang ni rgyal po'i shing // zhi byed sor mo bzhi
18b4(mngon brjod): pa dang // 'khor lo dang 'dra nad 'joms dang // me tog breng bud lo ma bzang // skyur rtsi chen po so rtse dang // skyur mo dzaM b+hirdzam+b+ha la// klu shing chu shing dkar po dang // lo ma kha dang gzhon nu'o// skyes bu klu shing skyes snga dang // mtho dang ge sar lha yi
18b5(mngon brjod): 'dab/ yo ngas bzang dang nai nim+ba'i shing // man+da ra dang mchod yona? 'drab// tI ni saM dang s+yan+da no// mu khyud shing dang shing rta'i shing // shin tu grol dang snod shing dang // sna tshogs byed dang de nas gnyis// pI ta na ka te pi ta no// A mra ta'i shing ngo //
18b6(mngon brjod): blaglang rtsi mngar ba'i me tog can// sbrang rtsi shing dang bAM pra s+tha// ma d+hASh+NI lo// ri skyes ma d+hu la ka'o// bI li 'bras mngar sran sri'o// de la ri b+hung a kro Ta// kirbar lo gnyis yin no// g.yal shang lus po za bar byed// pA lA sha dang ki shu ka/ lo ma
19a1(mngon brjod): b+hU ta bo tha dang // de nas smyan+da shing shing rtadang // sbyin gyi me tog bi dul// dkar bo bI narbany+dza la// gnyis po ba rI byA d+ha dang // be dru lo dang nA dwe yAM// sgur mo dang ni ta ru ki/ mdzes pa'i mig sman shi gru dang // dri sno mig 'dra grol ba can// me
19a2(mngon brjod): tog mngar dang shing gu mngar// i riny+dza dang po ni la mtshungs so// dzaSh+mi shAN+Di l+ya dang ni// shau lu Shau dang mA lu ra// dbal gyi 'bras bu nyi doH dza// p+lak+Shi ri tsan+do/ 9/ !glo d+ha dang rkang mangs dang // baTa'o// nA mI khan sI ba ra lo d+hA'o// tI rI Ta ti lA nyid byed do//
19a3(mngon brjod): a ma 'dzag byed ro ldan no// lhan cig byed pa A mra zhim// bu mkhan lU kha la ke ma ning // kau shi ka gug gul 'gengs// sA lu bang 'joms dkar po dang // de yi 'dab ma lan mangs po// rgyal po byin dang bi yA la// san+na kreT+Ta d+ha nu pa Ta// zab mo
19a4(mngon brjod): kun bzang kash+ma ri// sbrang lo ma dpal gyi lo ma bzang // kA sh+tsA d+ya dang yang de nas gnyis// rag chung shing dang sgyur shing ngo // ko ba li/ ko lam stobs ngan phe ni la// sau bA rI ba dang raM g+hor+N+Na dang // de nas swA du kaN+Tha ka/ bi ka ka ta sgang bzar shing // tshigs mang ba
19a5(mngon brjod): dang stag ki rkang // I ra ba ta nA rang ga/ s+thAr NI sa yi dzam+bu'o// dan+na ka dang s+phu ra dza ka ka/ kA lA skan+d+ha rkang mar na ga/ kA ken+na ku la ka/ kA ka pa lu ka/ bya rog tin+du ke/ go li D+ho dza D+ha la/ g+h+r-iN+Tha pA Ta li/ thar dang grol ba can// ti la ka dad k+Sha ra dang // dpal ldan no//
19a6(mngon brjod): dz+nyA mo pi tsu la dz+nyA bu kau/ dpal gyi lo ma ku mu dika/ kuM b+hI ke Dar+ya ka Ta 'i 'bras// zhu mkhan paT+Ti ka khya yin// zhu mkhan dmar po rgya skyigs dngas byed do// nU di pA Sha kra mu ka/ tshangs shing tshangs pa'i dA ru dang // mtshungs/ nI baM dgas byed ki di bA//
19b1(mngon brjod): gshol ldan dga' bar byed pa'o// dpa' shing i ru ShA ra dag/ ma gdong b+ha l+laT ki gsum// gar+ha b+hAT+Te kan+d+ha rA la// ka pI ta na su bAR+sha kAHp+lak+She tan+ti T+Ti dang bse yab shing // g+hur mo tsI bkur klu rtsi shing // a sa na ban+d+ha ka'i me tog dga' byed mtsho byed nga//
19b2(mngon brjod): spros dkar// krA rtsi kra rtsi bog dang rna ba can/ 6sa la/ gtsang ze'i sra shing dpa' bo'i shing // dpa' bi'i shing dang ka ku b+h+r-irdzun// rA dzA daM pA lA d+ha kA/ 'o ma shing du nas gnyis so// aM gu dI che ba shing // stag pa ri rig shud pa mnyen// pi tsA la dang
19b3(mngon brjod): snying pa dang // grol ba dang ni tshe brtan dang // shal+ma li ni gnyis// pa ts+tshan+dzatA shA la ma li// tse Ta Te/ ro tsa na phung ba shwal+ma ya// tsi ra bi l+r-i na ku ma la// kardza dang ka rany+dza ke/ bri kIr+ya pA ti ka ra dza// pU ti ka dang ka li kA ra ka/ ka rany+dza b+he dang tshigs drug mak+ko Ta// e gA
19b4(mngon brjod): ra dang bal+la rI// ro hi ro hi ta ka mtshun dgra/ sa 'bru'i me tog go// seng ldeng byis po'i nu ma dang // kha da~M ra dan+ta d+hU ba na// a ri med do sdug pA sa ldeng snang ldeng dang ni song ldeng dkar// zla ba'i yal ga nyid kyang ngo // de nas stag 'jug dri za lag/ a
19b5(mngon brjod): raN+Da u ru bri ka/ ru tsu ka dang ri mo can// tsany+tsu dang ni sor lnga pa// a maN+Da 'bol ldan byaM DA swa ka/ cung zad zhi dang sa sha mi ra/ sha mi saM ku'i 'bras bu zhib paN+Di ta go/ ma ru ba kash+tsa sa na ka ra hA Ta ka sha l+ya chang gi shing // brgya byin zhing 'thung yongs
19b6(mngon brjod): bzang dang // shing bzang dru ka li se/ shing sor shun pa tsha can shing // bdun po de ba dA ru yin// de nas gnyis po skya nar dang // pA Ta ma lA dang don yod dang // kA ras+tha la 'bras bu'i shing // me tog rtsa nag lus ngan mig/ khro rgod bud med ming can dang /
20a1(mngon brjod): 'khri shing ba la phyag 'tshal dang // khre dang bri yang gu dang ni// 'bras shing nI 'bras bu can// sna tshogs snga dang dri li 'bras// kA ra b+hA dang dga' dang do// sbal ba'i lo ma pa twod+hA// gar byed ka d+haM ga dang ni// rU DA ka dang gsher shing ngo //
20a2(mngon brjod): nomo sna dang skar ma dang // me togo/ mgul rings kuT na Ta// shau NaM ka dang A ra lo// ti Sh+ya'i 'bras bu sbyar ru ra// gsum yin pa da rtsin tshong mAng // rtags gsu mo ba ni ba ru dra// mig dang tsha me byud kaR+Sho'i 'bras// 'byung po'i gnas dang rtsod pa'i
20a3(mngon brjod): ni 'arigs med nad med phan pa ni// tshod mi'i rgyu me chechen shud rtsi dang // oM ru ra dang gse re ldan dang // sems byed dpal dang zhi ba dang // ljon pa sar pa thang shing // thang chu shing zhes pa yangang // de nas ut+pal shing dang ni// lte ba
20a4(mngon brjod): can dang yongs nad dang // la ku tsa dang lI gu tsa// u hu hu/ ba na sa dang tshor 'bras can// ni tshul dang chu skyes chu shing // bya rog u dum+ba rI kA/ 'bras bu gur ma pa pUr dang // rje ngar 'bras can+da// a riSh+Ta dang kun la bzang // shing kun 'dres dang
20a5(mngon brjod): dri ma can// 'joms byed dang ni nam+bi'i shing // de nas bauts+tshe nA dang a ga ru/ shi sha pa dang skya bo dang // thal ba'i snying can zhes bya'o// shi ri kha dang chu 'thung dang // g+haN+Di lo yang nod nas ni// tsa pe yang dang tsa pa ka/ gser gyi mai tog tsam+ba'o//
20a6(mngon brjod): de yi 'bras bu ka li kA/ dri yi 'bras bu de nas ni// ki pa re dang ba ku la// bany+dza lo ni mya ngan mang // mtshungs pa si 'bru dA Di mau// tsam+ba ya dang ke sa pa can// nA ga ge ser gser ming can// rgyal dang rgyal byad rtog pa'i dgra/ nA de yi dang rnam
20b1(mngon brjod): rgyal shing // dpal gyi lo ma ma gtsug shing // zhi ba dang tshogs byed rgyal ba'o// de nas bcad skyer brgya byin shing // bu yi shing dang ri yi phreng // de yi 'bras bu ka ling+ge// dbang por nas dang nas bzang 'bras// 'bras nag smin pa bash+tsa// su She NA dang
20b2(mngon brjod): log nyid do// nag po'i phud po tA mA la// min pany+tsA dang de nas ni// sin+na ka sin+na bA re// chang gi dang po nau nur+N+Na/ dbang can yang ngo // lan bu kha rA ga rI da ba tA// Do sprin zhes pa yang ngo // dpal gyi lag ba b+hu ru NI// d+hA rtsi shing dang mal+li kA/ sa
20b3(mngon brjod): rkang pa shwa ta b+hi ru dang // se bA smai tre nAgs las byung // shaM pA lI ka legs 'bab dang // nir+m+ma r+t+ti dang sngon po can// si ta sau dang dkar po dang // ro zhim 'byung po 'jug/ de nas mA ga d+hI ga Ni kA/ pU thi kA dang am+baSh+Ta// de gser gser gyi me tog
20b4(mngon brjod): tsan/ shin tu grol dang puN+Da ka/ spyod ldan sbrang gi shing ra khri shing // me tog sna ma yang dgA'i dang dzA te'o// 'dab bdun gzhon nu'i phreng ba can// chu Ta me tig kun pa'o// dmar po me tog bin+d+ha ka/ ban+d+ha dzI ba yin no// nus ldan grwa non nu ta raNAM/
20b5(mngon brjod): am lAM na dang nus ldan che// de la dmar po ku ru byA ka/ de la sar po ku ru Na tha ka/ sngon po dz+nyin+ti gnyis dang mda'// brin mo tsar+Nu sha la sa// sA rI ya ka dzIN+Da yan// de la ku ru ba ka dmar po dang / ser po ku ru ba ka dang // dz+nyiN+Di de la lhan cig
20b6(mngon brjod): spyod da pa gnyis// rnga mo me tog dza ba dang // rdo rje'i me tog ti laM gang // pra tI hA sa brgyar gyis dang // gtum po rta bsod lag pa dpa'// ka ri re dang kra ki ra// tshogs pa dang gnyis so// smyo byed dang ni ki ta bau// gdul dkar ya d+hu tu ra// gser
21a1(mngon brjod): gyi me tog ces pa'o// mA tu la dang myos byed do// de'i 'bras bu mA tu la pu tra ka/ 'bras bu gang ba pI dzA pA ra// mdog mdzes mA tu lAng+ka ka/ sa mi ra Na ma ru ba kA/ pra s+thA me tog pa Na dz+nyA ka/ dzam+b+hi 'a ro dang de nas ni// par+Na se dang ka dziny+dza ra kA
21a2(mngon brjod): the ra dkar po adz+ra ka 'di pA thi khra bo mo'i ming can// aurga zhos pa ba su ka/ a s+pho Ta tshigs pa'i gzugs man+ta ra dang a rka'i 'dab// 'di dkar po a lar+k+ka pra tA pa sa// zhi ba'i me tog phyugs bdag dga'// shing gcig sba ba ba su'o// ban+da shi
21a3(mngon brjod): la za ba dang // shing skyes 'tshe ba nyid kyang ngo // bu zas bcad skye sle tres dang // rgyud ldan bdud rtsi 'tsho byed dang // zla ba'i mgul pa yangs pa can// sbrang gri l-i mA nyid kyang ngo // myur ba lha mo sdang gi ro// mo ra Ta dang 'od ldan thos// ma d+hu li ka
21a4(mngon brjod): ga'u shing dang / shro Na go par+Ni dang // bI lu par+Na nyid kyang ngo // pU thA ma nu spos dkar dang // bi d+haM kar+Ni gnos can dang // rtani dang ngo ldan stong bu gcig/ sdig pa'i bram mo b+ha sI nA// nag kha mo can/ tshab tshabs gang ba dang // mya ngan med dang
21a5(mngon brjod): spor dang ni// tsha ba'i spor dang nya khris dang // nag dbye 'khor lo'i yan lag dang // bya'i zas/ bdage sdeng dzA Da a d+h+ya Na Da// g.ya' shing pra br-iSh+Ta ya NI// ri bya prok+ShA shru ka shi ma bi// ka bi ka r+d+hash+ya ma k+ka nI/ ri mo nye ba'i ri mo can// n+ya gro d+hi dang khu ba
21a6(mngon brjod): ldan// sdom pa dang ni char 'bab dang // pra t+ya ka shr-i NI su dza shre NI// raN+Da byi ba'i rna ba'o// yang 'og lam she kha ri ko dang // d+hA mArga dang rma bya dang // pra t+yaka lo mi kI sha'i 'dab// ka Ni hI dang bung bu'i ste// pany+dzi ka dang tshangs ma dang // pad+ma dang ni
21b1(mngon brjod): b+hargi dang // tshangs par mchod sdong me mdag lo// pA le ya shA sa bad+ma ra bar+d+hak+Sha/ rtsod dang bi ka sa dang ni// rting bI/ yan lag mnu ngas pa dang // sbal pa'i 'dab mu b+hAn+ti ri// b+huN+Di dpag tshad Na 'khri shing // ga Ta ma ra mgo ya bA so// reg bya sdug
21b2(mngon brjod): da chu mang s+ye// kA NA pa ka ding byed bu// byed da nga mnga' mang dang // rgya mtsho'i mthar skye reg par dka'// pr-i Sha Ni lo ma thag lo// sna tshogs 'dab ma g+ni bal+la kI/ kroSh+Na bil+la song ge 'jug/ ka la saM dang d+hA ra ni gu ha// ni da gri kA s+tha shI stag mor+m+ma tAM//
21b3(mngon brjod): kaN+Tha ka prA tsa da nI ku li// chu ba reg dka' yul skyes kyang // rams shing nag po krI ta ki kau/ grong skyes sbrang gi 'dab ma can// 'tshod byed dpal gyi 'bras bu dang // tun tha ta NAM do lA dang // sngon po rams so// gso ma rA dza so ma rA dzI dang /
21b4(mngon brjod): 'ad ba bzeng zla ba'i sdong bu dang // kA la me Shau 'bra sa nag dang // bA gu dzI dang ras 'bras can// pi bi ling dang nag po dang // bi di hI dang ma ga d+hI// g.yo byed zegs ma sreg par byed// grog rkeng drod sman ko la'o// de nas ka ri pi bya lI// ka
21b5(mngon brjod): paM ba l+li// shr-i ya sI deng rtsa shrir po// dbyi mo stu tsa bi kaM dang // kA ka tsaM guny+dza nag po// pa laM ka sha dri sno khyi yi mche ba dang // ro ldan cher ma go kaN+Da kaM/ go kU ra ka nags kyi rI// zhes pa yang ngo // bong da dkar po blar 'dug dang // a ti bi sha nye ba
21b6(mngon brjod): gu a ra Na/ rA can dang na sman chan no// de nas 'o ma 'o ma mtshungs// rtsa ba brgya pa skud mangs dang // b+hi ru rin+na rI pa rI// ri Sh+ya pa shad pa e b+hi ru// nye shing ba yan ti dang ni nA ra'i bu sha tA ba rI a he du// de nas sbyar pa ka la ya ka khu ba sar
22a1(mngon brjod): bo da ra bI// pa tse ba tsa shing ser dang // brdza nI yang ngo // chu thag dri rtse 'dud pa drug/ go lo mI dang tshigs brgya pa// dkar po gang dang ldan pa'o// sman pa'i ma dang seng ge dang // bA sa kA dang khyu mchog dang // aT rA Sha si ha s+ya// ba sha ka
22a2(mngon brjod): dang rta yis so// a s+pho tA rir phreng // 'jug gnon dang ni gzhan las rgyal// nor shing dri ldan kAN+Tha k+Sha// khu byug mig dang k+Sha ra krU rA// shI lAM ya dang ts+tsha ta shi ba// gdugs dang mngar ldan mi sI dang // si staM yA dang de na sA ni// shI ri ShaN+Da rdo
22a3(mngon brjod): rje'i shing // srag sna hI gu Da thams cad 'o ma can// byi dang ga dang don yod dang // sna tshogs 'bras// tin+na la dang srin bu gsod// pau T+wAM ga po me ning // ba l-I bA Ta la ka dang // dril bu'i sgra dang shA Na'i me tog/ dgun 'brum pa yin nu ma dang // drA
22a4(mngon brjod): kA ro ldan sbyanga? gi rau// kun mdzes 'byung dang sa b+hA hAM// thu gsum dI bri tA ti bita// dum bu gsum pa ra ba ni// sngon po dang ni ba laM d+ho// su Sha Ni ba nag po dang // sran chung 'dab ma zla ba phyed// kA la me Sha kA/ shing mngar dang ni kli ta kAM/
22a5(mngon brjod): biSh+Ti ma d+hA shing mngar yan// rnam 'joms 'o ma dkar po dang // dur shing dri dang kau/ Shi Tu tsa ya siM tA// 'o ma nyung ngu rnam 'joms dkar chen dang // k+saM gi dri tsan+da lA ga lI// shA dz+nyA chu ya pi pya l-I// bya'i zas/ rta rko da kA ra bI// sgron ma rma byi'i
22a6(mngon brjod): mdongs// lo tsa ma sta ka sbrul lce sngon po shA ri bA/ mtha' med ut+pal shi ri tse// yo gya mri d+hi gru pa dang // la k+Sho dang ni rgan po'i ming // 'di nu shi bA ra tsuM sA nu shing grol a nang shu ma ta kaSh+NI lA// mung+ga ri lo ma mut+sa hi te yang // par+N+Na ha~M gu l-I
22b1(mngon brjod): sing+ge ban+d+ha ki duSh+Ta ha ra shai NI/ na ku li dang ro zhim dang // rA sna dri bzangs neb le dri// na gu la 'dod sbrul mig pa// gdugs can dang ni legs par 'bab// rnam 'joms dri dang ar+d+ha ma ti dang // sha la'i mdab dang gnas dang bstan// ras bal rgya
22b2(mngon brjod): mtsho'i mtha'i can dang / kar s+yai si da ba dwe re/ ras bal rgod dang sna ban+ta// ro can drang srong khyu mchog go/ gA ge ru krI klu yi stobs// ri ShA hA sA ga dwe d+hA kA/ d+hA sAr+m+ma ba sgra ldan yin// ma hA dza li me tog ser// dz+yod sI pa Ti li kA dzA lI// klu yi 'khri
22b3(mngon brjod): nyid kyang ngo // de nas gnyis skyes twA ret+ta/ re Nuka dang kon tI de// dper smra ni bral ba rjo // a lA hUM wAgi sa y-i// dI byA nga sa he ba y-i/ Sh+ku/ rnyed nas ni// ba lang yang su m+bu/ kAN+Da kA du shul ma// ngaM bi rab dri
22b4(mngon brjod): dIdri mye// kle shAm bu yi mang can no// kA lA buM sa rI ya bri d+hA/ 'i ma tog dkor zhe ba ni tu// shai la ya ta li lo ma daM d+hA gan+d+ha/ ku traM mu rA gan+d+ha nAM/ glang tshun zas dang lags 'bab dang // dri bzangs ro ljo ni ma ha hU~M de ni tsa// me 'bar dang ni d+hi
22b5(mngon brjod): k+ShI d+hA ta k+Shi dang mA ma'i me tog/ kaM ka la dang zla stobs dang // i lA nIn+da Ti mang po// de nas su smra la u pa ku ha tsaM// kiN+yait+ka ra gi thum po gas pa// D+hu Ti ras+yA d+hAkASh+Ta pA ra d+hA byA// b+hu b+hA bA kA la ra sa r+d+ha'o// dung cen kun mo'i me tog yin/
22b6(mngon brjod): skra ca ne// de nas bi tun+ta ka dz+nyA Ta ma lA// adz+dza Ta tA lI shi bA tA ma la kI ti tsa// pra pauN+Di rI kaM paN+Da r+ya// de nas tun+na ku bai ra kA/ ku Ni ka ts+tsha kAn+na la ka/ dga' ba'i shing // de nas srin mo gtum mo nor 'phrog k+She ma du pu tr-i tshogs pa bzod// sbrul
23a1(mngon brjod): gyi mtshon dang stag sen dang // ka ra dzaM dang 'khor lo byed// sbubs can byi ru 'khri shing phug ron rkang // d+ha ma n+ya dang dza na ke shI/ ha nu ha Da bi la sI ni/ shug+ni shI kha khur ko lA da laM// sen mo de nas a Ta kI kak+Shi mri m+b+ha ba ri kA/ mri tA la ka
23a2(mngon brjod): yul ba rangs rnams su skye ba// li ga dur dang twe sha bur nags skyes pa ri be la baM/ bla ba gau bu 'go nar dang // kye ba ra musta kA ni tsa// tsa ba tshogs 'dabi shu kaM bad+hi'i me tog/ spr-i Ne ya kuk+ku re/ ma ru nA lA bi shu nA pr-ik+ka lha mo'i 'a khri shing // la g+hu rgya mtsho
23a3(mngon brjod): mthar thug pa d+hA ko Ta baR+ShA la kA pi ke yang ngo // dka' thub can mo ral can ma// spang spos spu can mi shI/ lpags pa'i lo ma sut+tA Ta b+hing+ga lpags pa ro tsa yan lag mchog/ kar+dz+dza ra ko dwe bi Da ka/ kAl+la ka dang rig byed sdong // a sha d+ho rigs tsam yin rA
23a4(mngon brjod): dzA tau nI kun la sman// shA kA khyaM dang lo ma me tog sogs taN+Du li yod chung ba 'phags pa bri shra ma l+ya dang me'i rtse// mtha' mad 'bras bu brgya byin me tog/ rik+Sha'i dri can ts+tsha ga lAn+tu bi gI rgan 'joms dzu ga/ tshangs me nya mig na tshod gnas// zla ba'i
23a5(mngon brjod): 'khri shing lo ma gsal dang gser ldan dang // gser gyi Do ma hi mA pA tI/ rta 'jug kraM pau dzI/ sran ma'i lo ma bzod po che// tur+Ne ke ri 'bras bu dmar// ki bi ka dang paM lu par N+ya yang ngo // mthong ba bong bu mye tog a dzu gan+d+hi ka/ e la'i lo ma legs
23a6(mngon brjod): 'bab / ra sna yug ta ra sA/ tsA ge rI dang tsu kri ka/ so rtse med dang sbyar mo stong 'a bigs tsu kro skyur mo brgya 'bigs kyang ngo // na ma skA ri gAN+Da kA li// yan mnyam sang ldeng kyang ngo // 'tsho byed dzA ba nI dzI pA/ dzI ba ni yA ma mngar mo yang ngo // ku rba
23b1(mngon brjod): krIng+ga mA d+hA // ra tsan sus rAng d+h+r-i d+hA kA/ kir+yA d+h+r-i ga ta sa smr-iH// a na ya tik+Sh+Na de nas sar+b+bA dri myad mA ta la b+hA ri h+ye wA kam gyos// pU sa lI kA Ta rlon chod gnas de nas ma dz+wal ka ni ku d+hA so ldan b+he t+yai k+She NA u du skAr lo ma// ra dga' lo ma drug
23b2(mngon brjod): bo'i dri// br-i tu dar+N+Na ya mA ni ka/ mA le po ShAM karba sha ma ri// kha che skyes dang pad+ma'i 'dab// pau Sha ka re/ a byA thA ti tsa ra pad+ma bAD+haM/ pad+ma bA rAM Ni/ 'dar byed rtsu ba mo zla ba dang // yan lag dmer dang mdzes ldan kyang // pra bun+na DA ste Da'i gling //
23b3(mngon brjod): dadrug g+hA tsakra marda ke/ pad+mA d+hA u rau nA khyA/ ma mo dang ni rge'u dang // de naso sman chenani sgrog skye dang // sgog pa au ri Sha Ta chen// r-i gi cig pa'o// pu narna bau sho thaMg+ni/ bi tur+Na su ni Shan+da ke/ bA tA ka dang bsil ba tsa ne// gzhan gyis mi thub a
23b4(mngon brjod): sha na'i lo ma dang // yA rI ba tA g+h+r-i kau TaM b+hI yi NA dang 'od kyi blo gros 'khri shing / bAR+Shi ka tra pa mA NA tA yan+ti stobs bzang bISha ka se na dga' byed gri Sha Ti bI rA hI bai da re yang d+ho// mArge ba dang b+h+r-i ga rA dzA// kA ka mA tsi bo gan no// me tog brgya pa
23b5(mngon brjod): gdugs dkar dang // gdugs bzang mngar mo mi si'o// dzI ra nag po kA ra bI// sa ra Na dang rab tu berkyang // de yi ka TaM b+ha ra dang // rgyal po stobs dang stobs bzang dang // dza nA dza tA ka ra dzA nI// dza tu byed dang 'khor los sgyur// reg bya bzang
23b6(mngon brjod): de ni sa sha n+de dri rtsa ba// tshigs drug pa dang ka n+dur// bi ba la shI yang ngo // kA ra bal+la ka Shi lpa ka/ su shaM bI dang de nas ni// rig ldan pa To lai ti ka dang // gsal kun+mA NAM ka pe ta si// ge gan karka TaM mo// ku ba kha mo ka ts+yai tu rI// ku ba la
24a1(mngon brjod): bu gnyis po mtshungs// ri mo can dang ba la mig/ go dum+ma dang bI shA ya// tIn bA ru Ni/ arlo g+ha sU ra Na// gan+do ga n+ti rA ni bra bo rgod// ka laM b+hu di ka dang // mo min rtsa ba hi la mo tsi kA/ sne'u lo ma'i dbye ba yin// duza dang ra ni tshigs pa
24a2(mngon brjod): brgya// stong ldan brtson 'grus b+hArga byaM// ru ha da ni mtha' med do// de nas sA si ta glang bu skyes brgya ldan brtson 'grus// gaN+Da lI byaM yi mig/ ku ru bin dang sprin gyi ming // mu sta mon lug mo min naM// min lug bzang po gun dra'o// tsu lA lA dang 'khor
24a3(mngon brjod): lo skyed pa/ 'od ma lpags pa'i snying po dang // las shing shun pa mkhregs pa dang // rtswa yi rgyal mtshan tshigs pa brgya// nas kyi 'bras bu smug rgod 'od// gling shing spyan can sbubs ldan dang // smyug ma dang ni rlung 'bud cen// 'dud pa tshigs pa
24a4(mngon brjod): da pa ni mtshams// smyug ma mdangs ldan mda' skyug go// 'dam bu na DA po Da ya ga/ de nas kA sha ma sti yAM// bur shing dri dang po Ta ga la// pho/ mang po'i tshig la ba lA dzA/ ro ldan dang ni bur shing ngo // de yi dbye ba puN+Da dang // kIn+ta ra ka la
24a5(mngon brjod): sogs pa'o// rtswa bI ri Na Da bIrta raM// rtsa ba'i u pI ra mo yin no// 'jigs med na la daM dang ni// sa bya ma mr-i NA lany+dza lA shA yaM// lo mA dzA kaM la g+hA la// sa pa dA ha iSh+Ta kA pa the// 'dam bu la sogs rtswa rnams ni// gar+m+mats+tsha tra pA la g+hA/ rtswa ya phreng ba
24a6(mngon brjod): sa ya r+d+haH/ shaSh+yA rtsa ni gzhon nu'o// g+hA sa nas can sdong dang D+ha// rtswa rnams tshigs pa tri NA'o// na d+yA 'odam bu'i tshogs pa'o// rtsa yi rgyal zhes tA la'o// nI ri ka ra ge shol ldan no// g+ho Na Ta pA sha kram+ba ko/ gu bA ka dang Tha pra ro// 2 bras bu mud+d+ha
24b1(mngon brjod): g+ha 'di ni// tsa hIn ta lA bcas pa gsum// kha rdza ra dang ke tA kA tA lI khardzu rI ni rtsa yi sdong // nags dang sman gyi sde'o// / seng ge gdong lnga ri dgas dbang // ral can 'phrog byed ha phyi mig/ stag dang gung dang dri snom dang // dred dang
24b2(mngon brjod): ri dgas za byed do// rdo yi sna can phag pa dang // sgra ldan ko la po tri dang // sa ba rka sa rlong mche ba can// sna ring spu langs ko Ta dang // sa rlog ces pa nyid kyang ngo // spre'u sgrag mchod mchod byed dang // yal ga'i ri dogs ga/ nyer ma'i gdong //
24b3(mngon brjod): ma rgA Ta dang mi 'dra dang / kI sho dang ni nags gnas so// de nas dom dang b+ha la ka/ kats+tsha b+hA l+la dom mo// gaN ba se dang khang+gi ni// chur 'dres sa nyal rta yi dgra/ ma he dang ni sa ri b+ha// mo ni zhi ba sa la rgyu// lce spyang ma rungs ri dgas shri gA la//
24b4(mngon brjod): g.yon can kro Sha Nu re ru dang // ngan g.yo ba dang dzam+bu ka/ zhum bu byi la khrus mkhan dang // bye ba gsod dang byi ba'i zas// gsum po dbyig gau d+ha ra// go d+he ya dang bdag skyes so// gzugs mo dzu thur ShA l+ya'o// de yi sU ni sha la lI// she lI
24b5(mngon brjod): laM dang sha la'o// bA ta pra mI rna ba'o// 'phar ba nags gnas khyi ri dwags gsod// ri dgas sa lus rlung gi srog/ khri sAn+sa skye sa? gnas so// gzhung nag khri snyan sa lde'o// ru ru kha sha raM ku/ saM ba ra ro hi Shu// ba lang rna puM Sh+wa ti e na sh+tsa ro hra
24b6(mngon brjod): g.yag ra dgas dri za she ra b+ha raM/ su ma ra ba men ri bong 'di sogs ri dgas dbang po sogs// gling sogs phyugs kyi rigs sogs rnams// byi ba rkun po 'bags byed dang // ri byi bye ba gzhon na dang // rtsangs pa kr-i ka lA sha'o// de
25a1(mngon brjod): nas tshangs phran khyim gyi rtsangs// sdom ni mo dang thags mkhan dang // ur+Na na b+ha mar+k+ka Ta ka mnyam gol go dang // rna ba'i chu skyes rkang brgya gnyis// rta shig pa dang shUka k+ki Ta// ci sbur du Nau pri sh+tse ka/ phug ron dag mnyan ka po ta// de nas
25a2(mngon brjod): ri bong za dang khra// rna ring bya rog dgra dang 'ug/ go go g.yag dang srin bu dang // byA g+ha Ta dang b+ha ra d+ha dza// khany+dza rI Ta khany+dza na// rgyab dmar dang nai kang+ka yin// de nas tsa Sha ka kI di bi// ka li kiM b+ha ga d+hA s+yA DA// de nas s+yA ts+tsha b+ha ta pa tra ka/ dArbA g+ha Ta/ de nas khug rta
25a3(mngon brjod): chu nyung dang // tsA ta ka dang mtshungs so// khyim bya dang ni zangs ze can// kuk+ka Te'i sgra sgrogs pa dang rkang pa'i mtshon// mchil pa la bing+ga dang // de yi chung ma tsi Ta ka/ de dag bu ni sA Ta kai ra// gzhi ni gyis mtsho dang gtor ma thA// bu mo tse Ta kaM ba ti// kar+k+ka re
25a4(mngon brjod): smyon bya'o// sreg pa kra ka r-i dag ma tshungs// nags n+ya bde dang khu byug dang // kau kau lA dang si ka yang // kA ka khra ta 'chi ba med// gtor mi'i mchog ldan lan cig skye// sgra ldan sgrogs pa'i bdag nyid can// bya rog nyid kyang ngo // pho rog dang ni
25a5(mngon brjod): ko lau// dA t+yA ha dang mgrin nag po// 'ol pa dang ni tsi la// bya rgod dang ni gri d+haM'o// nai tse kun 'gro mtshungs pa'o// khrung khrung dang ni krony+dza'o// de nas bya dka re kaM ka'o// bya khyud dmar po sA ra sa// dur pa 'khor lo tsikra bAka/ gnyis po shing rta'i ming
25a6(mngon brjod): can no// chu skyar ka la haM yin no// ut+pA sha kuraR+Sha mtshungs// ngang pa bya khyud dkar po dang // 'khor lo'i yan lag ma la dros gnas// ngang pa'i rgyal mo mtshungs rkang dmar// ngang pa dkar po ma la naM dang phrang 'dzin zhes// yul 'dzin dang ni dang smra'o//
25b1(mngon brjod): sha rA ri bA Ta ra Di// bal+la kA dang pad zlum mgrin// dad pa'i chung ma ba ra Ta// mtsho dang mtshan nyid dang ldan lo// pa wang lpags pa'i 'dab ma can// pa roSh+Ti dang te la bA yi kA/ lci sbur sngon po ma k+Shi k+Sha/ sbrang ma dang ni sbrang rtsi skyes// drog mag put+ti kA yin no// !
25b2(mngon brjod): sbrang nags kyi sbrang ma dang // za byed de'i rigs ra l+ya yin// ga no ba lI ba re Ta gnyis// tshad 'bru b+hi gA ri dang ni// tsirti dz+hi l+li ka dang mtshungs 'di rnams// pa tang+ka mtshungs phyi ma ldepa// sprin bu me khyer na mkha'i 'od// sbrang 'gro sbrang byed ma d+ha l-i// sbrang rtsi skyong
25b3(mngon brjod): dang ra yig gnyis// me tog 'thung dang bung ba dang // rkang pa drug dang b+h+ra ma rA// sa 'gro rma bya mdongs ldan dang // mgrin mangs dang ni lag 'gro tha// gtsug phud can dang rtse mo can// ka kI dang ni 'brug sgra'i gar// skrag pa yang ngo // kau kA bA NI rma bya'i sgra// mtshung
25b4(mngon brjod): pa zla gam rma bya'i mdongs// gtsug pud rtse mo mdongs dang / ni// 'jug ma'i sgo dang ma ning ngo // mkha' 'gro mkhar rgyu bi ha ga/ mkha' spyod baM hI ya sa dang ni// bya dang gshog ldan nus ldan dang // sha kun+ta dang sha ku na// gnyis skyes 'dab ldan sgo can dang //
25b5(mngon brjod): pa ta ga dang pa ta ta// 'dab ma'i shing rta sgo nga skyes// 'gro med la gnas srin bu za// ban+ti ra dang lo ma gsum// nI Do b+ha bA 'dab ldan dang // paM ts+tsha na ta mkha' la spyod// de rnams bye brag ljang khA dang // ma gu kA raN+Da ba sla bau// sreg pa ku ku b+h+yo lA po//
25b6(mngon brjod): shang shang tsa ko ra tsa// ko ya Sha To gaSh+NI Ti b+ha gau/ brka brti ka la sogs pa'o// bya spu gshog pa sgo dang ni// 'gebs byed lo ma lus skyes so// mo ni dpung pa gshog rtsa'o// mchu dang gdong pa gnyis mo'o// gyon du 'phur dang thur du 'phur// thad 'phur de
26a1(mngon brjod): rnams mkha' la byed// sbubs dang mdzod dang sgo nga'o// bya tshAd nI Da mo min no// phru gu bu tsha ar+d+ha ka/ bu phrug dang ni pri thu ka/ gsar skyes shi shu zhes bya'o// pho mo 'dus dang 'khrig pa dang // gnyis gnyis zung dang dor yu gam// tshogs la
26a2(mngon brjod): 'dus pa phung po dang // san+do ha dong bi sa ra// tshogs pa 'phungs pa dang mi 'dus Ni ka ra dang pr-i te tsA ru// yang dge 'dus// legs bsags ma sa mr-i dA ya'o// sa ma da yaM sa ma bA ya// bsags pa dang ni ga Na mo// saM ha ti dang brin dang ngo // ni
26a3(mngon brjod): ku ru ma baM kad+tha kaM/ de rnams thams cad tshogs pa'i rnam grangs so// tshogs pa'i dbye ba sde mtshan mtshungs// dge 'dun lhan cig skye bo 'dus// de yi rigs dang mtshungs pa dang // dud 'gro khyu dang tshan pa ste// skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo // dud 'gro
26a4(mngon brjod): 'gro rnams kyi mtshungs pa'o// gzhan rnams kyi sa mA dza// chos mtshungs rnams l-i ni kA ya// phung po spungs pa byur bu dang // brtsegs pa mo min no// pug ron khya dang nai tso'i khyu// de la sogs pa tshogs pa'o// khyim chags bya dang ri dgas
26a5(mngon brjod): rnams/ !sh+tsa ka dang khyim gnas so// seng ge la sogs pa'i sde mtshan no// // mi dang yid skyes ma nu'i bu// shes ldan yid ldan na rA'o// skyes bu lnga skyes pu ru ShA// skyes pa ni na ra'o// bud med btsun mo stobs med dang // sbyor
26a6(mngon brjod): byed mi mo mtshams ldan ma// 'ching byed zur lta g.yon ma dang // g.yo byed dga' ba'i sa gzhi'o// bye brag yan lag mchog ldan ma// 'jigs can 'dod ma ga yon mig ma// rab mos sgeg pa yid 'ong ma// shin tu sems dang legs
26b1(mngon brjod): ma dang // dga' ba dga' byed 'khro byed ma// de bzhin du ni b+h+ra mi ni// rab skyes ma dang glud chen 'gros// mchog ldan ma dang kha dog mchog/ dbang bskur byas dang ma ti hrI// longs spyod gzhan la rgyal po'i btsun// bag gsar lag na 'dzin pa dang //
26b2(mngon brjod): gnyis pa dang ni tshogs bcas la// 'gegs byed skyed byed ma dang ni/ tshig mang po ste dA ra'o// gnyen 'dun ma dang khyim 'dzin dang // legs spyod ma dang bden ma dang // mdzes ma bdag po yi brtul zhugs// gnyen byas khyim gsar bag gsar
26b3(mngon brjod): dang / rigs ldan ma dang rigs skyong ma// gzhon nu mo dang na chung ma// chung ngu gos med phyes 'gyur ba// ba ra ma rdul ni mthong ba dang // lang tshom dang dar ma mtshungs// mtshungs pa'i bu chung mna' ma dang // khyim pa mo dang khyim gnas ma// 'dod ldan
26b4(mngon brjod): ma dang chags can ma// 'phyon ma dang ni// g.yam maM dang // dpon 'gro dus byas shar mor 'gro/ 'khrul byed chags byed 'ching byed ma// chags can ma rigs myur ma// 'dod 'gro dang ni sdig can ma// bud med mo sham a bi nA// mo sham bu ni gcig
