26b5(mngon brjod): skyes maH/ dga' byed ma dang rnam byed mtshungs// zla mo grogs mo na mnyam mo// bdag cag khyo dang bcas po'o// mgo skyo ma dang rgon mo dang // shes rab ma dang mkhas mang dang // shes ldan ma dang blo ldan ma// dmangs mo dmangs rigs chung ma yin//
26b6(mngon brjod): dmangs dang de yi rigs kyang ngo // dmangs rigs chen mo A b+hi rI// rigs dang skye sbyor mtshungs pa'o// 'phags pa'i chung ma rje rigs chung // rgyal rigs chung ma rjes rgyal rigs mo// mkhan po'i chung ma'ang mkhan mo dang // slob dpon
27a1(mngon brjod): chung ma pi tsa swa ta// slob dpon ma ni skyes bu sbyor// 'phags ma dang ni rgyal rigs ma// mkhan po chung ma mkhan mo dang // po Ta po ma'i mtshan nyid do// dpa' bo'i chung ma dpa' chung ma// dpa' bo'i ma ni dpa' skyes ma// bu skyes pa
27a2(mngon brjod): dang rab skyes dang // rab tu btsas dang rab tu 'khrungs// bud med gcer bu gos med yin// pho nya mo dang kun spyod ma tshungs// kA t+yA yA nI dar yol ma// dur smri ga gos dang ldan pa'o// tha ga pha rol khyim sdod dang // rang dbang bzo yi las byed do// blon mo
27a3(mngon brjod): rgan min btsun mo yin// phrin skyel po brang spong ma'o// ri mo can dang tshogs can ma// smad 'tshong ma dang gzugs 'tshong me// de nis de yi gtso mo ni// ri mo byed pa'i gtso mo'o// dza ma can dang kha lo mtshungs// mo ma mig mthong lha shes pa// de nas
27a4(mngon brjod): rdul dang ldan pa dang // bud med chos ldan rgod nad can// khrag dang phreng ba me tog dang // dus ldan ma dang zla mtshan can// rdul dang me tog zla mtshan no// phru gu chags dang mig blo langs// zla mtshan sangs dang nad med ma// mngal chags ma dang snum
27a5(mngon brjod): mi dang // bu che me dang lus mi bde// cho gas can ma sogs tshogs rnams dang // sbrum ma gzhon nu ma tshogs rnams// slar thung bye ma gnyis grags ma// de la sogs pa bye ma'o// bdag po gnyis skyes dang po daM d+hi Sha// na mnyam ku Tu ma bi na
27a6(mngon brjod): gzhon nu ma skyes ko nA na// bu/ skal bzang bu ni skal ldan no// pha rol bud med la sa skyes ni// nal phrug go// pa rnams la rten pa la gnas// pa yi bu dang skyes pa'o// ma rnams la rten de bzhin no// mi mthun ma dang mi mdza' skyes// de nasa'i'aphyon
27b1(mngon brjod): ma'i bu dang ni// nal phrug rigs nyams skyes pa dang // rigs 'chol dang ni byi phrug go// slongs mos 'tsho zhing skyes pa la// de ni kau la Ti ne ya 'di// rigs bsgyur dang ni bdag skyes so// bdag skyes bde 'phel bu dang ni// khye'u dang ni ngan 'gro so// 'di
27b2(mngon brjod): rnams mo'o// bu mo phen/ byed thams cad ma// bu phrug pu tshwa mtshungs pa'o// rang skyes ltos byung mA smad do// yab dang skyed byed pa dang ni// yum dang 'byung byed skyed byed ma// bu pho dang ni a tse'o// bdag po'i srid po gnyid mo dang // pa tA rA tsha 'o
27b3(mngon brjod): tshe lug pu bdag skyes// rlung mo sring mo sde mtshan b+h+yo// mai ta ra~M ni srang mi du phan tshun du// pra rdi ba rminong po'i rlung ma mA tA // / mAM ni stug mo dang / myos po zhes pa pa'i yin no// pa yi kun dang A / oM sbya
27b4(mngon brjod): dang zhang po'o// sh+tsa lA chung mA bI spun zla'o// bdag po'i spun tshad da ba rau// swa shra ya ni sring mo'i bu// dzA mA tA ni bu mo'i khyo// bas mchod pa yi pha dang mes// da yi pha dang yang mas po// phyi mo dang ni yang phyi mo// mtshal ma cha pa dang rigs rgyud do// skye
27b5(mngon brjod): gnas mtshu nges dang ming sring dang // tshang ya lhan cig skyes rnams mtshungs// de yi rigs dang 'dri la pA dang // ny-i du rtsa lag rang rag dang // gnyen 'dab rnams ni mtshungs pa'o// bdag giganyen dang nyo 'brel te/ de rnams kau
27b6(mngon brjod): tshag/ sa pa'o// rab tu cha byed dga' byed dang // bdag po 'gegs byed rtsa lag byed// khyo bo rnams ni mtshungs po'o// khyom shi yi rtsa lag skyes// kuN+Do shi gso ga la ka/ sring mo 'um mo las skyes dang // spur zla sring mo
28a1(mngon brjod): gnyis ka'o// pha ma dag ni pi ta rau// pha ma dag go// gyos skyug dag ni shra shur ro// bu dang bu mo lu tro'o// bza' mi khyim thab khyo shug dang // chung ma kho bo de dag go/ bu rogs sha ma khru ma'o// kyil tsa sus rgya sa rba hA kA 'grupa /
28a2(mngon brjod): bab yin skyes pa'i zu bskyes du'o/ mang la dang rum dang 'di rnams mtshungs// gsum po'i rang bzhin za ma dang // ma ning po ma ning dang ni// byis pa bu tshe phru gu'o// der me lang che shed ldan mtshungs// gnas brten dang na rgan pa dang // rgan po'i tshogs
28a3(mngon brjod): pa rga ne rims so// smin dang na tshod yol ba dang // skra la sogs pa dkar po'o// rgas pa dang ni 'khogs pa'o// bcas ma thag pa skyes ma thag/ zho 'thung dang ni nu ma 'dzin// byis pa dang ni shed ma bya// gzhon nu na chung shar ba dang // sgang yol
28a4(mngon brjod): gnas brtan bri d+ha dang // rnyings dang 'khongs dang rgas pa'o// lo ldan bcu pa rgan ches pa// sngon skyes phu bo dang por skyes// phyis skyes nu bo gzhon shos dang // rting skyes rjes su skyes bya'o// sha mang nyams chung rid pa dang // stobs ldan
28a5(mngon brjod): mchog ldan yan lag rgyas// gsus po che dang lto 'phyang dang // lte ldir rked sgom gsus rdzing can// sna nyeg dang ni sgo nyag dang // nyag po dang ni sna gong med// skra bzangs skra can skra lo can// gnyer gdong skogs gdong mtshungs pa'o//
28a6(mngon brjod): yan lag ma tshang yan lag nyams// mi thung bongs chung mi'u thung // sna smyung dang ni sna rings so// sna bcad pa dang sna brags pa// rmig pa'i sna dang smig sna can// gom rlabs can deng rab 'gro pus// sgyid 'khris dang ni pus mo 'byar// yas
28b1(mngon brjod): 'jog dang ni pus mo 'degs// rna ba 'on dang rna mi gsang // sgur po dang ni rgyab sgur ro// lag sdum lag sor sdum po dang // mi chung lus bro chud pa dang // zha bo dang ni grum po dang // skra med dang ni mgo rdum dang // mig yo ba dang gle bo dang //
28b2(mngon brjod): theng po dang ni gyol ba'o// 'khogs pa man chad gsum yin no// sha khrag nag bo sha mtshan can// smai ba dang ni nag thag can// nad gtsong med dang nad bu med// gi so spyad sman gyi bya ba'o// rtswa dang sman dang b+he Sha dz+ha// nad sel 'tsho byed
28b3(mngon brjod): ces kyang ngo // mo/ nad can khams mi bde ba dang // nyam mi bde ba dang tsha ba dang // na tsha dang ni mnar ba dang // khong nad skyem nad gcong can no// rkan skam dang ni sna skam mo// sbrid pa k+Sha ta sbrid nad do// glo dang lud pa skyigs bu'o//
28b4(mngon brjod): skrags 'bur nag 'bur sbyangs pa'o// rkang 'bras dang ni phol mig go/ sha khra dang ni shu ba'o// g.yan pa bA ma rkang shu dang // khyi rdo za 'khrug rdo shu dang // 'brum bu dang ni phol mig gsum// rmi ni mo men rmas pa ni// ma ning rtsa yi rma ni pho//
28b5(mngon brjod): shu ba'i nad dang dkyil 'khor tsan// madz+re nad dang ni sha khra dang // dur nA ma kAR+ShA si// chu 'gags pa dang chu nad dang // zos len dang khar me 'ong nad// skyugs pa zas ldog skyug nad dang / skyes bu skyug pa mtshungs pa'o// nad kyi dbye bas
28b6(mngon brjod): bi dr-i d+hi/ mo/ rims dang chu srin tshan par rdol// rde nad chu sri'i nad dang ni// khu ba'i sngon rnams rtags gsum mo// nad sel nad sel sman pa dang // 'tsho byed dang ni ga so dpyad mkhan// 'tsho ba'i bar bsten kalpa'o// nad sos
29a1(mngon brjod): pa dang nad kyis btang // nad pa nad can gdung bas gzir// zug rngu can dang byA d+haM dang // mi gsal ba dang sdug bsngal can// bro 'tshal ba dang mtha' mnyam dang // me dpal dang ni skyug shu'o// 'brum bu rgong po rdo dang ni// 'brum
29a2(mngon brjod): nad yug to ar+Ya sa// rlung dang rlung gi nad can no// 'khru skyug deng ni sgyu gzer ro// mig tshag cheg po mig nad can// pi l+la kr-in+na tshag po 'di yang // smyon pa dang ni dran nyams so// bad kan bad nad ka pai'o// lde chen lce 'bur lte mthon no//
29a3(mngon brjod): sha khrag dang ni me dpal lo// long ba dang ni mdongs pa dang // brgya la dang dran nyams myos pa'o// khu ba zla ba thig la dang // sa bon stobs ldan dbang por 'gro/ ma yu dang ni mkhris pa'o// ka pa dang ni bad kan no// mo/ lpags pa dang ni
29a4(mngon brjod): khrag 'dzin no// cha shas sha dang mAM saM dang // krams dang kra bya A maM Sha// sha skam shuny+tsau mAM sa dang // bskam sa nyid ni gsum gyi rtags// khyab gnas mi ltung khrag dang ni// dmar dang rma skyes rgyun ldan dang // snying dang skyes bu hI da ya dang
29a5(mngon brjod): semasaT/ tshil dang zhag dang snum bag go/ ma grin pa'i phyi rtsi ltag chu ba// bA DI rtsa ni 'beb ldan no// ti la skaM nI glo ba'o// klad pa dang na kr-id rgyas so// sgyu ma'i rdzas dang dri ma'o// mo mi ni rgyu ma dang ni pu rI ta// mtshon pa dang ni prI ha pheM//
29a6(mngon brjod): de na sa chu ba rgyas pa mo// ma cher ba yang krita mtshungs 'di dag/ kha tshu mtshal ma lA lA dang // mig nad mig gi dri ma'o// dri chu dang ni ga/ ci ba'o// 'bab ldan khyab ldan dri ma dang // bshang ba phyi sa gu tha dang // lto snying dri ma bi ShA tha mo//
29b1(mngon brjod): thod pa dang ni ka pu la// mo min/ rus pa gdung dang g.yo byed do// lus kun rus pa kaM kA la// sgal rus ka she ru kA'o// spyi bo'i rus pa ka ro Ti// mo/ rtsims legs rus pa rtsib la'o// yan lag dang ni pri ti ka/ cha shas dang ni tshogs
29b2(mngon brjod): pa min// de nas tshogs pa lus dang 'das// phung po thos byed gzugs pa dang // rnam 'dzin sku dang khyab pa dang // ma ning dang ni skyes bu'o// ma~M ni murti ta nu gzugs// rkang pa'i mdun dang brang ba'i phyogs// 'gro byed dang ni rkang pa dang /
29b3(mngon brjod): skyospyod par byed pa mo min no// de yI mdun sa long dang tshig/ rje ngar dang ni ngar gdong dang // pus mo baR+Ya 'og tshig pa dang // ras cho zhes pa mo min no// nus ldan ma ning skyes bu brla// de yi migs ni dpau yin no// bash+yang lam rku ba dang 'og
29b4(mngon brjod): sgo'o// 'odams ni lte 'og gnyis dag go// tshwang ra dang ni 'phongs nyid dang // 'phongs dang sho Ni ka kud+ba tI// bud med rnams kyi 'phongs kyi ni// phyi ma yI che ni tam po// ma ning dza g+ha naM mdun cha// kA pa kiM tu ni tAmyAsl-i// gnyis dman ku
29b5(mngon brjod): kun+da re'o// mo ni rkub chos nyid dang ni// ka TA pro thA/ mo mtshan mchad par 'gyur ba'o// b+ha ga skye gnas gnyis dag gi/ rlig pa spro ba ma na nA kro Da lag pa'i bar// brang dang nang choms byang khrig stong // phrag pa dang ni lag mgo dang // dpung pa
29b6(mngon brjod): rnams ni mo min no// de yi mtshams ni dzi drA NAM// lag rtsa gnyis po mtshan khung ngo // rtsi bo logs mo min de dag 'og/ dbus dang rked pa bar ma ni// mo min gnyis po'i pha rol gnyis// spyod byed 'bab byed 'jug byed lag/ ba
30a1(mngon brjod): tshogs dang ni gru ma'o// de yi steng du bar lha yin// lag ngar de yi 'og tu'o// 'khrig ma lag pa'i mthe chung par// ka ra b+ho dang lag gzhag go// byed po lag pa yal ga lnga// sdigs 'dzub rab tu ston byed do// sor mo lag pa'i
30a2(mngon brjod): yal ga'o// skyes bu the bong ston byed dang // gung mo ming mdo mthe chung rim// yang srid can dang lag skyes dang // gcod byed sen mo mo yin no// rabya ston mthong dang ba la sna// 'dzub mo la sogs rnams la'o// mthe bong mthe chung mtho la ni//
30a3(mngon brjod): sor mo bcu gnyis lag mthil dag/ thal mo thal lcag pra ta la// lag mthil ser mo brkyang ba'o// de gnyis tshogs pa ya ha ta la// pra ta l-i ni g.yon dang g.yas// lag pa cung bskum khyer ba'o// de dag sbyar ba snyim pa skyes// lag
30a4(mngon brjod): ngar lag brkyang khru yin no// khu tshur bcangs pa btsag khru'o// a rad ni ni mthe chung brkyang // de yi khru'o khu tshur bcangs// mdom ni dpung pa lag par bcas// de dag breng la brkyang ba'o// steng du lag pa brgyangs pa ni// mI gang lag
30a5(mngon brjod): bcas sgyus bu gsum// o la mdud pa dang mgrin pa dang // de nas mgo stegs mgo 'dzin ste// kam bu 'grin pa ri mo gsum// lhag pa ltag khung ltag chu ba// smra byed za byed gsung byed dang // kha dang zhal dang smra ba'i sgo// ma ning sna dang
30a6(mngon brjod): dri 'bab dang // snom byed shangs dang nA sI ka/ ye mchu ma mchu zhal g.yogs dang // gcod byed kyi ni sgo zhes bya// de yi 'og tu kos ko'o// 'khur chos dang nau ka po la// de yi pha rol zla 'gram pa// ldang byed gcod byed snyim
30b1(mngon brjod): byed so/ tAtA lu zhes pa rkan yin no// ro shes ro myang lce yin no// mchu yi mtha' ma kha yi grwa/ dpral ba rgyan gnas mig 'dzin dang // mig steng smin ma dag ni mo// kAr tsam sman dbus mo min no// mig 'bras spyan 'bras hA ra ka/ lta byed
30b2(mngon brjod): mog dang 'dren byed dang // mthong byed spyan dang tsak+Shu dang // gzigs byed dr-i dang Ti zhes pa'o// mchi ma mig chu dus 'byung dang // A sra dang ni mchi ma'o// a pa go nI mi mthi' dag/ zur mIg dang ni yon por lta// rna ba sgra 'dzin skyes bu dang //
30b3(mngon brjod): mo ni thos byed nyon byed snyan// yon lag mchog dang mgo bo dang // dobu dang steng dang mas+t+ra ka/ mo min// slar ske 'khyil ba skra dang ni// ral pa ke sha mgo skyes dang // tshogs pa skra ldan ka shi ka/ rgyan dang ska lo 'khyil pa dang // de rnams dpral
30b4(mngon brjod): ba'i bung pa dang // bya rog gshog dang gtsug bud can// skra bcings skra yi thor tshugs dang // de nas me tog bcings pa dang // sAM ya tA ka tsa me tog bcings// thor tshugs gtsug pud skra bcings so// brtul zhugasu ral pa sa Ta'o// lan bu
30b5(mngon brjod): skra lan skra lhas mo// ral pa ka tse bi Sha de// pa Sha bak+Sha hasta dang // kalpaR+She de rnams ni// ka tsa'i pha rol skra tshogs yin// lus skyes bu dang ba spu'o// de rgan sma ra kha la'o// mdzes bcos rgyan bcings ne paM byaM// so yi bzo dang mdzes par
30b6(mngon brjod): byes// bcu po gsum yin rgyan byed dang // mdzes ches mkhan dang chas mkhan no// mdzes byas brgyan byas bkod cing spras// gsal byed mthong byed snang byed do// rgyan gyi bya ba brgyan bya la// rgyan dang chas dang legs byed dang /
31a1(mngon brjod): rnam rgyan sa dang maN+Da naM// de nas u dbu rgyan cod pan ni// skyes bu dang ni ma ning ngo // gtsug gi nor bu spyi bo'i rin chen dang // ta ra la ni do shal dbus// sgra yi thag pa pA ri ta thA// phud s+thA dang ni dpral ba'i rgyan// rna rgyangs tA la'i
31a2(mngon brjod): lo ma yin// kur+g+ha lam ni rna ba'i rgyan// mgul 'ching dang ni ske'i rgyan no// 'phyong 'phrul dang ni do shal lo// prA lAM ni ka gsar do shal// brang gi do shal mu tig spras// dro shel mu tig phreng ba dang // lha yi do shal bkod pa ni// khris ma brgya dang
31a3(mngon brjod): ldan pa dang // do shal dbye dang khris dbye bas// drug cu rtsa gnyis gAta shA'o// nyi shu rtse bzhi gu ta shA byed// pa yi nu ma bzhi yin no// sum cu rtsa gnyis nyer ba zhi bzhi// do shal phyed pa drug cu bzhi dang // nyi shu pa/ phreng ba gcig pa yaSh+Ti ka/
31a4(mngon brjod): rgyu skar phreng ba sa mo do// mu tig nyi shu tso bdun no// gde bu lag gdab ka Ta ka/ ba lA yo ni mo mau ni no// kaM pA ra ni dpung rgyan mtshungs// aM gu yI ya sor gdub po// yi ge'i sor gdob rgya ldan yin// gsar gyi lag gdub ka ka Na// bud med
31a5(mngon brjod): rked rgyan mA kha la// gser ska bdun pa rked rgyan dang // de bzhin ma ning rkeng rgyan min// de nas skyes bu rgod pa yi// rkang gdub zhabs gdab many+dza ra// nA pu ri ni mo min no// drang pa tsin dang rkang rgyan no// g.yer khwa dril bu chung ba'o// lpags
31a6(mngon brjod): pa 'bras bu srin pa dang // spu la sogs pa gos kyi rgyu// btsu na gsum ste zas ras dang // k+Sho ma la sogs 'bras byung ras// ras bal lo la da ga dang ni// dar dang srin bu'i dbugs las byung // snam bu dang ni bal gos so// gsar pa
31b1(mngon brjod): so ma btags som// gos gsar na ba aM ba re// A ta ga ma bI gos ni// gang zhig bkrus pa'i gos bzung ngo // pa tra Ar+yA dar gos bkrus// gos chen nor po che zhes bya// nang gsal du ku la yi ras// gyon gos spyong gos gsum yin
31b2(mngon brjod): no// mo/ tshig mang po la gos gos dag/ gnyis/ ring pau mA yAM A ro ha// zheng che bi shA la tAM'o// baT+Ta tsA ra gos snyings mtshungs// zang po dang ni dri ma can// gos dang g.yo ga ma na bza' dang // gcer skyob bgo s+yA oM thA ka/ gos bzangs dar
31b3(mngon brjod): gos mo min no// gos kyi phung po gos mthug po// ni tso la ni smed gos so// mtshungs pa li ba snam bu'o// bar gos smad gos pA ri d+ha// sham thabs dang ni thang gos so// stod gos bla gos mtshungs pa'o// bri ha ti ka de bzhin du// saM
31b4(mngon brjod): bya na ni stod g.yogs so// 'doms dkris smad dkris bud med kyi// ba mo'i gos dang bu yi ras// kha ba rlung po skyong pa'i gos// bud med mchog gi slang dkris ni// tsaN+Da ta ka'i sor mo sleb pa'i gos// pra pa daM hi sa ta do// mo min bla br-i
31b5(mngon brjod): stang g.yogs dang // gur dang sgra zhes bya ba'o// yol ba dang na sgrib g.yogs so// yongs bcos lus kyi bcas legs so// 'dag chal khrus rtswa dag byed do// dri ma nyed pa ut+pa da ne gnyis po mtshungs// chur 'khru khrus dang snun/ tsa
31b6(mngon brjod): ra tsa lus la dri byugs sogs// dri ma bsang dang dris sel// dra bzangs dang ni spros byug mtshungs// tA ma la 'dab thig la dang // dpral ra ra dri yi khyad par bres// gnyis pa bzhi pa me min no// de nas gur gum kha che skyes// ma
32a1(mngon brjod): rtse ba dang mchog ldan dang // b+hU hi ka dang sar pa dang // dmar ba sa ka tsa pi shun dang ldan// tsan dan dmar po gur gum mo// rgya skyugs rak+Sha dzan+tu dang // ma ning / lA ba rgya mtshos shing gi nad// lo shI lA yaM me tog dpal// mau
32a2(mngon brjod): can/ de nas dza ba ka kA li pa kany+tsa ka le nu sar bany+tsa// de nas nus ldan rgyud can dang // a ka ruM dang rgyal mnyams byed// dmar po srin skyes a ga ru// a~M gu ru nag a gu ru// bkra shis phreng ba'i dri dang ni// mchod sbyin spos dang sra rtsi shing // spos
32a3(mngon brjod): dkar khu ba kun ldan dang // gzugs mang po dang de nas ni// br-i ka d+ha pa sbyar smos so// tu ru Sh+ka dang bi shu ka/ pi la yA na yang ngo // de nas pA ya sa dang ni// dpal gos bri ka d+hA pa dang // shra yaMSh+Ti dang thang chu'o// ri dgas lte ba ri dgas tshang // gla ba de
32a4(mngon brjod): nas ko la ka/ kak+ki la ka sbubs kyi 'bras// de nas ga pur mo min no// g+ha na'i snying po zla ba'i min// 'od dkar khwa bi'i bya ma'o// dri yi snying po ma la ya skyes dang // dpal bzangs tsan den mo min no// taM la paN+Di tsan+dan dang // ba lang mgo dang hA
32a5(mngon brjod): ri tsan dan dang // mo min no// tI la laR+ShI pa TaM ga/ chos byed tsan+dan dmar po dang // tsan+dan dran pa de naswa ni// dzA tI sbubs can dzA tI labras bu mo nyam// ga pur a ga ru dang gla ba dang // kak+ko la rnams lde mchod sbyin byug/ lus kyi
32a6(mngon brjod): byug pa brti'o// baR+Sha ke ni kha dog byug/ phye ma gos dang sbyar ba dang // dri 'dzin gos ni gsum yin no// dr-i dang phreng sogs legs sbyar gos// lhag pa'i gos dang me tog phreng // me tog phreng ba spyi bo'i steng // sgra yi dbus su
32b1(mngon brjod): gar+b+ha ka/ steng du 'phrang dang rtse mong 'phyang // mdun du la lA ma kaM ngo // rab 'phyang drang por mgul du 'phyang // me tog ga shal se ral kha// gang zhig 'phreng bcings brang la'o// shI khwa sA ni spyi bor bzhag/ bkod pa dang ni chas com pa// A
32b2(mngon brjod): b+ho gi ni yongs su rdzogs// u bo d+hA naM rgyas yin no// nyal ba gzims pa sha yi naM// khri dang nya lo khri gzims khri dang // kha gsum yA ni mtshungs pa'o// sngar 'bol chung ngu kan+da ko/ mar me dang rab 'bar ba dang // bi thA dang ni stan
32b3(mngon brjod): yin no// za ma tog dang ga'u dang // pra ti gra ha tshil ma'i snod// skra shad dang ni so mangs dang // me long ma gu ra dang dpe// rlung yab bIsisal yab ces pa'o// mi'i sde mtshan no// / rgyud dang rigs dang cho 'phrang dang // rus dang
32b4(mngon brjod): lag rjes skyes dang // baM sha rtsa khrad brgyud pa'o// bar+Na bram ze la sogs ma// rgyal rigs ra dza baM sha'o// sa bon las byA da rus yin no// rigs chen rigs bzeng 'phags rigs dang // mchog dang skyes bu dam pa legs// tshangs par spyod
32b5(mngon brjod): dang khyim gnas dang // nags ni gnas dang dge slong dang // rnam bzhi lag gnas mo min no// gnyis skyes sngon skyes sa yi lha// tshangs pa'i bu dang bram ze dang // tshangs/ 2de dag las ni drug ldan pa// mchod sbyin la sogs/
32b6(mngon brjod): nus pa'o// rigs ldan rnams gsal nyes pa shes// mdzes ldan blo bzang kun rig dang // rtogs ldan brtan po sems shes dang // shes ldan grangs can shes rab can// paN+Di ta dang nyes pa shes// blo gros can dang dpa' bo dang //
33a1(mngon brjod): go ba can dang mkhas pa dang // grags pa dang ni rnam par dngas// ring po mthong dang ring po shes// thos ldan sgrub sbyor can dag mtshungs// u pA d+ha ya mkhyen pa'o// mangs so gas sdum byed bla ma'o// sngags 'chang
33a2(mngon brjod): byed pa slob dpon yin// A de Sh+Ta 'dzin brtul zhugs can// yA dza mA na mchod sbyin dang // zla ba btus pa'i dIk+Shi ster// mchod sbyin mang byas mtsho de sbyin ldan// yaM dzA mchod sbyin mtho ris 'dod // phur bu'i mchod sbyin tha pe ti// zla ba'i
33a3(mngon brjod): chang 'thungs so ma pa// rigs byed kun la mchod sbyin byas// mtho ris kun gyi yon tan no// a nu tsA na rab brjod kyi// rig byed yan lag dang bcas bslabs// bla ma'i bka' yi rjes gnang thob// sa mA bri tu/ su tA mngon par khrus thob//
33a4(mngon brjod): sgrib byed nyer gnas slob ma'o// shIk+She dang por rtog pa bslabs// gcig pu tshangs pa'i brtul zhugs sbyong// tshangs par spyod dang bcas pa'o// sa tIr+tha ni bla ma gcig/ mi mdzes ag+ni tsi ta'o// rgyud pa'i nyir bstan ai ti h+ya// mi zad pa nyer
33a5(mngon brjod): shes dz+nyA na mAr+ya // dzA tA dang po rtsom pa'i rim// mchod sbyin ba sbyin bsreg a d+ha ro// mchod sbyin dang ni rgyud bdun pa// glog dang sbyin bsregs gi ser 'ongs mchod// mtshun gsol ba dang gtor ma dang // de rnams mchod sbyin chen po
33a6(mngon brjod): lnga/ che ngas pi ram chod sbyin la sogs zhes// tshogs pa 'khor mang 'dus pa dang // saM b+ha tshogs dang khru dang ni// phung po mi ning as+thA naM// ma mo ma ning 'das pa'o// dang po'i rgyud pa dang po pa// 'tshogs nas cho ga lta ba'o// tshags
33b1(mngon brjod): pa spyi yi ming ngo // A d+ha r+yA gA dri hot+ta ro// mchod sbyin sa ma bi da rimA pa// ag+ni d+ha la sogs pa yi// nor spyod mchod sbyinA yA dzA kA/ rigs byed sa gzhi yongs su bcos// mtshungs pa sa gzhi gru bzhi pa// tsaShI la ni phyugs brtags/ shing // bum
33b2(mngon brjod): shin tu bskor ba'i khyim// srog shring rtse mo ta ri ma'o// gnub shing gtsu'i sprin aH gnyis// lha yi ma dang khyim gyi mo// he bA nI yo ma~M gsu ma pa// me 'di gas mu li twe tA'o// pra NI ti ni legs sbyangs me// me'i ming ngo // ho me rab tu
33b3(mngon brjod): sbyor ba'o// gang zhig khyim bdag sbyin bdag me// lho phyogs me ni pra NI ya te// de la sna tshogs bsdebs pa'o// de nas me mo swA hA'o// byin sa mnyes par byed pa'o// mi'i chung me'o// bsreg rdzas yam shing d+ha bya'o// me'i sbar shing ngo // gA
33b4(mngon brjod): yau dI la sogs pa'o// bsreg rdzas smin byed tsa ru pheM// Do mazho dang sbyar ba'o// rlung yabi dang ni bsil yab ni// ri dgas lpags pa dag las so// prI Sha dA dz+ye no myar bsres// pa ra man+t+ra'i thag go// da bya ka b+h+yo lha mtshan zas// dgang
33b5(mngon brjod): gzar blugs gzar la sogs pa// zlum po gru bzhi zla phyed dang // zur gsum dgang gzar dbye ba'o// u pA kr-i ta dud 'gro ni// mchod sbyin ched du gsod par brtags// phan tshun zhwa dang bsong gtor bas// gsod pa'i ched kyi
33b6(mngon brjod): phyugs yin no// brjod byar rtags can prA mI ta// bsnyen rdzogs bsang gtor byas nas gsod// khru sa bsreg rdzas me phud// gsum mo ba She Ta byas pa'o// hi kA'i mtha' cani mchod sbyin gtso// de las gsod pa ya dwI ya/
34a1(mngon brjod): gsum/ mchod sbyin 'dod las sAr+N+Na khA tA dri'i las// bdud rtsi dang ni bi g+ha swa// mchod sbyin lhag ma zas lhag go// gtong ba 'bul ba sbyin pa dang // nye bar 'ged dang gshegs pa dang // rnam byin brims dang bkram pa dang //
34a2(mngon brjod): so sor byin dang mngon du bstan// 'dol ba yon dang me tog go// gshin don ster ba gsum yin no// tA da~M d+ha da hi kaM/ pha gshin sbyin pa ni bA ya// dad pa de las bstan bcos las// sbyin pa/ dus ston zla dus mchod pa'o// nyi ma'i brgyad
34a3(mngon brjod): char mchod byed pa// ku ta ya te mo min no// tshol ba yongs su tshol ba dang // rdzas su tshol dang kun tu tshole// gsol ba dang na zhu ba'o// slong ba mngon par slong ba dang // yA tsa na dang ar+tha na// drug ni gsum ste mchod yon dang // yon chub
34a4(mngon brjod): don dang / zhabs bsil rkang khrus chu la'o// rim pa las mgron po glo bur gsar 'ongs skyes laM gas gnas// mgron po dang ni gsar 'ongs dang // mgron ni khyim du 'ongs pa'o// mchod pa rim gro rgyas byed dang // legs byed ri mo
34a5(mngon brjod): zhabs 'bring mtshungs// gus mchod zhe sa dang bcas pa// bkur sti dang ni bsnyen bkur ro// 'gro dang 'khyam dang slar yang 'gro/ spyod lam dang ni 'gro 'dug gau/ kha bi shal dang ni zhal bsil lo// de nas thub dang mi smra dang // mngon
34a6(mngon brjod): rjes mo 'am rim pa dang // go rim bzhin rim pa'o// go ri mo min dang bzlog pa dang // rnam grangs nges dang brtul zhugs mo min no// gso sbyong dang ni bsod nams gso// u pa bstam bsnyen gnas so// gol ba dben pa'i
34b1(mngon brjod): bad grwa nyid dang // tshangs spyod dang ni rig byed klog/ tshongs pa'i thal mo sbyor ba'o// klog cing khu chu 'thor ba ni// tshangs pa'i thig le'o// bsam gtan rnal 'byor stan tshangs stan// rtog pa'i cho ga rigs so// gtso bo dang po'i rtog
34b2(mngon brjod): pa'o// rjes kyi rtog pa rjes brjod pa// 'du byed mngon du 'dzin pa ni// nye bor byed dang thos pa'o// mtshungs pa zhabs la 'dzin pa ni// mngon par brjod pa gnyis pa'o// dge slong dang ni kun tu rgyu// drang srong dang ni brtul zhugs can// dka'
34b3(mngon brjod): thub dka' spyod pha rol 'dod// mi smra ba dang thub pa'o// dka' thub dang ni nyon mongs bzod// dAn+to rags ni tshangs par spyod pa'o// drang srong bden par smra ba'o// khrus byas khrus kyi brtul zhu gas can// dbang po dul ba sdom brtson
34b4(mngon brjod): des/ tha nyal brtul zhugs bla kheb med// gcer nya lnga dang ni prAt+ti la// de nas chags bral ta ma saM// nyon mongs dang ni bral ba'o// gtsang ma dag pa dri ma med// lto ba ladzin pa kun gyi rtags// pA lA shA yi dbyug 'dzin dang // chu
34b5(mngon brjod): stod brtul zhugs can dang ni// rAM b+ha tu dang myug ma 'dzin// mo mIn rtaspyi blugs bum pa brtul zhugs snod// drang srong stan ni bri ShI'o// a dzi naM ni ri dgas lpags// lpags pa 'dzin pa mo min no// bsid snyoms pa dang slong mo
34b6(mngon brjod): ba// kha don dang ni bzlas brjod pa// khrus byas khrus chus pa ni// rig byed dang ni gzungs kun gyi// sdig pa 'dzims pa gsum yin no// mthong ba gang dang gnam spong la// phyogs mtha' so so'i mchod sbyin byed// rtag tu lus
35a1(mngon brjod): sgrub lta ba ni// las gang de yin zhi ba'o// nges pa gang zhig rtag tu las// glo bur ba la bsnye na bkur sgrub// u pA bA ti tshangs skud ni// lag pa'i g.yas phyogs rab tu dkris// prA tsI nA bI g.yon du dkris// ni bI te ni mgul
35a2(mngon brjod): du 'phyang // sor mo'i rtse mo rti rje lha// mthe chung rtsa bar tshangs lha'i chu// gung mo mthab mdzub mtshun gyi mchu// mtha' chen rtsa bar tshangs chu sbyin// spangs pa slar 'byung tshangs nyid// tshangs pa yang dag ldan pa dang // lha sogs 'byung ba de bzhin
35a3(mngon brjod): no// zad par dka' thu ba la sogs pa// bA spangs bya d+ha kha skyes bu'o// phal cher/ de nas ma nyams dang chu zos me// ku ha nA dang rnyed log dang // tshul 'chos pa dang bcos pa'o// bra t+yA legs sbyangs kyi sman no// lung med+ma brjod par bya ba minan//
35a4(mngon brjod): chos kyi rgyal mtshan ril pa'i rtags// grags dman dang ni brtul zhugs nyams// nyi ma nub nyal brtul zhugs dang // nyi ma shar langs brtul zhugs so// nyi ma pa dang grol med deng // shar langs ji ltar rim bzhin no// go log skyes bag
35a5(mngon brjod): ma ni// phu bo'i bag ma ma blangs pa// pa ri bid ti phu bo'i'o// thig maM he zung mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin khyim thib gnyis ldan dang // u pA ya mA laMg bsnams so// 'khrig pa grong chos chags spyod mtshungs// sde mtshan gsum po chos dang
35a6(mngon brjod): ni// 'dod pa dang ni don rnams so// sde mtshan bzhi pa rnam thar ro// de stobs bzhi ldan bzang po'o// dzI b+h+ra mag pa'i grogs pa'o// bram ze'i sde mtshan no// / spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bu// lag skyes rgyal rigs rnam
35b1(mngon brjod): par rgyal// rgyal po sa bdag sa skyong dang // mi bdag sa srungs bzhi skyong dang // rgyal po ma lus kun gyis ni// phyag byas lhag pa'i dbang phyug go// 'khor los sgyur ba sa kun dbang // mi bdag gzhan ni rgyal phran no// ngag gis rgyal 'dod
35b2(mngon brjod): mchod sbyin byas// dkyil 'khor dbang phyug bstan bcos dang // bka' lung rgyal po dag pa'i rgyal// rgyal po'i tshogs pa rgyal po rnams// me bdag rgyal rig sa tshogs pa'i rims// bka' dbang gros pa blon po dang // gzhan ni las
35b3(mngon brjod): dang lhan cig spyod// blon po chen po gtso bo dang // blon po dang ni mdun na 'don// nang blon spyan dang khrims gcod pa// gnyer pa dang ni mig pa'o// sgo srungs pa dang sgo skyong dang // sgor gnas byar byed pa'o// srung ma'i tshogs pa sku srungs pa//
35b4(mngon brjod): de nas bka' lung blon po mtshungs// gnas brtan dang ni grong dpon no// gzhi kha gnyer ba b+hA ri// gser mdzod pa dang gser gnyer ba// dngul mdzod pa dang dngul gnyer ba// nang mi pho brang nang pa dang // nang ni gnas pa'i skye bo'o// btsun
35b5(mngon brjod): mo'i sku srungs ra'i gu can// gnas brtan dang ni nyug rum pa// ma ning nyams pa za ma mtshungs// zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba pa// yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/ dwe ya pha rol gshes yin no// u da sIn par gnas yul// rtsa 'dzin
35b6(mngon brjod): dang ni rgyab gnas so// gnod byed zhe 'gras dgra bo dang // brtse can zhe sdang nyes byed dang // smad byed dang ni mi mthun phyogs// mi phyin byed dang shes mi byed// dgra re 'dzin pa dang sha tra la// mi 'dzu ba dang pha rol rgol// phyir rgol dang ni
36a1(mngon brjod): pha rol lam// na mnyam mtshungs pa mgran zla dang // de nas bshes dang grogs po gnyen// byams pa bdun pa gnyen// rjes su 'gog dang kha 'gog pa// lha nyul dang ni rtog mi ba// rtog dpyod pa dang nyal mi dang // ldom
36a2(mngon brjod): bu ba dang so rtog mi// bya gtong dang ni nang yan gsum// ltos shes rtsis mkhan lha shes dang // rtsis pa grangs shes yud tsam thang cig dang // dus shes pa dang rtsis pa 'ong // rgyud dang grub mtha' shes pa dang // sbyin bdag khyim bdag
36a3(mngon brjod): mtshung pa'o// 'bris mkhan dang ni yig mkhan dang // yi ge ba dang le kha ke/ ya ge'i gzhi dang yi ge'i gnas// yi ge'i ri mo gnyis ni mo// skyes kha ba dang pho nya dang // du t+yaM de dngos las yin// laM sa 'tshong sa 'gron po dang // laM
36a4(mngon brjod): 'grul dang ni 'dren lam dang // bdag po blon po thugs gces dang // mdzod dang yul dang rdzong dang ni// stabs rnams rgyal ba'i yan lag rnams rgyal po'i yan lag rnams rang bzhin no// khab dang pho brang zhes pa dang // du ma dang 'thab
36a5(mngon brjod): dang chas pa dang // drag ni yon tan no// nus pa dang ni mthu stobs dang // dga' bar byas dang sngags bzlas dang // zas dang gnas dang 'phel ba dang // sde mtshan gsum po rig pa'o// dpung dang mthu brjid can dang ni// bang mdzod spya
36a6(mngon brjod): yis gang ba dang // dbyes dang sdud kha dums dang ni// spu 'jam thabs ni rnam pa bzhi// khral dang sdud dang dpya dang ni// phra ma skyo ma de nas mtshungs pa dbyis dang phra ma// u pa d+ha ni chos sogs kyi// gang zhig yongs su lta ba'o//
36b1(mngon brjod): lnga ni gsum mo mu drug min// gang zhig gsum sogs spyod tshul min// drag na dang skya bos dben pa dang // g.yogs pa rgyun lugs med pa dang // de bzhin du gon pa dben pa gol// drags med/ pa ra ha de'i dngos po gsum// mtshungs
36b2(mngon brjod): pa blo thub yid ches so// nyams na dman dang ji ltar 'gribs// ma nyams rig pa rtog pa dang // bstan gzugs mtshungs par gnas// rigs pa thabs dang thob pa dang // 'os pa 'thad pa mtshungs bzhin dang // gsum drag/ spang ba dang ni
36b3(mngon brjod): 'chab pa'o// 'doms pa nges ston nyer bstan dang // rjes gnang nyer blangs bka' lung ngo // lugs dang khrims dang yul chos khrims// nyes pa nongs can skyon can no// mtshungs pa btson dang bcings pa'o// rkang gnyis 'gyur chad
36b4(mngon brjod): pa'o// thob bya dpya dang sdud kha'o// khral bar thob pa sho kham mo min no// 'dul ba phyag rten skyes zhu rten// rnam gzhag mdun 'jog/ yo byad la sogs gang zhig rnams// sbyin par brtsams pa dang rdzas so// de yi dus la sbyin pa'o//
36b5(mngon brjod): phyi dus la ni oM yau ti// 'di la mthong dang 'di yi 'bras// phyi mar mthong dang de ya 'bras// mthong med mi dang tshul sogs// mthong ba rang gzhan dgra bo dang // sa skyong shin tu 'jigs pa dang // rang phyogs mthu yis 'jigs pa dang // pra kr-i
36b6(mngon brjod): yi ni bka' lung ngo // rnga yab rab tu rgya chen po// mi dbang stan no stan bzang ngo // seng ge'i stan ni gser gyi'o// gdugs dang bsil gdugs rgyal po mi dbang mtshan nyid do// bum pa bzang dang bum bya gang // b+haM ga ra gser gyi bum//
37a1(mngon brjod): dmag khyi ma dmag ra ma ning ngo // mel tshe ba dang nye bar bsrung // glang rta shing rta rkang thang rnams// dmag gi yan lag rnam bzhi'o// so ldan mche ba stobs dang ldan// lag ldan mche ba gnyis pa dang // mang po sbyong
37a2(mngon brjod): dang gnyis 'thung dang // glang mo skyes dang dbyug 'dzin dang // nA ga dang ni sa lung nyal// glang chen byed can I b+ha dang // glang po'i mgon dang glang po'i rgyal// nags tshal dga' dang thig le can// glang po'i chang dang chang gi chang // ka la b+hi ni glang
37a3(mngon brjod): phyug go/ glang mos sgra sgrogs glang bzi dang // glang po smyon pa glang po rgod// glang chu tshugaswa pA glang po 'dus// glang mA ba dang bA lang mo// 'gram pa ka Ta/ chang dang glang chang // glang po'i mgo dang lag ldan mgo/ bum pa dang ni glad
37a4(mngon brjod): 'bur gnyis// de dag dbus la be du skyes bu'o// au ba grA ha dpra le ba yin// dI shi ka ni mig 'bras dag/ mig gi zur ni niR+YA Na// d+hU ba'i rtsa ba rtsu li kA/ 'og tu bum pa'i bA hit+taM// pra ti mA na mche ba'i dbus// a sa naM ni phrag
37a5(mngon brjod): pa'i phyogs// pad+ma kaM ni kha chu'o// pak+Shau b+ha gA rtsib mA'i chu// don ta b+ha ga mche ba'i rtse// shar nub rje dur la sogs phyogs// lus kyi pha rol ri mr-i pa lis// to tre 'bring pa'i glang bu'o// mA lA nAM ni 'dogs pa'i rka// lcags thags
37a6(mngon brjod): a nI ko dang sgrogs// mo min lcags kye mo min shri Ni'o mo// 'dzag stegs dang ni ya gdong // rtogs ldan skye bo dam pa mtshungs// glang g.yogs la ba khabs dang ni// stan dang ku thaM gnyis dag go/ bAM taM glang po'i 'dogs
37b1(mngon brjod): pa'o// 'dren byed chu 'thung myur 'gro dang // 'gro mgyogs rta dang gshog pa can// rta dang 'gro byed ha ya dang // san d+ha skyes dang bdun ldan dang // cang shes dang ni go ling ngo // rnam par dul dang legs 'gro dang // ba na'i yul skyes pA ra
37b2(mngon brjod): sI skyes// 'dar byed skyes dang bA hI skyes// mchid sbyin rta dang me b+hi 'i rta// bang pa dang ni lhag par rgyug/ rgyub ldan dang ni brten pa'o// gi la dkar po kar+k+ka'o// shing rta 'dren byed ra tha s+ya// rte'u dang ni thor bu'o// rgod ma dang ni marto'o// bAN
37b3(mngon brjod): baM rta khyA dang // gsum yin a shrI ne ne gang // rta yis nyin gcig bgrod pa'i lam// ka sh+yen rta yi rked pa'o// rta yi dbyangs// ze rngog dang ni ze ba'i phyogs// rta yi tshogs pa rta khrom 'dre// 'tsher 'gro phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang // yongs
37b4(mngon brjod): bskor mchod 'gro ring du 'gro/ lnga po 'di rnams rtswa ya 'gros// rta mchog gtso bo mo ma yin// rta khrab dang ni khA lI nA// mo/ rto mig ma ni r+m+ma ga mA po// rta 'jug mo mina? rnga ma 'jug/ bA la harti rta rnga snying ngo // gsum ste nyer 'dre 'dre log
37b5(mngon brjod): dang / pha rol 'dri dang sa la 'dra// theg pa 'khor los 'aglo bA dang // g.yul gyi shing rta yan lag brgya// 'gro ba'i shing rta/ 'di ni me tog shing rta'o// 'khor lo bzhin pa yul 'jug gang // rna ba'i shing rta rab 'bab dang // rta yis
37b6(mngon brjod): 'dren dang mtshungs pa gsum// ma ning shing rta sha ka Ta// mi min gaM tI la bas g.yogs// khyogs dang 'degs 'gro zhes pa dang // do la pra kha la sogs pa// mo/ gnyis po stan g.yogs snyag can dang // stag gis g.yogs pa'i shing
38a1(mngon brjod): rta na// lA ba dkar pos g.yogs pa dang // s+yan+na nA dang la ba dkar// shing rta can+da la gos la sogs// la ba la sogs g.yogs pa'o// gsum po gnyis 'thung lnga sogs la// ra b+hU shing rta'i tsho gas dang lam// d+hA ni mo dang
38a2(mngon brjod): ma ning shing rta'i gdong // shing rta'i khong pa ma pas dkar// 'khor lo shing rta'i yan lag dang // de yi mtha' dang mu khyud dang // mo yin pra d+hi po// 'khor lo'i lta ba 'khor lo bsrung ba'i gzer bu ni// gnyis te a Ni'o// shing rta sgra ba dang 'thab
38a3(mngon brjod): ra'o// yu gA d+ha ra gnya' shing 'dzin// rjes su 'dren dang d+hArba d+haHs+t+waM// gnya' shing 'ching zhing yu ga dang // thams cad bzhon pa theg pa dang // 'khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor bgrod byed do// phan tshun 'bab dang len pa dang // mo min/ bzhon pa pa
38a4(mngon brjod): dang glang po bA// glang tshan steng na gnas pa'o// kha lo bA da nga mgo 'dren pa// sna chags sna khrid kha lo sgyur// g.yas sdong lho phyogs gnas pa dag/ shing r+N+Na'i gnyen zhes bya'o// ra thi na ni shing rta ba// a shwa bA hA rta pa'o// dpa' dang brtul
38a5(mngon brjod): phod gzhan zil gnon// sde srungs dang ni so pa'o// tshogs pa sde pa 'dus pa dang // phung po dmags dpung saM ni ka/ gang zhig dpung ni stong yod pa// de ni stong dpon sa ha tra// bya ra ba dang mi'i tshe'o// dmag dben dang ni dpon mgo'o// kaMny+tsa
38a6(mngon brjod): ka ni gon khrab bo// gang zhig nang tshangs can dang ni// ber dang go che lus kyi gos// de nas mgo khab tshem bu'i zhwa/ rmo ga/ de nas lus gos khrab dang ni// ya lang brang khebs go cha khrab// ka ba tsa ni mo min no// go cha gyon dang chas zhugs
38b1(mngon brjod): dang / go cha bar mi ta go// gsum ni ma grol la sogs pa// go cha dang ni go tshogs pa// rkang thang rkang dmag rkang 'gros pa// pA dA bi ka dang rkang rgyu ba// ba da ga dang pa di ka/ de nas rkang thang tshogs dang dpung bu chung // mtshon chas 'tsho
38b2(mngon brjod): dang mtshon tshwa ba// 'khrug mi dang ni gsos po mtshungs// lag sbyangs rab dgos khyad par can// skyes bu rgya rtsal mkhan// a be bA dra pra Sha tra ko saM lak+Shang+kash+tsA ta shA pa kA/ d+ha nI gzhu can dang // gzhu thogs pa dang gzhu 'dzin no//
38b3(mngon brjod): mda' ba dang ni mda' 'dzin pa// shAk+ti ka dang mdung 'dzin dang // da byig pa can drang baur kha ba// dbyug pa dgra sti'i mtshon cha can// gri pa dang ni ral gri'i mtshon// mtshungs pa mdung can mdung mtshon can// tsarmi'i lag na phub yin no// /
38b4(mngon brjod): ba tA kI dang 'phyar drar ro// rjes 'jug phyir 'brang rjes su 'brang rjes su yong // rting 'brang ba dang mtshungs pa'i// sngon 'gro mdun 'gro dang por 'gro/ sna 'dor ba dang gdong ma'o// mAn+d+ra gA mi dali gyis 'gro/ myur 'gro ba dang rgyug pa mnyam
38b5(mngon brjod): bang chen pa dang dzA g+hi ko/ mgyogs myur rgyug pA bang // rgyu dang ni rab tu spyod// rgyal dang rgyal nu dze tri ngo // dz+re ya rgyal bar sems pa'o// rgyal ba dang ni dze tA'o// gang zhig dgra yi phyogs 'gro ba// de ni a b+ha mi tru'o// grags ngan
38b6(mngon brjod): ngan pa dang skya lag go/ stobs tshan dang ni gyad mi dang // gang zhig shin tu rdul phod pa// bang spyod u pa si lo'o// shing rta ra thing shing rta'i bdag/ 'dod 'bor dang ni rjes 'chags 'gro/ rtag 'gro de bzhin rgyun du 'gro/ dpa'
39a1(mngon brjod): dang brtul ba ngo ba la gnon// brjid can dang ni rgyal byed pa// g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang // mtshon chas 'tshe ba la sogs gsum// rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhon pa dang // dmag dpon ru dang sde dang ni//
39a2(mngon brjod): dmag dang dpung ni chas pa'o// stobs kyi sde dang 'khor lo dang // tshogs pa rnams ni mo min no// dpung tshogs rnams kyi bkod pa ni// de dbye dbyug sogs 'khrug shoms so// slar 'brang bkod pa phyi ma'o// dmag gi rgyab na yongs 'dzin
39a3(mngon brjod): pa/ glang dang shing rta re re dang // rta gsum dang ni rkang thang lnga// sa dA ti ka zhes pa'o// so so'i yan lag gsum 'gyur gyis// kun gyi go ri mo zhes bya'o// ji ltar phyi nas dmag gi sgo// gul ma ga NaM bA hA nI// sde mtshan gyi ming ngo // bri
39a4(mngon brjod): ta nA tsa mu/ a nI ki nI bcu rnams la// a nI ki byo a k+Sho hi// phun tshogs 'byor ldan dpal dang shrIs// phongs dang mi 'byor phun tshogs bral// mtshon cha lag cha rdeg cha// rgyan tshe de nas ma yin no// gzhu dang tsA ba d+ha nu dang // 'dab
39a5(mngon brjod): zamada' 'phye ni karme ka/ mda' bskyod de nas kaR+Sha t+yo/ kA la paSh+pe mdar yi lto// srid sgrub gzhu ni gAN+Da bo// skyes bu 'am ni ma ning ngo // gan yi mchog ma a Ta nI// go d+ha lag 'brag lag gzan no// la sta ka ni tshangs pa'o// gan rgyud
39a6(mngon brjod): prad bu rgyud yon tan/ g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i// gnas ni rnam pa lnga zhes so// mda' 'phen mtshon cha la kAM ngo // 'phong slob u pa nA sa'o// mda' dang bA Na rtse mo can// drang 'gro mkha' 'gro myur 'gro dang // nig
39b1(mngon brjod): phran+da lam ldan 'bigs byed dang // gshog ldan mda' dang gnyis// lcags mda' nA rA tsA yin no// sgro dang 'dab ma gsum phyis// ni ra sta ni ma 'a 'phangs pa// dug can mda' ni li pA kau/ dong pa mnga' shugs du NI ra// brtsod rtse mda'
39b2(mngon brjod): 'dzin gnyis dong ba// ral gri gcod byed zla 'dzums dang // a si ral gri rdeg cha dang // maN+Da la rtse lag pa skyong // kri pA Na 'dra/ a khri u 'o// ral gri'i 'ching cag me kha la// phub ni mo min pa la'o// tsarma g.yung du lag 'dzin pa// tho ba 'joms
39b3(mngon brjod): byed g+ha na'o// rked gri ka ra bA li ka/ 'bigs skyong mdung dang mnyam pa// dbyug pa lcags bcings pa ri g+hA/ gnyis pa steng ri pa ra sh+tsa// dgra sta dang ni sta mo'o// chu gri gri thung tshu ri ka/ ral gri phrug gu'o// 'phang mdung sha l+ya gser mdung ngo //
39b4(mngon brjod): mda' bo tshu ni to ma ra dang mA min// thag mdu kun dang sngon ma min zhabs zlog bri// sna mdor ko Ta pa ra// kun gyis chas byed ser po g+ha/ kun gyis go gyon sngogs byed pa// go bsar dang ni go cha bsgos// rgyal po dmags la
39b5(mngon brjod): mnga' gsol byed// gang zhig dmag 'gro de dpung bskur// dmag thegs bskyod dang ldeg pa dang // zhugs pa 'gro dang ga ma'o// brkyang ba dang ni ru rgyangs dang // pha rol dmag dang 'jug pa'i don// nyam mi nga ba dang 'jigs
39b6(mngon brjod): med dang // g.yul du 'jug che mngon par dpa'// be tA li ka go byed pa// 'khor lo can dang dril bu dang slongs mo ba// rgyal rabs mkhan na ma d+hu ka/ phyag dang stong pa mkhan po dang // g.yul 'phrod 'khrag dus g.yul ngor zhugs//
40a1(mngon brjod): rdul chub gnyis sa ma ni rdul// rdul chub gnyis te chub ma dang // phye ma dang ni kA dar// nye bar 'khrugs dang 'gyed pa dang // 'dzings pa dang ni phyogs med dang // ba dan rgyal mtshan tog dang ni// d+ha dza dang ni mo min no// dur
40a2(mngon brjod): khrod 'khrug pa'i sa gzhi dang // shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu ster// nga sde nga snga zhes sgrog pa// bdage sngon mo min// mtshar can skyes bu grags pa can// nga rgyal can zhes so// nga nga zhes smra phan tshun 'gran// gang zhig 'gran par byed
40a3(mngon brjod): pa'o// chom med thal 'gro// rtul bid dang // sobs len dpal dang nyem de med// nus ldan pha rol gnon pa'o// gyad dang shin tu dpa' ba'o// dpa' bo'i btang ba gang zhig gis// chang 'thangs gyi sta phyi ru khrag pa'i gyed
40a4(mngon brjod): pa rgyal byed pa// 'joms pa rab tu 'joms pa dang // ma d+ha du byed saM khyu dang // g.yul dang sAM pA rA ya ka/ mtshon 'dzings mnyam shi A nA ka/ g.yul du 'thab ma bi gra ha/ 'phrag 'jams dge bral rtsod pa dang // shin tu 'dral
40a5(mngon brjod): dang saM yug sa// mngon pa nyid dang rdig gsod dang // 'thab rtsi de'i khrug longs sa mu dA ya mo// mi bde g.yul 'gyed a dzaM dang // swa mi d+h+ye d+ha zhes pa'o// mtshan bral gyad kyi dpung 'dzings dang // tu mu le ni g.yul du gsod//
40a6(mngon brjod): catsaco sgrogs pa seng+ge'i sgra// blang mo'i bum pa'i sgra dang na// dud mo ca co dang ding dang // 'bru mang po dang glang po'i sgra// bi s+phA ra ni gzhu yi sgra// 'khrug rnga ram pa ro dag mtshungs// g.yo rgyu ngan thabs ha Sha'o// de nas 'khrul dang
40b1(mngon brjod): nor bu dang // mi shes ma ning ltas byung dang // nyer sbyar dang ni mtshungs pa gsum// brgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa'o// man+t+ra pa dang ni 'chor ba'o// rmas pa dang ni lus nyams so// rgyal ba dang ni rnam par rgyal// 'dras dang rtsen dang
40b2(mngon brjod): slar byed dang // 'khon zhugs pa dang sha 'a kho na zhugs// bros dang zhogs dang bur ba dang // sA do bA bi dre bo dri baH/ a ya tra mo// bros pa'i ming ngo // g.yul du bcos gzhan rgyal ba dang // 'pham pa dang na pha rol rgyal// yab pa dang
40b3(mngon brjod): ni skyabs pa'o// 'joms dang rdeg dang rdung ba dang // rnam 'tshe dang bsnun pa dang // bzhus dang nyer gtsos mnar ba dang // nor pa nyid pa gos med dang // brdung tag nges 'joms nges par gsod// skad cig dang ni yongs su spangs// nir+tha
40b4(mngon brjod): ya naM/ bi sha sa nAM/ sa ra NaM pra ta gA ta naM/ tatA sa naM pra ma tha naM/ dra tha no// dz+nyA sa nI nI tsa/ a lam+b+ha piny+tsa/ rnam 'joms gtubs dang gcod pa dang // de rnams ni gsod gcod kyi ming gi rnam grangs so// lnga pa dus tshod lta ba'i mtha'//
40b5(mngon brjod): skal 'jog tshe 'gro mtha' ma dang // chud 'dza' gnyis te tshe 'dra' dang // 'chi ba byed bcings mo min rI no// pha rol 'das dang lnga po rnyed// pha rol dang ni ya dwags gnas// ro dang tshe 'dras gsum zhes so// ro thab sgong phu ba tsi ti mo// ka
40b6(mngon brjod): ban+d+ha ni mo min te// byed ldan mgo mad ro yin no// dur khrod dang ni gshin gyi nagos// ro dang sha ba mo min no// gdon dang 'byung po'i tshang byed do// kA rA t+yA ni 'ching byed gnas// skyes bu'i srog nai pA NA'o// de nas de bzhin 'tsho dang
41a1(mngon brjod): gson pa dang // nA nI d+hi srid 'tsho ba ngas+ya// skyes bra da m+b+ha// rgyal rigs kyi sbru la ldanun// rmi d+hU n+ya skyes 'phags pa dang // rmurigs sa 'dzin rje 'o// kun 'tsho 'tsho ba g+h+nA dang // gson byed monam
41a2(mngon brjod): 'tsho 'tshos so// gsum yin rmo ga dud 'gro skyong // tshang dang 'tsho ba'i tshom zhes bya// zhabs thog pa ni khyi yi 'tsho// rmo n-i dang nI phru rlog dang // ston thag dang na thon no// bya tshol dang ni slong mo pa// ji ltar/ bden pa dang ni tshong dngos po// 'bun dang
41a3(mngon brjod): skyed dang bde 'tsho dang // don sbyor 'tshong ngam 'o tshong pa can// skye ba dang ni g.yar ba dang // brje ba dang ni bsgyur bzlog go// nor gyi bdag dang bu lon pa// gnyis po rab sbyor len mkhan rim// tshul min pa dang log 'tsho dang // 'phel ba dang ni gyur
41a4(mngon brjod): 'tsha'o// zhing bya shas pa so nam pa// phru rlog pa dang rmos pa'o// zhing dang 'brus sha le yaM// 'bru dang sa lu 'byung ba'o// nas dang nas zhing drug cu pa// nas sogs 'byung ba'i sa gzhi'o// ti l+yaM taM li mon sra gre/ a ma aNA b+hi g+ha
41a5(mngon brjod): dang // thog ra mo gI naM/ kr-I dra bI Na/ kA ma 'bros skyel khyad par sogs// sa bon btsugs dang bskrun po dang // btab dang rmos dang bskyed pa'o// snum lcog dang ni lan gsum rmos// sum ldog sum rmos de la yang // nyis log pa dang
41a6(mngon brjod): nyis rgyas dang // nyis dus nyes rmos pi lare// dzan+yai D+ha ka la sogs bre// bre baM a d+hi ka la soms// khA rI tshad can khA rI ki/ u tu maN+Da l-i sogs gsum// skyes bum nong deng ni// so gzhi k+She tra 'brus dang // 'brus chu mchi
41b1(mngon brjod): mig can// rmos zhing dang sa gzhi tshogs// bong pa sa sgong pho// kro Ti sha ni bong pa'i dbye// lcags dbyig to tA dra na tro tra// tog rtse tang ni rko byed do// zor ba dang ni rnga byed do// ban+d+ha yu ba yo ka tra// de nas gshol dang rmo byed dang // gshol dang
41b2(mngon brjod): ha la thong ba dang // sa gcod 'dral byed gshol dang ni// glang 'joms dang ni rtse mo can// gnya' shing gnya'i pi'i phur pa dang // mda' dang gshol gyi dbyig pa'o// thong lcags dang na gshol lcags so// skyes bu rtod pur 'dogs thag dang //
41b3(mngon brjod): gang zhig phyugs rnams btags pa'o// 'bru dkar 'bru dgar 'bru dang pA Ta la// nas dang ya ba mnyam pa'o// ma smin pa ni ljang ba'o// sran ma sra tI na ku dang // sran mi'i ming ngo // ko ra du Sha kro dra ba// bkr-i shis dang ni sran chung ngo // mon sran
41b4(mngon brjod): gre'u brgyad pa'o// nags sran ma/ dkar dang yungs nags pa la khang ka tram+ba kau/ don grub yungs dkar zas gtsang dang // gro dang yid legs 'gra ba'o// nas dang kul mA Sha zhes so// tsa Na ka dang hA ra man+tha skyes// gnyis nI tI lo til skyes dang //
41b5(mngon brjod): ti la piny+dza 'bras med do// skye rtse k+Sha d+hA mngon skyes dang // rgyal po nag po lha min mo// khre dang pri yang g+hA ni gnyis// a mA zar ma a ta sI// mA tA la nI b+haM ga yAM// 'bru yi rapra dbye a Na skyes// ki shu ru dong snyi ma dang // snyi ma dang ni dag pa'o// /
41b6(mngon brjod): so ba skogs can gongs ma'o// sti ma po gud pa rtsa sogs 'bru// mgul pa ngar pa kaN+Da'o// pa lA la ni mo min 'bras med sogs// spun stong phub ma ma ning ngo // me rtogs skyes bu phub ma'o// rtse mo mo min 'jam pa dang // rtse mo rno ba
42a1(mngon brjod): gra ma dang // mtshungs pa gang bu gsum phyi nas// so ba'i tshogs pa d+ha n+ta'o// gtsang ma dang ni mang byas dang // sran ma la sogs gang bu'i 'bru// snyi ma'i 'bru ni nas la sogs// shA la ya dang ka la ma sogs dang // drug tu
42a2(mngon brjod): ba sogs pho 'di rnams// rna yi 'bru dang ni bA rA// mo ni ga be darga bi d+hA kA'o// lcags rtse cen dang rten shing ngo // ma min/ rten dang 'bru ma'i ma gzhi'o// slo ma 'khra'i byed mo min no// khrol ma dang ni tshigs so'o// ske dang pha che thub po khris//
42a3(mngon brjod): thugs rtswa khres dag mtshungs so// ro ldan g.yos khang tshad ma'o// g.yos dpon lag pade'i dpon po dang // zan ma g.yas ma thab kha ba// lag bde 'dren thang phyug tshad do// yon tan thab kha ba 5gnyer// zas byed pa 'di rnams gsum//
42a4(mngon brjod): thab dang skyed bu me thab dang // tsu li dang ni g.yos sa'o// me yi gzhong ba ma snod dang // me ya stegs dang me rdza'o// de nas mo min ma mngag dang // me dang rul bu mu kau zhes so// ma ning glang ba ther po dang // rdod gzhi sdong rje dang // ni mo/ snod po che
42a5(mngon brjod): dang nor bu cen// chu yi snod dang chu rdza'o// rtsa rdza bco rdza g.yo snod snod// bum pa gsum yin gnyis g+ha Ta// bum pa ni pA mo min no// kham phor dang ni rdza phor ro// snum zan ma dang dul ma'o// 'khar ba mo min chang snod do// ku duHko sbubs snam snod
42a6(mngon brjod): no// ku ru rung ba skyes bu'o// kun 'jo snod ni bAN+Da'o// snod dang a ma tra snod spyod// sgrub pa srub byid kha dzA kA/ babar bu dang ni lag skyogs so// mo me ni lo ma sngo lo ma// ngar pa sdong bu chu ba'o// spong dang kha dog sbyar byed do// tin ti lI/
42b1(mngon brjod): bse yab dang // shing skyur de nas pho ba ris// ma ri tsam dang ko la kaM/ nag po drong sman chos kyi sman// dzI ra zir a dzA dz+r-i// zegs mnag po zi rA pu shrI// ka ra bI dang sa dang ni// rgya chen nag po zi ra nags// sgo bsher dang ni rwa can no// de nas gdugs
42b2(mngon brjod): can ru su dang // ku stam+bi bu ru so ba can// de nus skra dang sman chen drang // mo dang mi ning thams cad la// grong skyes bi shwa sman dang ni// rtsab mo sbyar mi kA la mA ShA// thug skyur sbyar rtsi a ma la// skyur sbyar dang ni kany+dzi ke/ stong 'bigs shing kun mi
42b3(mngon brjod): ldan dang // cig blo tso ni shing kun no// de mi la~M mak+Sha r-I 'aM// zer nag po b+hU'i bi ka/ karA bI dang rgyun no// mtshon mo'i ming can sru ba ze ser// hI ri dra dang su bar// rgya mchog ni g.yan nache// de pyid dus chags pa de dang do//
42b4(mngon brjod): mtsho mo min dkar zhing zhi// mA Ni man+ta sin+d+hu skyes// ro mi kaM dang sbyar tshwa'o// smin tshwa kha ru tshwa sbyar gnyis// tshwa ni mi zad ru tsa ke/ maR+Ya khu las byung me tsa ke/ ka ra sU ba hwags dang ni// sharka ra dang ka ra dkar// 'phrum dnga'i las sbyar ro// rA sA lA na~M
42b5(mngon brjod): gnyis pa'o// tshod ma dang ni dz+nyA naM// rte sa gsum bA sa yin chod do// rtsi byas bsregs sha shU lA'o// bcos pa'i sha nI paM tha ram// gya non pa dang phun sum tshogs// dka' bas bsgrubs dang legs par sbyar// ltar ltar dang na mal
42b6(mngon brjod): mul lo// legs bsangs pa dang ngag byas mnyam// snum brngos snum btsos sni gr-i/ 'dra dang 'i khur ba bA si ta// ma smin pa dang bsru bu zas// 'bras yos skyes bu mang po'i tshig ma nyams pa// 'bras yos bi pi Ta ka/ yos dang nas
43a1(mngon brjod): brngos mo yin no// rdob bu chang bu tshangs pa dang // zho zan zho dang sbyar ba'o// zan ni mi min b+ha kA/ zas dang an na o da no// mo min bza' ba zhes pa'o// bza' ba dang ni lto zhes so// ro kun dang po khu ba mo// 'bras bu tsA ma
43a2(mngon brjod): khu ye dang // thug pa khu ba zan las byung // ya bA gu dang 'bras thug go/ thug pa skyo tsha ta ra lA// ga bya gsum yin pa las byung // thams cad pa dang ba lci dang // pa yi rang bzhin mo min no// lU skam dang ni yar dge mo// 'o ma kI re pa ya mtshungs//
43a3(mngon brjod): 'o ma las byung zhod d+hi sogs// dra smye me chags zhes so// zhun mar zhan ma bsreg rdzas mar// ma bzhu ba dang mar gsar dang // de ni haM ya b+hA bi ne// gang zhig khar tshang ba bzhos mar// dbyug snum dar ba zho dpyang dang // chu skya chabi skye dar ba'o// ma
43a4(mngon brjod): thI taM ni chu rkang gcig/ chu phyed pa ni nai rdzi lam// zho kha tshun zho las byung // pri ni 'o ma gsar pa'o// bas 'dod zas 'dod ltogs pa dang // gr-i sa dang ni kham gya don// chu bcas zas dang sA pI tau// sa ga d+hi bud med dang lhan cig zo ba// chu
43a5(mngon brjod): 'dod bting 'dod kha ske skom// bzhes pa gsol dgongs gdugs chod dang // 'tshal ma za ma zas dang ni// kha zas zhes pa dang yang ngo // 'grangs dang ngoms dang tshim pa dang // he li sder zhabs lhag ma'o// 'dod pa rab 'dod gdung ba
43a6(mngon brjod): dang // zhen pa chags pa sred pa'o// 'brog pa phyugs skyong ba lang 'grang // ba 'jo zho mkhan lcags thogs so// ba lang ma he la sogs pa// rkang ldan nor ldan gnyis ni phyug phyug go// ba ldan go mI phyug sa ltas 'tsher dang ba
43b1(mngon brjod): yang rgyu// nog can bzang po stobs ldan dang // glang dang khyu mchog gi bri sha dang // 'dren byed pa lang 'gro byed do// nog can tshogs pa uk+Sha kaM/ ba khru ba tshogs pa lang 'dus// be'u be ru bAt+ma ka/ grus ma'o// khyu ba nog chen mA ho kA/ bri d+ho
43b2(mngon brjod): ukr-I glang rgan no// nog skyes pa dang gsar nog 'chas// gnya' 'dul glang gsar 'dra ba'o// sha bcad ma ning sbyor ba'o// ma ning mkhan po ba dI ra// dpung pa'i phyogs ni ba ha'o// sa snA ski yi lkog shal lo// sna thag dang ni kha thAg go/
43b3(mngon brjod): rgyab len 'gro dad khur 'gro ba// gnya' shing la sogs b+ho d+ha ra// gnya'i shing glang 'dul ba dang shing rta 'dren// rmod byed gcod byed 'phra byed pa// gshol ldan+da rmo gling khal glang dang // rgal dang khal pa khur 'dren pa// gnyis po gcig gi khur
43b4(mngon brjod): thig pa// tshig thag gcig pus 'dren pa'o// kun gyi khur thag dul ma dang // khur kun 'dren par nus pa'o// po mo ba dang gau ru sra// mchod byed dang ni ro ldan ma// mchod pa mchod yon hI ni// ba lang mchog nI na tsi kI/ kha dog la
43b5(mngon brjod): sogs dbye ba'i ming // khra mo dkar po la sogs paM// lo gnyis me dang lo gnyis pa// lo gcig mi dang lo gcig pa// be'u med dang ba skam mo// a pa to ke be'u sho rA// de dang sha dang khyu mchog sbyor// de na lo be khur ruM ma// dus thob
43b6(mngon brjod): 'khor mdo dus so// praSh+To hI dang po gsar ro// a tsaN+Da nI dul ma'o// be mangs ma dang lo be ma// be spun ring ba baSh+ka ya NI// d+he nu be'u gsar skyes so// sbyin pa dang ni 'jo ba de ma// nu 'thung 'bung ba'i nu ma'o// dro Ne k+Shi ra bre chen bzhod/
44a1(mngon brjod): 'dogs thags 'thing thag stan byed pa// lo re zhing skye ba'o// lo btud skye dang slar sgyu ma// u d+ha ma ning mA bI naM// btod pa'i shing dang phur pa'o// mo min thag pa 'dogs thag go// phyug thag rkang thag dA ma ni// srub ma srub
44a2(mngon brjod): shing mnA na// srub ma dang ni zho skya'o// srub pa'i ka bau ku tha ro// zho rdza sru kha pa'i rnga ma mtshungs// rnga mo ri ma can rang bzhin lus chen po// rde'u dang ni rnge phrug go// rde'u 'dogs thag shri kha la// shing la rkang pa 'dogs pa'o// ra dang tsAHgI tshe tsha
44a3(mngon brjod): dang // ra dang sgra 'phyang ma skyes pa// lug dang lto 'phyang bal ldan dang // g.yang dkar dang ni a Da kA/ rnga mo brang 'gro 'tshogs dang khyu// rnga khwa gsus 'phyang bong bu 'khor lo can stobs ldan// sna chen skad tshan kha ra'o// gzhan skyes ded
44a4(mngon brjod): dpon ngas 'gro dkor dang // tshong dpon tshod pa zong 'otshod dang // zong pa dang ni nyo tshong ngo // 'tshong pa bi kra ko'o// nyo ba kra yi ka mtshungs// bi tsang bya ba DoM dz+yA yin no// rin dang gzhal bya ba kA ya// zong dang tshong dngos rtsa nor dang // rnyed pa lhag
44a5(mngon brjod): pir 'bras bu can// so sor byin dang yongs su bsgyur ba'o// brje ba dang ni bsgyur ba'o// skyes bus gtams pa bya ba'o// slar blangs dang ni gtad pa'o// tshong zong bkram po pyaM ngo // kre ya gzhal bar bya ba'o// tshong dang bsgyur
44a6(mngon brjod): ldog nyi tshong sogs// gsum/ ma ning bden zong bden byed// bden byas mo 'tshod pa dang na bi kra ya// bgrang ba grangs bya bcu ni gsum// nyi shu la sogs thams cad gcig/ bgrang bya la sogs pa// grangs do ni gnyis
44b1(mngon brjod): dang mang po'i tshig/ dgu bcu pa ni mo yin no// phreng ni brgya dang stong lnga stsogs// go ram bcu yi yon tan phyi// 'jal byed chang byang mnyam byed ces// chud kyi don ni gsum yin no// 'jal byed srang dang sor dang bri// mA ru lnga sogs
44b2(mngon brjod): mA sha ka/ de rnams bcu drug zhe gnyis te// ma ma ni srang ni dkar Sha bzhi yin no// gser 'jal zho cha gas ra mig go/ ku ru bi tA rta yaM srang // snyoms byed mo min srang brgya dang // khur yin nyi shu tham pa ni// srang / A tsi tro na khur
44b3(mngon brjod): bcu'o// shing rta khur d+ha a tsi ta// kAR+ShA pa na dong tshe yin// zangs ma'i dong tshe kA rI ke/ mo min bre bo che// bzhi cha bzhi pa bcu drug nyi shA ni// ni kuny+tse ka/ ku ra kho dang bre la sogs// yongs su 'ja'adaso pa'o// rkang pa dang ni gcig cha yin//
44b4(mngon brjod): cha dang chags 'god pa'o// rdzas dang yo byad nor dang ni// 'byor pa dngos po dkar dang rdzas// rin chen bang zing longs spyod do na// no bu dang dngos po nyid kyang ngo // mdzod dang rin chen gser gzugs dang / snad ces bya ba'o// de dag
44b5(mngon brjod): gang zhig gzhan mdzod dang // dngul dang de gnyis mA ha taM// mkha' lding gshog pa ma ra ka ta dang // rdo yi snying dang nor bu ljang // rin chen dmar po hi ta ka/ pad+ma rA ga de nas ni// mu tig dang ni muta'o// de nas dwe ma ni skyes bu sta/
44b6(mngon brjod): ru pho dang ma ning ngo // rin tshan nor bu gnyis yin te// rdo skyes mu tige la sogs dang // gser dang mdog bzangs ka ng+ka kaM/ rin chen te mchod dus 'drim// bsreg bya bum brgya gaM gA skyes// b+h+ra ma mdangs ldan sa le sbrus// skyes
45a1(mngon brjod): sa kha dag chen po dang // mdog ldan 'od byed ma chu gser// rkang brgyad dang ni mo man na// rgyanA gas nga zhig na dang // kan kaM ces pa 'di/ mdog ngan tshun dang dngul dang ni// bar du rang /
45a2(mngon brjod): dang / rI rI ming dang ragan ma yin// de nas blangs dang mu wA dang // kla kle kha dog zangs ma dang // dum+ba Ni'o// lcags ni mo med mtshon nyid na// gang bu dag po gar bu dang // rna y-i sing ba de nas ni// sa rdo lcags deg ma/
45a3(mngon brjod): can thams cad yang dag lugs// lcags kyi bye brag ga/ la lcags dang // mching bu g.yu gser de nas ni// rgyag byed dngul chu 'ded byed dang // khu ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o// ba ba la ma ni mA he'i rwa// lhang tsher rI skyes dr-i mA ma //
45a4(mngon brjod): srol mr-ig sman sau bI rI// mig sman kA pi ta yA mu naM// spangs pa'i mig sman rtse can mgrin// sngon po dang ni rmu t+ya'i migri no// spangs maM btub ba dArbi kA/ pA rtses pa las byung spangs ma'o// khu bo'i mig sman khu ba'i snying // ying dr-i
45a5(mngon brjod): rdo mu zi dri ldan dang // na du dr-i/ migra sman rigs can ku lad thig/ dus kyi me togla me tog TI// me tog mig sman poSh+ma ka/ ba bla ser po tA la mA lA// ha ri ta la kaM/ brag kun man+ta ri skyes drang // rdo skyes shing lA dzA tu'o// 'byor
45a6(mngon brjod): dri sprin srog can dang // gor bu go sa ri bong mnyam// rgya mtsho sbu ba phin sU// sin+du ra dang li khri'o// nA gzhi nyi mtshon mo stengs// ro nyi tra pu bi ts+tsha Ta// mtshon dang gshi'i tso mkhor ba'i rgyu// de nas bcag ces bya ba'o//
45b1(mngon brjod): le brgan me lce mtshon chen po// zhes pa 'dra lug snam bal gos// ri bong ba la ni sha sha lo ma'o// sbrang dang mngar ldan mA kI sogs// sbrang snyigs dang ni sra tshil lo// ma na ri skyes ldong ros dang // ldong ros dang nI klu l+ye bA// ne bA lI ni
45b2(mngon brjod): kuN+Di go la// yA bak+Sha nas sogs skyes// smin pa/ de nas/ n+ya tshwa kA bo ta// su kha brtsa kar+ya na'o// sha tshA be sha ro tsa nI// myar skyes dkar po pho ba ris// mo rA TaM rtsu ba bur shIng // mdung can pa pya lI'i rtsa// rU Ti kaM shir zhes pa yang
45b3(mngon brjod): ngo/ go la maM dnga'ibyung po'i sgra// pho/ bi tAng ga dang tsan dan dmar// tshwa ba gsum dang uSh+TaM byo Sha// 'bras buM gsum ni pha la tri ko/ rje rags kyi sde mtshan no// / dmangs rigs dang ni phyes skyes
45b4(mngon brjod): dang tra/ chos snum dang ni byin skyes so// kun gtum mthar thug 'dres ma'o// sman pa ri mo mkhan la sogs// dmangs dang rjes skyes ri mo mkhan// sman pa rje'u gnyis skyes las// dmangs dang rgyal 'dres drag pa'o// bye bas
45b5(mngon brjod): 'tsho ba rgyal rje sa 'dres// mA hau Sha ni 'phag rgyal 'dres// k+Sha ta 'phags pa dmangs mo'i bu// bram ze rgyal 'dras sU ta'o// de yi rjes 'dres baM de ha/ shing rta mkhan po mA hA Sh+yA// ri mo mkhan las byung ba'o// kun gtu ma~M pA yaM
45b6(mngon brjod): skye ba ni/ bram ze mo dang chos sgrub las// byed mkhan dang ni bzo bo dang // tshogs pa de rnams gnyis yin te// she sa nyen mkhan dang ba zo ba'i rigs// rigs ldan rigs kyi gtso bo dang // me tog mkhan po mA li ka/
46a1(mngon brjod): bum pa mkhan dang rdza mkhan no// zhal ba mkhan po le ba ka/ tan tA pA ya thags mkhan no// tshem bu ba dang gos bzo ba// ri mos 'tsho ba tsi tra ka ra// mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan// lham mkhan dang ni ko lpags
46a2(mngon brjod): mkhan/ lcags ba zo ba dang lcags mgar ro// gse mag ra swar+Na ka ra dang // gse re mkhan dang ni gser bzo ba// dung bzo ba dang dung mkhan no// zangs mkhan dang ni zangs mgar ba// shin mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog bya/
46a3(mngon brjod): shing rta byid ding shing 'jog mkhyen// phra mkhan dang ni khyim shing mkhan// khyim gnas dang ni bza' mo'o// breg mkhan skra mkhan ma tho ris dgrags// nA pi ta dang mthar gnas pa// tshes ma dang btso rlag mkhan// chang 'tshong ma
46a4(mngon brjod): dang chad ma'o// ra rdzi dang ni ro skyong ba// lha yis 'tsho dang lha gnyer ba// sgyu ma ba dang sgyu ma mkhan// sgyu ma byad dang so sor 'phrog/ gar ba dang ni gar mkhan no// bud med kyis 'tsho bud med bskyangs// b+ha ra ta zhes gar drang ni// rkang
46a5(mngon brjod): pA ba dang gar gyi gtso// rnga pra dang ni rnga rdung ba// lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rde ba// gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud// pi wang pa dang pi wang mkhan// 'tsho ba tha chad bya ba shor ba// gnyis/ bya bsnyi ba dang bya brgya pa// rngon pa snyi pa shan pa
46a6(mngon brjod): lings/ gsum/ gla ma gla zan las byed pa// zho shas 'tsho ba zhes pa'o// bang chen pa dang phrin pa'o// khur 'dren pa dang khur pa'o// rigs med dman pa na rigs dang // phal pa dang ni so so skye// ngan pa dmangs rags
46b1(mngon brjod): dzAdzal+la dang // chung ba dang ni dman pa'o// khol dang g.yog dang bran dang ni// dA sa g.yog po tsi Ta ka/ zhabs 'bring sbra 'jug bsgo bye ba// zhabs thog pa dang yongs su spyod// gzhan gsos dang ni btsal bu dang // gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyis
46b2(mngon brjod): bsgyings// tha shel lto 'gengs le lo ba// ldar pa glan glen mi gsal ba// mkhas pa khram pa sgren po dang // gsel po grung po spyang po'o// gtum po skyal mkha na glang po dang // nyin tshe chos mad+ma sdig can drang // khri ra mthar gnas
46b3(mngon brjod): gtum po dang // ngan thabs pa dang dbye ba ni// mon pa dang ni sha ba ri// shing shun pa dang kla klo skyes// gshed ma dang ni ri dgas gsod// rngon pas 'o tshe dang lings pa'o// khyi dang khyi mo sgrogs byed do// ri dgas za dang smra byed dang // khyi
46b4(mngon brjod): gal dang rngan thabs sbyor ba'o// rdo so dang sta thag ri dgas rgya// mi dge ba/ khyi mo dang ni shu nI'o// rgyag zan pag pa grong gnas so// brka ra ni dud 'gro gzhon// kun zas rI dgas pa dang ni// rngon pa ri dgas mthar byed mo// g.yas
46b5(mngon brjod): phyogs rmas pa lus tha yo ga/ yan lag dran pa/ chom po rkun pa rkun po dang // srang po chom rkun 'jab bu ga/ ar+the gzhan dang rkun mdzag rkun nor rkun rdzas tshomes dang ni// rkun rdzas lkog nor de nags na// rgya dong snyi dang // 'ching
46b6(mngon brjod): byo ri dgas bya rnams so// 'bring zas ngan pa'i 'khrul 'khor ro// ri dgas 'dzin dang ri dgas 'ching // zhags pa sgril ma mo dang thag/ gsum yini srad bu yin no// zo chu khyud dang bum pa'i 'khrul// chu 'bab dang ni chu yi 'khrul//
47a1(mngon brjod): skyes bu thag bzangs stag ma'o// sbrul ma srad bu tan+ta pa// thags 'thag b+hu ti mo dag 'dra// byug pa zhal ba la sogs las// gzugs brnyan dang ni 'bag yin te// dngos po so la sogs las byas// sgom
47a2(mngon brjod): dang mdzod dang snod pa nga pa// de nas khur shing mnya' shing ngo // de nas/ lha ma dang chags dang bcag lham mo// mau/ zhabs stegs dang ni rkang btegs so// 'breng thag 'brang zhabs ko thag go/ rta sogs lcug ni kA shA'o// gtum po rnams kyi
47a3(mngon brjod): pi wang ni// tsaN+Di la dang bal+li kI/ rA nA tsi dang zho cha'o// gser dpyod rdo ni ka Sha'o// chan gri pa tra ba ra shu/ ri Shi kA tu li kA sa me// 'od can lugs skong mu ShA'o// skud pa ko ba'i sdud pa dang // gsor dang 'bigs byed ces bya'o// chan gri karta
47a4(mngon brjod): ri ni 'dra// shing za bzod dang shing 'bigs dang // De ka rdo ba'i bzong yin no// sog le mo min gcod byed do// I ra kau be 'bigs byed smyung // lcags skam sbom po lcags gzugs so// bzod dang las dang tshwa la sogs// sku gzugs
47a5(mngon brjod): gzugs brnyana? pra ti mA// lder so dang ni slar grib ma// slar byas 'dra dang pho ni mtshungs// dpa' dang nye bar 'jal ba dang // brjod bya'i rtags can mnyam dang mtshungs// de 'dra de mnyam de dang mtshungs// de yi gzhi 'dzin de 'dra'o// phyi
47a6(mngon brjod): tshig nyer sbyor 'di rnams ni// 'dra ba mnyam pa mtshungs pa dang // lta bu dang ni dpe la sogs// las sla sgrub sla rngan pa dang // bya dga' gla dang ngag dang ni// khur gla gla dang rin dang ni// yon dang rnyed pa 'ong // chang dang gshol ldan mnyes
47b1(mngon brjod): pra dang / hA la yongs 'bab chu bdag skyes// dri mchog rab dad+mas e rA dang // ka dam+ba ra yang yongs su thos// myos byed dga' byed mar+ya chang // a pa da sha chang lpags so// chang tshang chang mal btung ba'i gnas// ma d+ha bA ra sbrang gi chang // /
47b2(mngon brjod): me tog sbrang chang mA d+ha ba// mAng ra ldan spring gi tshon gnyis// ma re ya dang me tog chung // bur chang me da ka dang ni// sbyar tshang mtshungs// san+d+hi na ma ni chang g.yos so// phabs dang pho ni chang rtsi'o// nying khu bdud rtsi'i snying po da // chang ra
47b3(mngon brjod): 'chang 'thung gnas dang ni// chang skyegs mo min chang snod dang // kham por dang ni tshim byed do// tshe long rgyan po sho dang ni// za rgyan rtsed rgyan mtshungs pa'o// khas len dang ni gnya' ba'o// mgo 'thu bo dang cha 'dzin no// shing rtse mo min
47b4(mngon brjod): rgyab 'gyed dang // kaM ta ba dang pa NA zhes// pa Na a kA gle ha/ sho dang tshe long pA sha kA/ yongs 'dren brkyang dang khyi dang rdo// mo min rkang brgyad sho yi stan// srog chags skugs drang sho rgyal po// rab tu mang po la sbyor phyir// gcig
47b5(mngon brjod): tu bshad pas 'dir gang sbyor// dri las chos gzhan la yang 'jug/ rtags kyi mtha'i las bsgrub par bya// dmyangs rigs kyi sde mtshan no// // 'dir 'chi ba med pa'i seng ges sbyar ba'i ming dang rtags kyi rjes su bshad
47b6(mngon brjod): pa las sa gzhi'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// // khyad par can gyi dbang byed pa// spre la ma dong ni sna tshogs don// mi zad rtags sogs bsdus rnams kyis// sde tshan phyi sde 'dren ma rnams// mo dang bud med la sogs kyis// /
48a1(mngon brjod): khyad par can ni gang mthong bas// de yi skabs kyi tshogs kyis so// yon tan rdzas dang bya ba'i sgra// de bzhin de yi dbye ba rnams// legs byas bsod nams nor dang ldan// blo che ba dang bsam yangs so// snying du sdug
48a2(mngon brjod): dang yid dga' 'o// spro ba che dang dga' ba rje// shes can gro can mngon par mkhyen// rnam mkhyen nges ldan bslabs shes can// nges shes kha byang goms can dang // dge ba zhes kyang bya ba'o// mchod pa dang ni rab tu sbyin// the tshom yid gnyis
48a3(mngon brjod): ma nges pa// yon gnas dang ni mchod pa'i 'os// de lnga sbyin pa'i 'os zhes bya// gtong phod dang ni dpal stag dang // byin rlabs can dang rab tu ster// yun ring 'tsho dang tshe ldan no// shis nyan can dang bstan bcos rigs// yongs su rtog
48a4(mngon brjod): dang rgyu mtshan can// mchod sbyin dang ni rab tu sbyin// yid dga' mgu dang yod rab bde// sems dga' 'o// yid ngan sems ngan mi dga' ba// blo chud zos dang sems myos pa// g.yo mad drang dang sgyu med pa// pu ka lA dang sbyin dang
48a5(mngon brjod): sterade yi pha rol chags dang zhe na// do ni 'dod 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang // shes ldan rgya cher grags pa can// rigs ldan rnam shes rnam par thos// yon tan nor ldan/ rang bzhin byas dang mtshan nyid can// nor ldan
48a6(mngon brjod): 'byor ldan yon tan can// bdag po dbang phyug pa ti dang // phyug po dpon po gtso bo dang // dpon mgo mgo 'dren rje bo dang // lhag par 'phel dang chen por skyes// nyug ru ma nyams pa 'og med dang // khyi khol srung ma skyes
48b1(mngon brjod): bu'o// yan lag mchog ldan gzugs ldan ma// mdzes ldan dang ni bud med do// nges byed bya ba byed pa dang // gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'o// smra mi byed dang lkugs pa'o// yid la bcags dang pha lta bu// dga' bas brgyan byas
48b2(mngon brjod): bu mo dang // 'ga' zhig sbyin byed 'phags pa'i gnas// dpal ldan phun tshogs bkra shis dpal// mnyes gshin po dang mthong tsher dang // brtse ba thugs rje snying rje dang // dga' bar byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rang rgyu rang dbang bdag bdag
48b3(mngon brjod): ga dang // rang dbang gzhan gyis ma bzung ba// gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang // rang bdag dbang med dag bdag dbang min// gzhan dbang dbang med 'dzin pa can// phyugs ma dang ni mang pos byed// shin tu thogs dang yun
48b4(mngon brjod): ring byed// 'dres mar spyod dang ci grub byed// dman dang ngan dang byed 'khos chung // lus nus las shogs che ba dang // byed mkhas las pa'i ngang tshul dang // kar+m+ma shi lo yaHlas dpa' ba dang // mgo thon byed gsos po las byed// las
48b5(mngon brjod): mi dai[:]yi byed pa tson// skyes khrus dang ni shing khrus so// kums dang shi yi zas dang ni// lhogs dang bkres dang bu ba tshwa// zas 'dod gzhan zas pha rol zas// lto cha drod chen dang kha bde// snyoms las sgying sbru rau dang ni
48b6(mngon brjod): 'jas po gnyis ni// bdag 'gongs rang drod 'gengs// bdag drod 'gengs pa'o// kun pa kun gyis 'tsho ba'o// 'dod can rnga can zhan can dang // mngon 'dod dang ni sred can dang // 'dra ba 'dod chen yang yang 'dod// myos pa dang ni
49a1(mngon brjod): ra ro ba/ ma dul ba dang ma zhi ba// rgyags pa rgod pa g.yo ldan rengs// chags pa 'dod can sred pa can// rdo can 'dod ldan sred ldan dang // mngon 'dod can sgrub can dul 'dzin// tshigs rtan/ a shra ba/ dbang dang
49a2(mngon brjod): rang dgrar byed pa'o// zhi ba dul ba mnyen pa mtshungs// spyi brtol spobs can dpral sgo can// 'tsher ba med dang skyengs pa med// 'dzem ming dang ni gdong ngas mang // 'tsher can dang ni ngo mtshar can// mi brtan srab pa bag tsha'o// 'jigs
49a3(mngon brjod): can 'jigs rung ma rungs pa// brlab sems yi de 'dod// khyim chags khyim zhen can// dad can dang chags can// lhung 'dod dang ni 'babs 'dod do// phyag byed mngon par smra// gsod dang 'joms 'dod rnam par 'tshe// 'phel 'dod
49a4(mngon brjod): dang ni mun skyes so// 'phur 'dod dang ni steng 'gro 'dod// rgyan 'dod dang ni rgyan cha 'dod// 'gyur 'dod yin 'dod// 'khor 'dod 'jug 'dod 'dra ba'o// kha 'gog pa dang nye bar chu 'dod// ngag 'dod 'jam dang ni tshig 'jam pa// shes
49a5(mngon brjod): ldan rnam da pyod thag le dang // rnam par rgyas dang rnam par gsal// brkyang ba bdal ba rab tu brkyang // rnam par brkyang // mnag nus sron nus bzod pa dang // rkyen thub tshugs thub bzod pa'o// gtum po shin tu khro ba'o// gnyid
49a6(mngon brjod): ming dang ni ga nyid chag go// gnyid yur ba dang rab tu thabs// gnyid 'dod gnyid 'dod gnyid log 'dod// 'bab 'dod dang ni nyal 'dod mtshungs// pha rol kha phyogs gzhan du phyogs// 'og tu phyogs dang kha bu pa dang // lha
49b1(mngon brjod): 'gro lnga la phyogs pa'o// sna tshogs 'gro ba kun tu 'gro/ gang zhig lhan cig dus gcig go// dud 'gro dang ni 'phreng la 'gro/ smra ba brjod pa zlos pa'o// ngag dbang dag gi bdag po mtshungs// gsung ldan gsal po smra mkhas so// gtam
49b2(mngon brjod): dang lo rgyas lab bzangs dpe// sma bzangs ske mang gtam mang po// kha ngan tshig ngan kha 'tshengs so// nus dang dga' bar smra byed pa// ma dag pa dang gtam mi gsal// 'dra ba kha ngan ngan smras so// 'bras bu mi gsal gtam
49b3(mngon brjod): mi gsal// skad dang sgra/ bstod sme ba sngags pa brjod pa mtshungs// dag pa lkugs pa glen pa dang // ma thos pa dang ma bslabs pa// ma sla ba dang kha rog pa// gcer bu gos med phyogs kyi gos// smra ba ngan dang mi gsal ba// bton
49b4(mngon brjod): pa dang ni phyung ba'o// smad pa dang ni dinra smras so// kha rgyal ba dang shugs rgyal ba// lag yangs dang ni ster 'dod 'dra// tshige sdig dang ni sma ra smra ba// 'ching byed phur bu 'gog byed do// don meng pa dang stong pa thob// nyam nga ba dang
49b5(mngon brjod): bag tsha ba// byi bshor sun 'byin kA ri ti// g.yo ba dang ni sems mi gnas// mnar dang gzhan gyis 'chir ba gnyis// la gre stong dang ni ga yo ba 'dra// bAg tsha ba dang 'a khyor ba'o// 'chi ltas sun 'byin blo gros can// lcag/
49b6(mngon brjod): gis bzhus dang 'brab par bong // tshig bzhus rta yis bsang bya dang // zhe sdang ni 'khrug pa'o// bsad bya mgo gcod 'di gnyis mtshungs// dug ster dug gis bsad bya ba// gtun shing gtun gyis brdung ba dang // sdig spyang
50a1(mngon brjod): dang ni nag po'i las// so mi gsod dang rnam g.yeng 'dra// skyon 'dzin pha rol nyes pa rtog/ sgyu can dang ni g.yo can kyog/ rna bar zlos dang phra ma dang // phra ma dbyes dang btsugs mkhan zhes// rnam 'tshe 'joms byed 'tshe
50a2(mngon brjod): ba sdig/ ma rungs pa dang ma sbyangs pa// mi shes rmongs pa glen pa dang // 'doms pa mi rig mi mtshon pa// mchums pa cha pra ser sna can// zhib mo 'dzangs pa srin chos pa// nor med bsgrub ngan bkren po dang // dbul po ngan 'gro phongs
50a3(mngon brjod): ba'o// slong mo sbrang po lam pa dang // mul po dang ni don 'dod pa// nga rgyal can dang haM yung ngo // dge ldan dang ni bsod nams can// mtho ris skyes dang lha rnams so// mi dang phyugs sogs mngal nas skyes// drod gsher sha sbrang srin bu
50a4(mngon brjod): sogs// bya dang sbrul sogs sgrod skyes rnams// shing dang sngo sogs sa gzhi skyes// sas bskrun ses bskyed sa las 'khrungs// shin tu mdzes dang sdug pa dang // mdzes dang sdug dang lags pa dang // bzang po dang ni brjid can dang // yid
50a5(mngon brjod): 'od snying sdug mtshu ra ba dang // yad 'phrog 'jam dang mdzes pa'o// de ni shin tu mdzes pa ste// gang gis lta bas cho ga mI shes// mdza' bo snying sna ga yid mthun dang // yid btsugs bag phebs mdza' ba'o// rigs dman
50a6(mngon brjod): ngan rigs mtshon cha ba// mthar gnas sdig can gshed ma dang // ngan pa tha shal bsham pa dang // g.yung po dang ni rigs ngan mtshungs// dri tsin mdog nag nyams dang skyes// gtsang dag dri ma med pa'o// ye dag rang bzhin dri med
50b1(mngon brjod): don/ bkrus dang sbyangs dang bsangs pa dang // dag byas dri ma med par byas// snying po med dang 'bras stong dang // stong pa gsog gsob ya ma brla// mA ning gtso bo dang po'i sgo// dpon dang gong ma mchog dang ni// gdong dang mchog dang rab
50b2(mngon brjod): che shoswa chen po phul byung tshe/ dang po rab mchog gong ma dang // phul byung gyo nom shin tu mchog/ bla na med dang shin tu mdzes// phyis kyi tshig can stag dang ni// skyes bu khyu mchog glang chen dang // seng ge sAdz+wa la dang ni// glang chen la sogs
50b3(mngon brjod): skyes bu ni// gtso bo'i don gyi spyod yul lo// gong ma ma yin dman pa gnyis// 'og ma dang ni ma rabs so// rgya tshan ya ngas dang chen po dang // rna chen rabs che mi hA ste// chen po/ rgyas dang mthug dang sbom dang che// chung ba nyung ba
50b4(mngon brjod): cung zad dang // phra mo bgra tsam nyung shas chung // mo ni cung zad nyung ba dang // skyes bu phra mo chung bzegs ma chung // rab mang mang po dpag tu med// tshan can ba hu le ba hA// gang pa khengs pa mang po dang // bstan pa mang po byur ba'o// brgya
50b5(mngon brjod): lo sogs pa'i pha rol gyi// pha rol grangs kyi lhag pas brgya// bgrang byi gang zhig ga Na yaM// grangs kyi ga Ni ta de nas// 'dra ba thams cad pa// sna tshogs ma lus zad par dang // mtha' dag kun dang ril po dang // rangs pa yo ga
50b6(mngon brjod): ma lus pa// rdzogs pa cag gi gang ba dang // dus min pa dang khengs pa'o// stug po bar med phung pa'o// thor re ba dang col le ba// nye logs nyi 'khor drung na mo// glo dang tho 'khor 'dra ba'o// phyogs mthun mnyam byed mtshungs
51a1(mngon brjod): par spyod// byed bcas mgrin mnyam// mtha gcig pa dang 'jug gcig pa// mi bzad pa dang a byA yi// yang dag tags dang 'gyur ba dang // shin tu thams pa zhes yang ngo // phyogs 'du phyogs mtshungs ring dang
51a2(mngon brjod): 'gyangs// shin tu ring 'gyangs ches ring dang // ring po dang ni rgya che ba// zlum po ril po zur med skyong // mtho dang mthon po tshong mo dang // ring dang rtse mo bsgreng dang ma'o// de nas thung ba dma' ba dang // mi mtho thung thung 'phang dma' ba// rtse min
51a3(mngon brjod): dma' dang thung ba'o// yon po kyog po bcu po dang // mi 'drang 'chus dang skur ba dang // kyog pa kyog kyog dge skra can// mi drang ba dang kyog pa'i ming // drang po thed ka srongs pa'o// 'dres ma 'chol pa phyogs gcig min// rtag tu kun tu rgyun du dang //
51a4(mngon brjod): gtan du dang ni chags med pa// brtan po mi 'gyur rang bzhin gnas// gzugs gcig dus khyab mi la gyur pa// gnas gzhan spyod pa gzhan spyod 'dod// bya song byed pa spod// bya byed dang ni bya spyod do// g.yo dang ldeg pa 'gul ba'o// /
51a5(mngon brjod): bskyod pa 'khyoms pa yam yom dang // ldag ldeg shag shig sagra sig dang // yongs su 'gul pa zhes pa'o// stong pa dang ni ting 'dzin no// brtan po dang ni mi 'gyur po// sra mkhregs mi shigs ko tho raM// mi 'jig mi pheng srin dang
51a6(mngon brjod): ni/ gong bu dang ni gor ma'o// 'phel ba rgan po chen po dang // rnying pa sngon skyes dang po pa// rnying ma dang ni yun ring ma/ gsar ma so ma thog ma dang // yag ma gzhon nu gsar pa'o// rab gzhon shin tu gzhon pa dang // 'jam pa
51b1(mngon brjod): dang ni gnyen dang 'bol// rjes 'gro phyi 'bring rjes 'jug dang // rting 'brang ma ning mi zad pa// mngon sum dang ni dbang po'i yul// lkog tu gyur dang mngon sum min// gcig sna gcig sngon gcig rtse dang // gcig song gcig mtho gcig dang po// gcig/
51b2(mngon brjod): rtse sngon du gcig song ba// skyes bu la sogs dang po dang // thog ma dang po la sogs pa// de nas mo dang tha ma dang // phyi ma rting ma rjes ma dang // gsham ma dang ni 'phyi shos so// din med pa dang don stong dang // gsal dang rab gsal dri ma
51b3(mngon brjod): med/ gzhi 'dzin dang ni spyi yin no// re re rkyang rkyang gcig pu'o// tha dad don dang gzhan dang ni// gcig gnas gzhan pa so so ba// tshig mang gcig dbye ming pa dang // muN+Da mi 'phyang ba lugs dang tshul la reg pa dang // 'gog med pa dang
51b4(mngon brjod): ma 'gog pa// ldog pa dang ni phyir ldog pa// gau bzlog dang ni phyin ci ldog/ lus kyi g.yon na sa byaM ngo // a ba sa byaM g.yas phyogs so// shing rta dang ni saM bA d+ha// 'dres pa 'chol ba 'dra ba'o// bsres pa 'khrugs pa 'dres pa'o// skra bregs
51b5(mngon brjod): pa dang bzhar ba'o// mnyes dang gsubs dang 'phur ba'o// rnam 'bab 'gro dang 'gyur ba'o// bar du song dang brjed pa dang // thob pa rnyed pa mtshungs pa'o// ldeg pa 'khyor ba 'gul ba dang // g.yog ldeg pa dang 'dar ba'o// 'phul ba 'dod
51b6(mngon brjod): pa bskul ba dang / bskyod pa 'phul ba 'phen pa mtshungs// yongs su 'phangs da nga ldog pa'o// brkus pa dang ni brkus pa'i don// 'phel dang rab tu skye ba dang // mi 'bab pa dang mi ltung ba// rdeg pa dang ni bsnun pa'o// smin pa tshos pa
52a1(mngon brjod): yib dang gab// g.yog pa dang ni byibs pa'o// zhu bzhun ma/ spangs pa dang ni 'phyar ba'o// bsgo ba dang ni slob pa'o// snoms dang bsnams pa myug dang lan// khron pa'i chu dang chu dong 'dra// bcings pa bsdams pa bsres pa dang //
52a2(mngon brjod): 'gog pa dang ni bcings pa'o// chags pa dang ni zhig po'o// de nas mtshan mo k+Sha rA tA snang med do// rnam par nyams sgo ches pa dang // khril dang ngos 'dzem mdog dang // 'khor ba 'jug po 'khyil ba'o// yang dag 'byor pa sdeb pa dang // thob
52a3(mngon brjod): bya 'gro sdu ba sogs// 'gro ba 'bab pa 'gyu dang 'jug/ bsdoms nas brjod dang bis+t+re yig go// ngan pa dang ni dman par grags// rnam sgrub mang byed sna tshogs so// so sor sgrub/ de nas smod dang skyon brjod do// bcom pa dang ni phye ma
52a4(mngon brjod): re dang rlon// sgra byas sgrog byas 'dra ba'o// 'ching ba 'a khyig pa sdom dang midogs// brjod pa dang ni dkris pa'o// bskol pa dang ni bsngola'i// smin pa'o/ ra'o phrug chos// myung 'das thub par me la sogs// rlung mang
52a5(mngon brjod): deng ni rlung mi 'jug/ chos paM yongs sbyin grol ba'i// gshang ba gci bo bcag byas pa// rgyus pa dang ni gang ba'o// bus nus pa ni brjod bya'o// rgyas btab pa dang ab btab pa/ nyon mongs bzod pa dul bya ste// zhi dri ngani
52a6(mngon brjod): dul ba'o// slong ba dang ni zhu ba'o// bsgo ba dang ni slob pa'o// g.yogs pa dang ni phug pa'o// mchod pa dang ni phul ba'o// gang ba dang ni rdzogs pa'o// nyon sangs dang ni sems sdug go// zin la khang pa/ bsregs dang tshig ma tshig
