109b2(mngon brjod): nyid du 'bad // zla ba'i bya ba bya min dang // gzhan gyi bya ba bya ba 'dir// yang dag bstan te de yi phyir// 'gal ba zhes pa'i gzugs can no// khyod ni zab pas rgya mtsho ste// pa rling pa nyid kyis ri bo yin// 'jig
109b3(mngon brjod): rten rnams la 'dod po ni// ster phyir dpag bsam rkang 'thung ngo // 'dir ni zab pa la sogs pa'o// rgyu rnams ngag gi rgya mtshe ri// dpag bsamo shing yang byed pas na// 'di ni rgyu yi gzugs can no// grogs mo khyod
109b4(mngon brjod): kyi gdong pad 'di// ngang pa'i rgyal pos nyer spyang 'os// dri zhim bung bas don gnyer 'os// zhes pa sbyar ba'i gzugs can no// gtso bo drang ni phal pa la// chos mthun chos mi mthun mthong bas// dpe dang ldog
109b5(mngon brjod): pa can zhes pa'i// gzugs can rnam pa gnyis 'dod dperA// myos pas kun tu dam rA bA yis// bkag pa bzhin gyi zla ba ni// shar ka'i dmar ba phun tshogs pa'i// zla ba la ni rab tu 'gran// lha rnams kyis ni
109b6(mngon brjod): zla ba dang // bdag gis khyod gdong zla ba 'thung // 'di ni gang ba ma yin yang // 'di ni rtag tu dkyil 'khor rdzogs// mdzes ma khyod gdong zla ba ni// 'di ltar gzhan dag gdung byed pas// zla ba nyid du brjod
110a1(mngon brjod): maun+d+ra byas pas// de ni skud pa drug dugs can no// gnas ma khyod gdong tha bas kyang // ba ba mang bar bdag sreg pa// bdag gi skal pa nyid kyi sbyin// rjes 'dri mnyam 'jig ga/ zugs
110a2(mngon brjod): can no// khyod gdong 'dam skyes dor 'dir// sgron mo'i 'khri shing gar mkhan ma// rol sgeg gar byed ces pa ni// yid 'ong gzugs can gyi gzugs can// 'di ni ga dong min 'di pod+ma// 'di dag mig min bung ba'o// 'di rnams
110a3(mngon brjod): ma sa sa byung / dri ga sa
110a4(mngon brjod): dpa yi rnam rtog rnams// mtha' yod ma yin de yi phyir// blo ldan rnams kyis phyogs tsam bstan// ma brjod rjes su dpag par bya// rigs dang bya ba yon tan dang // rdzas tshig gcig na gnas pa yis// gal te ngag
110a5(mngon brjod): kun la phan na// de ni gsal byed du brjod dpar/ lho yi rlung gis 'khri shing bri/ 'dab ma snying pa ldugs par byid // dang po'i lus can rnams kyi yang // khengs pa gsar du 'joms par nus// rgyu'o chu gter bzhi ngogs
110a6(mngon brjod): kyi/ skyed mos tshal du so can to// khor yug ri bo'i khongs su yang / khyod kyi yon tan kun nga'i 'od// sngo bosangs nyid ngo phyogs rnams ni// dbyar skyes sprin gyi phreng ba yis// sa yang rtswa sngon sar pa ni// shin tu
110b1(mngon brjod): gzhon pa'i phreng bas so// khyab 'jug rnam gnon la gnas pas// dA nA'i bu yi 'byor pa dgra/ gang du btang zhing lnga rnams kyis// phun tshogs gang na gnas pa blangs// zhes pa dang po'i gsal byed bstan// de bzhin par dang
110b2(mngon brjod): mtha' yi yang // ngag dag bdag gis bstan par bya// de dag 'ga' zhig 'di lta ste// gar byed ni tsu la pa du// glu yang len no 'jug sgro can// dga' bas rgyas pa'i mig dag kyang // chu 'dzin la ni gtong bar byeng // dri bzhon
110b3(mngon brjod): dal bu 'gyur byed de// zla ba dag kyang me ru 'gyur// tsin+dan byug pa ltung ba yang // mtshon lhung 'khyams pa rnams li'o// chu 'dzin gyi ni rab gtor chu// khyim gyi gtsug pud ldan pa'i tshogs// glog gi thag pa g.yo bo yang // me to ga
110b4(mngon brjod): gzhu can dag gi dpung // khyod kyis ut+pal rna ba lnga// 'dod pa'i mnga' ni mdar stan la// ngas kyang sems ni 'chi ba la// gsum po 'di ni mnyamai du byas// dkar phyogs kyis ni 'od dA kar can// 'phel byed de yis mda' lnga pa//
110b5(mngon brjod): des kyang chags pa chags pas kyang // na chung dga' ba'i dga' ston dpal// zhes pa dang po'i gsal byed na'ang // snga mu snga ma la bltos pa'i// drag gi phreng ba rab sbyar phyir// de ni phreng ba'i gsal byed 'dod// rlung gis gtsubs pa'i
110b6(mngon brjod): chu thigs can// sprin gyis lus med dag gi ni// a zhen cing dreg pa la pa 'phel bar byed// rdul gyi ngag ni sel bar byed// 'dir ni sprin gyi tshig dag dang / a ba le pa'i tshig dag gis// bya ba 'gal ba sbyar ba de/
111a1(mngon brjod): 'gal ba'i don gyi gsal byed do// chu 'dzin dag gi phreng ba 'dis// phyogs rnams kyi ni go skabs phrogs// skar ma yi ni tshogs rnams bzung // dring yang bdag gri srog rnams len// gang phyir nu 'dzin
111a2(mngon brjod): phreng ba yi// bya ba gcig nyid gsal byer 'dir// du mo'i sgra yis nyer blangs pa// de phyir dron gcig gasngal byed do// dri yi bzhon pa yid 'ong mthong // sngo bsang swa ta mA la yi 'od// sprin ni mkha' la rgyu byed de// glang chen 'ad
111a3(mngon brjod): dag sa la'o// 'dir ni chos dag tha dado mIn// sprin dang glang po rnams dag kyang // rgyu ba nyid kyis 'brel pa'i phyir// sbyar ba'i don gyi gsal byed do// rnam pa 'di nyid kho na yis// gsal byed la ni rnam rtog pa// lhag ma rnams
111a4(mngon brjod): kyang rjes 'gro yis// mkhas pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya// gsal byed kyi ni gnas nyid do// don skor dang ni tshig skor dang // gnyi ga bskor ba zhes pa yi// rgyan gsum po dag 'dod de dpar// ka daM pa ni rnam par rgyas//
111a5(mngon brjod): ku Ta dzing+ga maHrab gsal// kan+na l+ya ni rab tu dbye// ku kuM b+ha yang gyes par gyur// sprin gyi phreng ba dag gis nI// rma byi'i tshogs rnams 'dod ldan byed// chu 'dzin rgyal mtshan can gyis ding // na chung rnams yid 'dod
111a6(mngon brjod): lngan byed// kun las rgyal nas di ring khyod// btsun mo rnams dang rtse bar byed// khyod kyi dgra ste mtho ris song // lha mo rnams dang rtse bar byed// dgag po brjod pa 'gog pa ste// dus gsum la bltos rnam pa
111b1(mngon brjod): gsum// dri nas de yang dgag bya yi// dbye ba mthar yas phyir mtha' yas// lus med kyis ni ma tog gi/ mngar lngas kun las rgyal bar gyur// zhes pa mi srid yang na ni// dngos po'i nus pa rnam par bkra/ zhes pa 'di
111b2(mngon brjod): ni rgyu stobs kyis// lus med rgyal bA ri mau rigs blo// de lhor gyur bkag gang gi phyir// 'di 'dra de ni byung ba 'gog/ sAn sgrog ma dag ci yaM phyir// rna ba la ni ut+pal 'jug/ las lce de la ni mig zur dag/ yongs
111b3(mngon brjod): rdzogs min par sems sam ci// 'ga' zhig dkar min ut+pa la// rna bar byed la mdza' bo yi sa// de ltar bstong pas 'gog byed po// 'di ni mngon gyur 'gog pa'o// jo bo bden par smra bo dag/ gzhan dang
111b4(mngon brjod): tsum+ba nas 'phros pa// rgya skyugs kyis dmar mig gis ni// khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ma lags// sngar nyid shin tu khengs ldan mas// nam zhig 'di yi gnod pa dag/ 'byung ba de ltar 'gog byed pa// 'di ni 'byung
111b5(mngon brjod): 'gyur 'gog pa'o// lus phre khyod kyi yan lag rnams// 'jam pa nyid du gnas pa brdzuna?// gal te badren par 'jam pa na// glo bur du bdag ci la gdung // gang phyir de ltar 'dod ldan gyi// de dang 'gal ba'i chos kyi
111b6(mngon brjod): 'dir/ bud med lus ni 'jam pa dag/ 'gog pa 'di ni chos 'gog pa'o// de ni ma dzes sam ma yin zhes// rnam dbye 'di ni ci las skyes// dari ni 'od tsam g.yo ba nyid// mthong bar gyur te rten ma yin// gang 'dir
112a1(mngon brjod): gzugs can ma ngo mtshar// brjod par 'dod pas 'od ces pa'i// chos ni khas blangs chos can dag/ 'gog 'di chos can 'gog pa'o// khyod kyi mig dag dra mar gyur cing // mchu yi yal 'dab g.yo ba
112a2(mngon brjod): dang // smin ma 'khyog ste de lta na 'angadra // nyes pa med pa bdag mi 'jig/ gang phyir mdza' bo mkhas pa yis// 'jigs pa y-i ni rgyu yi gan+do// rang gi nyes pa 'gog byed po// 'di dag 'dir ni rgyu 'gog pa'o// mdza' bo dag ni ring na
112a3(mngon brjod): gnas// chu 'dzin bgrod ldan 'di ni 'ongs// ni tsu la yang rgyas pa mthong // bdag ma shrI min pa 'di ni ci// de rgya chu 'dzin pa grod pa ni// mi bzad pa drag nyer bkod nas// 'bras bu 'chi ba bzlog pa'i phyir// de ni 'bras bu
112a4(mngon brjod): 'gog pa'o// gal te gshegs na gshegs par mdzod// khyod kyi bgad pas bdag la ni// gdung ba yun ring 'a byung mi 'gyur// 'di la khyod ni dogs mi 'tshal// zhes pas 'chi ba gsal byed pas// rjes gnang nyid kyi sgo nas
112a5(mngon brjod): nI// mdza' bo'i baglong pa 'gog byed pa// de ni rjes gnad 'gog pari mang po rnang 'gyur zhing // lam du yang ni bde zhing dge/ bdag srog la yang the tshom mang // 'on kyang mdza' blo 'gro mi bya// mdza' bo 'gro bar sbyor ba
112a6(mngon brjod): yi// rgyu rnams ngag na rab bshad nas// dbang nyid kyis ni de 'gog pa// 'di 'dra dbang gis 'gog pa'o// bdag ni gson re stobs dang ldan// nor gyis bsam pa stobs ldan min// mdza' bo gshegs sam bzhugs
112b1(mngon brjod): lags sam// rang gi gnas skabs smos pa lags// gang phyir 'di ni chags ldan mas// mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed cing // ma gus bzhin du tshig sbyar ba// 'di ni ma gus pas 'gog pa'o// mdza' bo gal te gshegs
112b2(mngon brjod): na bzhud// khyod kyi lam ni shis gyur cig/ gang du khyod ni gshegs pa der// bdag kyang skye ba nyid gyur cig/ de ltar shis brjod lam gyis gang // rang gi gnas skabs gsal byed mas// mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog
112b3(mngon brjod): byed pa/ 'di ni shis brjod kyis 'gog pa'o// gal te khyod 'gro bden nyid na// khyod kyis gzhan yang 'ga' zhig tshe laM// bdag ni glags tshol 'chi ba yis// de ring nyid du 'gog blor 'gyur// gang phyir mdzal ba'i dbang
112b4(mngon brjod): gyur mas// mdza' bo'i bgrod pa 'gog byed pa// tshig rtsu ba yi ge sprin 'gro can// 'di ni rtsub mos 'gog pa'o// gal te gshegs na myur du bzhud// phyi nas gnyen 'dun 'khregs pa'i khas// bsgrags pa'i tshong 'a gro ba
112b5(mngon brjod): yitabagegs gyur khyod kyi rna bar 'ong // gang phyir 'dir ni shin du ni// chags ma grogs nyid byed pa yis// mdza' bo'i bgro da pa 'a gog po 'di// grogs nyid kyis ni 'gog pa'o// bzhud ces khyod dgyes rjod
112b6(mngon brjod): 'dod de// bdag nyid dga' bar byed pa'i tshig/ mi gshegs zhes pa kha nas ni// byung bar gyur la bdag ci byed// mi 'dod dngos la 'bad byas pa'i// 'bras bu phyin ci log skyes pas// don med nye bar bstan pa'i
113a1(mngon brjod): phyir/ tA de ni 'bad pas 'gog pa'o// skad cig lta ba'i gegs byed pa'i// rdzi ma bskyod pa la khro ba// khyod kyi mdza' bo 'gro ba smos// bdag ni de yi 'dod pa 'dod// gang phyir mdza' bo'i gzhan
113a2(mngon brjod): dbang ma// de yis bgrod pa 'gog byed pa'i// don 'di nye bar gsal byed phyir// 'di ni gzhan dbang 'gog pa'o// mgon po 'brul ba bzod pa rA bgyi// grang gis mig bgos bdag la ni// 'dod pas bsnun du mi mthong
113a3(mngon brjod): ba'i 1mthong min mig sman bdag la stsol// 'tsho ba'i thabs ni dka' bo drag/ nye bar bkod nas bdag po ni// 'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'i phyir// 'di 'dra thabs kyi 'gog par brjod// jo bo khyod kyi zha DI la nas tshig/
113a4(mngon brjod): bdag 'gro zhes pa nges par 'byung // mdza' bo dman pa khyod kyis da// ma phyin na yang bdag la ci// mdza' ba rgyas pas ma bsdams pa'i// bdag nyid khro bas mdza' bo yi// 'gro bar rtsom pa bzlog pa gang // 'di
113a5(mngon brjod): ni khro bas 'gog pa'o// ma ba snos bu mos rna pa lA// ma byas chang la ma btab par// khyod kyi dgra yi rdzing nyid du// ut+pal sngon po zags par gyur// mya ngan bcas bzhin ut+pa la// de 'os las ni bzlog byas
113a6(mngon brjod): nas/ mya ngan 'os pa'i skabs ston phyir// 'di ni mya ngon gyis 'gog pa'o// don ni 'ga' yang tshogs ma byas// rigs pa 'ga' yang ma be sgrubs shing // dka' thub 'ga' yang ma bsags par// na tshod
113b1(mngon brjod): mtha' dgra song bar gyur// gang gi phyir 'dir ni tshe song bas// don sgrub la sogs log pa ni// 'gyod pa gtso bor ston byed pa// 'di ni 'gyod pas 'gog pa'o// ci 'di ston gyi chu 'dzin nam// yang na dang prilnga tshogs sum
113b2(mngon brjod): ci// sgra ni skad gradub kyi 'dra ba// thos pas de ni chu 'dzin min// tshes nI ngang pra la yod cing // sbyin gyi rigs la mi reg pas// gang zhig the tshom zlog byed pa// 2di ni the tshom 'gog pa'o// bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid
113b3(mngon brjod): pad+ma la/ sdang zhing snun pa'i dkar 'bras can// khyod gdong zla ba 'dri yod bzhin// zla bra gzhan gyis ci zhig bya// phal pa'i zla ba la brtan pa// de mtshungs yon tan bstan byas nas// gtso bo'i zla ba 'gog byed pa//
113b4(mngon brjod): rnam pa de ltar sbyar bas 'gog/ thams cad mnan yang khyed kyi ni// rnam gnon tshim pa med pa mtshar// yAng na bsreg za 'bar ba la// tshim pa dag ni nam zhig ma thong // gang phyir 'dir ni don gzhon dag/
113b5(mngon brjod): dri yIs chos mtshungs bstan byas nas/ yang mtshan rtsom po 'gog byeng ba// 'di ni don gzhan 'gog pa'o// sbyin pa bro zhes nam yang ni// mi dbang khyod la ma bstod de// gang phyir slong bas khyod kyi nor// rang
113b6(mngon brjod): gi nyid du bsams nas len// zhes pa la sogs 'gog pa yi// rgyo 'gog pa zhes bshad pa ste// phyogs 'di nyid kyis rnam par rtog/ gzhan rnams dag kyang dpag por nus// gang zhig dngos 'gal
114a1(mngon brjod): rab bkod nas// de yi sgrub byed nus pa can+da// dngos po gzhan dag 'go da pa de// don gzhan bkod par shres par bya// kun khyab khyad par la gnas dang // sbyar ba can dang 'gal ba can// mi
114a2(mngon brjod): 'os byed dang 'os pa'i bdag/ khro sa dang mi 'os bzlog pa'o// 'di yi dbye ba de lta sogs// sbyor ba rnams la rab tu mtshon// 'di rnams rang bzhin gsal bya'i phyir// dper rjod phreng ba bstan par bya// legs
114a3(mngon brjod): ldan 'gro ba rnams kyi mig/ nyi ma drang ni zla ba yang // nub par 'gyur ba nyi dro la ltos// nges pa la ni su yis 'gongs// chu 'dzin 'di dag lus can gyi// yongs su gdong ba 'phrog par byed// ba dag tho bo min nam chen
114a4(mngon brjod): po rnams// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi slad du'o// mA la ya yi rlung gis ni// 'jig rten dga' ba skyed par byed// dAk+Shi n+ya nI phun tshogs pa// kun gyi snying sdug ma yin nam// mtshan mor byad 'di dri ma dang // ldan yang
114a5(mngon brjod): 'gro ba dga' bra bskyed// gnyis skyes dbang po skyon ldan yang // gzhan dag rjes su 'dzin par nus// sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa'i 'grin snyan las// byung ba bung ba'i sgra drag kyang // rna bar rtsub pu nyid 'gyur ba// 'dod ldan
114a6(mngon brjod): rnams kyi sdig 'di 'dra// chu skyes 'dab ma'i mal stan 'dis// bdag gi lus ni gdung bar byed// sreg pa'i bdag nyid bsreg za dang // 'dra bas rigs pa ma yin nam// bsi la zer can gyi sa nyams byed mong //
114b1(mngon brjod): drabyid kyi bdag ni ci la gdung // dri ma can gyis spyod pa'i las// dag pas mi 'os pa yin nam// ku mud ldan yang sreg byed na// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas cis mi byed// zla bas bzung rnams rtsubA pa na// nyi mas bzung ba 'jam
114b2(mngon brjod): mi 'gyur// // sgras zin pa'ang rtogs pa yis// dngos po gnyis ni mtshungs gyur pa// der ni g.yo bA brjod pa grang // der ni ba zlog pa can zhes brjod// brtan dang che bI'i bred ga nyid dang // lA ba N+ya sogs yon
114b3(mngon brjod): tAn gyis// khyod dang rgya mtsho mtshungs tha dad // khyod lus 'di 'dra nyid kyis so// gcig la gnas pa'i chos kyis ni// gnyi ga la gnas tha dad dgra/ rtogs pa'i yul du gyur pa'i phyir// 'di ni gcig gi ldog pa can// chu
114b4(mngon brjod): yi phung po dag dang khyod// mtshams las mi mnga' zab pa ste// 'di ni mig sman dang mtshungs la// khyod ni gasngar gyi 'od can no// gang phyir 'di ni granyi ga yi// 'byed byed yon tan+da nag po dang // ser po gnyis kas tha da
114b5(mngon brjod): bstan// 'di ni gnyi ga'i ldog pa can// khyod dang rgya mtsho du rbA rau// sems can chen po brjid dang bcas// 'di yis khyed gnyis tha dad de// 'di ni chung bdag khye do mkhas so// 'di ni sbyar ba'i tshul ldan phyir// sbyar ba can zhes
114b6(mngon brjod): bzung bar mdzod// 'gog pa can dang gtan tshigs can// gnyis po de yang bstan par bya// lugs dang ldan zhing brtan pa dang // rin chen 'byung gnas yin modado kyang // dri ma ldan pa chu srin gnas// khyod kyi 'gran zlar gyur ma
115a1(mngon brjod): yin// ri gling rgya mtshar bcas pa yi// sa ni mtha' dag 'dzin mod kyang // lag 'gro rnams kyi rjer gyur phyir// lhag ma can ni khyod pas dman// skra drug 'jug par mtshungs pa yi// lkog/
115a2(mngon brjod): tsan+da ni 'di 'dra ste// rtogs par gyur pa mtshungs pa yang // skyong bla ni rjes su srub// khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma ste// 'di gnyis kyi ni khyad par yang // pad+ma chu las skyes pa dang // khyod pa/ dong khyod la brten pa'o// rig dgas mig
115a3(mngon brjod): lnga sman sgeg dang // myos pa'i dmar bas reg pa med// khyod kyi mig ni gnyis bo 'di// yon tan de dag nyid kyis brgyan// snga mar dbye ba cim zhig brjod// 'dir ni lhag pra nyid bstan to// slar yang na/ tshungs
115a4(mngon brjod): pa'i ldeg pa can// gzhan drag rab tu bstan par bya// khyod kyi gdong dang pad+ma drakaR+Sha// rgyas shing dri bzang ldan dA pa ste// pad+ma la ni bung ba 'khor// khyod kyi gdong la mig rab g.yo// zla ba 'di ni mkha'i yi rgyan// ngang pa 'di ni chu yi
115a5(mngon brjod): rgyan/ mkha' 'di rgyu skar phreng ba can// chu 'di ku mud rgyas pa can// 'dir ni zla ba dad pa dag/ dka re bA nyid sogs rtogs pa dang // mkha' dang chu ni dag par yang // rtogs byar mtshungs pa'i dbye ba byas// snga ma la ni sgra
115a6(mngon brjod): ldan mtshungs// gnyis ka yang ni tha dad byed// bung ba mig la sogs pa mtshungs// de phyir mtshungs pa'i ldog pa can// rin chen snang bas mi 'phrogs shing // nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi bzlog pa// ling 'o tsho las byung na chung
115b1(mngon brjod): gi/ mun pas lta ba 'gog par byed// mun pa'i rigs las mun pa 'di// lta ba 'gog bya nyid kyis mtshungs// gzhan dag gis ni tha dad bstan// 'di ni rigs mthun ldog pa can// rag tu grags pa'i'o rgyu bzlog nas// gang zhig
115b2(mngon brjod): rgyu gzhan cung zad dam// gang du ga gis ngo bo nyid// ston pa de ni srid pa can// mi 'thungs myos pa'i kA dam+ba// ma phyis dri ma med pa'i mkha'// drungs par ma byas dang bi'i chu// 'gro ba'i yid ni 'phrog par gyur// sman ma bskus
115b3(mngon brjod): par dkar mi ni mag/ mnan pa min par smin ma dma'// mtshon mra bsgos par dmar pa ni// mdzis ma khyod kyi chu 'di'o// gang zhig ma 'thungs la sogs skyes// myos pa nyid sogs rgyu gzhan can// rgyu me dag kyang
115b4(mngon brjod): brjod 'dod pa// de la 'dir ni 'gal ba med// dgos pa min par kha dri zhim// bcos pa min par lus po mdzes// rgyu med dag tu zla ba dgra/ rgyu mtshan med par de dag grogs// bgo sA pa med srog sa tshig gis 'dir//
115b5(mngon brjod): rgyu ni dngos su rab bzlog cing // dri zhim nyid sogs 'bras bu brjod// de phyir de ni srid pa can// dngos po 'ga' zhig nyer bkod nas// de dang mtshungs pa'i dngos po gzhan// bsdus pa'i tshul gyis rjod byed pa// de
115b6(mngon brjod): ni bsdus pa brjod par 'dod// bung po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// pad+ma rgyas lo sbrang rtsa 'thungs// dri zhim rgyas pa ma yin yang // me tog kha ma bye sbyo ra ltos// chags ldan bud med der ma la// dga' ba'i rtse dga' bcing
116a1(mngon brjod): pa dag/ bu mo 'ga' zhig dag la 'dir// 'dod pa 'phel ba ston pA ra byed// khyad par can tsam tha dad cing // khyad par rnam pa mtshungs pa'ang yod// khyad par tha dud tha dad min// 'di ni gzhan pa
116a2(mngon brjod): dag kyang yod// rtswa brtan 'bras bu'i khur gyis ni// slong rnams rtag tu rgyas par byed// grib mo snun pa'i ljon pa che// 'di ni bdag gi yang dag thob// yal ga'i khyon ni mi chung zhing // me tog 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//
116a3(mngon brjod): dam pa'i grib bsil brtan ldan pa'o// shing 'dri skal bas bdag gis rnyed// ga nyi ga la yang skyes bu 'ge'// ljon pa nyid kyis nye bar bsngags// chos rnams thams cad snga ma la// thun mong gzhan la rnam pa gnyis// /
116a4(mngon brjod): sbrul dran 'grogs pa dang bral zhing // rang bzhin gyis ni myangar ba'i nang // kye ma chu yi gter 'di ni// dus kyis yongs su skam par 'gyur// rgya mtsho la ni de mtshungs pa// skyes bu'i ldog pa gsol byed cing // snga ma'i chos
116a5(mngon brjod): ni bzlog pa'i phyir // 'di ni ston med bsdus par brjod// khyad par g+hu ni ts+tshed 'dod gang/ 'jig rten mtshams las brgal gyur pa// phul du byung bas brjod pa 'di// rgyun gyi dum pa yin+da ti dpang // mal+li kA yI b+h+ya
116a6(mngon brjod): tshogs can// lus kun khyab po'i tsan+dan ga sher// dkare ba'i gos can sngon 'gro ma// zla ba'i 'od ni mtshan ma yin// zla ba'i 'od ni lhag pa nyid// khyad 'phags ldan brjod de bzhin du// the tshom phul byung li sogs
116b1(mngon brjod): kyang // gsal phyir cung zad bstan par bya// dga' ma khrod kyi nu mya dang // dpyi yi bar nA smad pa ni// yod dam med ces bdag gi ni// the tshom da dung bzlog ma gyur// ni ti bi ni khyod la nI// rked pa yang ces nges par nus/
116b2(mngon brjod): 'o ma 'dzin pa'i khur gnas pa// rnam pa gzhan du srid pa min// khyod kyi grags pa'i phung po ni// dpagra nus min yang 'dir shong ba// sa skyong srid pa gsum gyi ni// khongs dag e ma shin tu yangs// rgyan ni gzhan pa rnams
116b3(mngon brjod): kyi yang / ngag gi dbang pos mchod gyur pa// phul byung zhes ni brjo da pa 'di// ga/ cig pu nyid ni dpung gnyen brjod// samaso ldan dag gam cig shos kyi// rnam pa gzhan du gnas pa'i tshul// gang du rnam
116b4(mngon brjod): gzhan rab rtog pa// de ni rab rtog du rig dpar// nyi gud nyi mas gdungs pa yi// glang po dag ni 'a tsher 'jug pa// nyi ma'i phyogs gyur pad+ma rnams// gzhom par 'dod pa yin nam snyam// khrus dang btung dang bad rtsi dag/
116b5(mngon brjod): bza' phyir lag ldan chur 'jug pa// de ni khron lan glan phyir zhes// snyen dngags mkhan gyis rab brtags brjod// 'di ni bdag gi ring ba dag/ 'gog byad rna ba'i rgyan zhes te// khyod kyi mig gi sna bA yi// ut+pal
116b6(mngon brjod): dag las 'gongs pa 'dra// mig zur char ni lhung gyur pa// mig gi 'od kyi ut+pa la// reg gam min yang snyan ngag mkhan// de ltar rab tu brtags te brjod// mun pa lus la 'byug go bzhin// mkha' ni mag sman char
117a1(mngon brjod): 'beb bzhin// zhes 'di yang ngo rab rtog pa'i// mtshan nyid ldan pa shin tu mang // 'dir ni bzhin gyi sgra yis 'ga'// ting nge'i mtha' yas dpe ma yin// zhes pa yid ches su 'das nas// dpe nyid
117a2(mngon brjod): du ni 'khrul pa skyed// dpe dang dper bya nyid dag ni// mtshungs pa'i chos la bltos pas na// 'byug go dang ni mun pa la// chos 'di mthong bar gyur ta ma ci// gal te 'byug pa nyid 'dod na// 'byug go ces pa gzhan pa ci// de
117a3(mngon brjod): nyid chos dang chos can yang // zhes pa ma bskos 'chad ma yin// gal te byed po dpe yin na// bya tshig la 'di dbang bral 'gyur// rang gigri bya sgrub mi nus pa// gzhan gyi bltos byar mi 'gyur ro// gang gi 'byug go 'di dang ni//
117a4(mngon brjod): mun pa mtshungs zhes smra na yang // lus la zhes pa ma 'brel to// de yang yon tan mtshungs por blta// dper na khyod pa/ drong zla ba bzhin// zhes pas mdzes pa rtogs 'gyur te// de bzhin 'byug pa 'di la ni// 'byug pa las
117a5(mngon brjod): gzhan rtog sna ma yi na// de phyir 'byug pa 'di dang ni// mun pa byed po lus kyang las// nye bar sbyar rin skyes bu yos// de ltar rab brtags zhes 'drod bya// snyam dang dogs dang nges dang 'dra// min nam zhes pa la sogs
117a6(mngon brjod): pa'isgra yis rab brtags gsal bar byed// bzhin 'di sgra yang de 'dra ba'o// rgyu dang phra mo che dag ni// tshig rnams dag ni rgyan gyi mchog/ rgyu ni byed po shes byed de// de dag rnam pa du me par// ma la ya yi rlung dag
117b1(mngon brjod): ni/ reg cing tsan+dan ljon pa sar pa yi// yal 'dab spyod par byed pa 'di// kun gyi dga' ba skyed par byed// dga' ba bskyed par 'os pa yi// rang bzhin nye bar sbyar ba 'dir// rgyan nyid du ni rlab bstan te// ldogs pa la yang
117b2(mngon brjod): de dang mtshungs// mA la ye yi chu rgyun la// reg cing tsan+dan nu gos bskyod nas// rlung 'dri ma srin po rnams dag ni// nyams par bya phyir nye bar gnas// de ltar gyur pa'i rlung gis ni// 'brel ba'i rims las
117b3(mngon brjod): byung gyur pa// skye bo yid 'ong ma srong la// nyams pa sgrub par byed par nus// 'grub par byed dang rnam 'gyur la// de nyid la bltos rgyu nyid de// 'thob byi'i las la phal char ni// bya ba la bltos sgra nyid do// 'grub par byed
117b4(mngon brjod): pa'i rgyu dag n+d+ha// bstan tAM lcug ma gnyis po ni// da pe ba rjod gnyis ni bkod byas nas// shes par byed pa bstan par bya// lo 'dab gasngar 'khrungs nags tshal dang // 'dam skyes rab tu rgyas pa'i rdzing // zla ba rgyas
117b5(mngon brjod): pa 'dod pa yas// 'gron po lta ba'i dug du byas// khengs pa goms par bya'o zhes// grogs mo mdza' bo'i gnas ba kong la// bu mo smin 'khyo ga mig yon gyi// mchu ni g.yo zhing lta bar byed// nyi ma nub gyur zla
117b6(mngon brjod): ba mdzes// 'dab chags rnams ni gnas su song // zhes pa 'di yang dus kyi skabs// go bar byed pa lags pa nyid// grogs ma khyod yid 'dod gzir ba// zla ba'i zer gyis mi bzlog cing // tsan+dan chu yis mi
118a1(mngon brjod): bzod pa'i// lus kyi drod kyi rtogs par sa bla// zhes pa'i sbyor ba rnams la ni// yid 'ong shes byed rgyu drag mtshen// dngos med rgyu ni yid 'phrog pa// 'ga' zhig rab tu bstan par bya// rigs pa dag ni ma goms
118a2(mngon brjod): dang / blo ldan rnams dang ma 'grogs dang // dbang po dag ni ma bsdams pas// mi rnams rab tu gdung bar 'gyur// 'dod pa rtsa'i gtam gyis myos pa song // ljang tsho yi ni rims dag nyams// rmongs pa zad cing sred pa 'phos//
118a3(mngon brjod): bsod nams gunas la yid dag byas// nags tsha la 'di dag khyim ma yin// chu klung 'di dag bud med min// ri dwags 'di dag bu tsha min// de phyir bdag ni yid dga' 'o// shin tu ma brtags spyod pa ni// 'phags pa rnams la
118a4(mngon brjod): yod ma yin// de phyir de dag rnams kyi ni// phun tshegs thams cad rtag tu 'phel// skyod tshwal sa hA kA/ rwa rnams// snye ma ma 'khrungs pa min na// 'gron po rnams kyi bud med ni// til bcas khyor chu sbyin byar 'gyur// yad dang
118a5(mngon brjod): med pa'i rang bzhin gyi// 'bras bu skyed pa dag la 'dir// sngar med la sogs rang bzhin gyis// de ngos po yi ni rgyu nyid do// ring 'bras de dang lhan cig skyes// de bzhin 'bras mA skyes dang // rigs min rIg sa pa byed ces pa// /
118a6(mngon brjod): mtshar ba'i rgyu rnams grangs med do// 'di dag sbyor ba'i lam rnams la// btags pa'i tshul la brten pa ni// shin tu mdzes pa dag mthong ste// de yi dper brjod ji ltar na// lus can khyod mig zur zhes pa// rgyal
118b1(mngon brjod): byed lus skyes dag gi mtshon// gang de gzhan la rab 'phangs pa// de yis bdag gi yid kyang bcom// skyes bu lus skyes kyis myos pa'i// rnam 'phrul sna tshogs lhan cig nyid// blad med rnams la bu mo ni// yongs su nub pa'i
118b2(mngon brjod): na tshod skye saphyi nas 'od zer rab 'phros pas// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor shar// sngar nyid ri dgas mgo can gyi// chags pa'i rgya mtsho rgyas par gyur// lha gcig khyod kyi zhabs gnyis po// dmar ba nyi gzhon gyis reg pas//
118b3(mngon brjod): rgyal po rnams kyi lag pa yi// pad+ma zum par byed pa ci// khyod kyi zhabs sen zla ba yi// 'od zer kun da dri med rnams// sa skyong rnams kyi lag pa yi// pad+ma zum par byed la dbang // zhes pa rgyu yi rnam rtog gi/ lugs ni 'di 'dra dag
118b4(mngon brjod): tu bstan// zur drang rnam pas mtshon po'i don// phra phyir phra mau zhes par bshad// nam zhig 'u cag 'i grogs 'gyur zhes// tshogs su brjod par ma bA zad pa'i// mdza' bo rig nas bud med kyis// rtse dga'i pad+ma zum par byas//
118b5(mngon brjod): lus skyes dag gis gzir ba yi// mdza' bo dbugs dbyung 'dod pa yis// pad+ma zum par byas pa las// 'dir ni mtshan mo 'grogs par bstan// glu yi mdun sar khyod la mig/ gtad pa dri gdong chu skyes la// chags pa rgyas
118b6(mngon brjod): par ga sal ba yi// mdzes pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur// 'dir yang ring bzhin mo brjod par// dga' ba'i dga' ston 'dod pa dag/ nges par ga nas po nyid gyur pa// phra mo nyid las bai rgal ma yin// cha ni
119a1(mngon brjod): cha yis dngos po yi// rang bzhin nges par gsal ba bsgrib// dper brjod nyid kyis 'di yi ni// rang bzhin nges par gsal bar bya// rgyal po'i bu mo la chags bdag/ spu long rgya sa pas srung
119a2(mngon brjod): ba pos// rig par 'gyur la e ma mtshur// bsil bri'i rlung ldan yin par shes// ji ltar bu mo mthong nyid na// bdag la dga' ba'i mchi ma byung // rlung gis btsugs pa me tog gi/ rdul gyis bdag mig sun phyung
119a3(mngon brjod): ngo// zhes pa la sogs skabs su ni// rgyan 'di shin tu mdzes pa ste// kha cig cha las smad pa 'am// bstod pa byas pa cha zhes brjod// gang yid g.yul gyi dga' ston la// 'dod pa'i dga' las kyang ma chags// gzi
119a4(mngon brjod): ldan lang tshe yon tan can// rgyal 'di khyod kyi bdag por 'os// brtson 'grus khyad 'phags bstod pa 'dir// smad pa nyid de longs spyod la// rgyun du spyod 'dod bu mo yi// bsam pa dag ni bzlog par nus// gnod pa rab zhil
119a5(mngon brjod): nyid kyi phyir// gang gis snyan par smra ba bslabs// skye bo 'di ni brtse med ga yo// grogs mo de yis bdag la ci// skye bo grogs mos rab bston khengs// chags phyir byed par ma nus nas// skyon ltar snang bas yon
119a6(mngon brjod): tan grang // snyan par smra ba nyid kyang bstan// dngos po rab tu bstan pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du rjes ston pa// grangs dang rim pa bzhin zhes pa// grangs bzhin zhes pa rob tu brjod// khrus lo chur ni rab zhugs ma//
119b1(mngon brjod): khyod kyi 'dzum mig gdong mdzes ni// ku mud ut+pal pad+ma yi// brkus par nges so gzugs can ma// dga' ba mchog tu dga' bar brjod// nyams ldan yid 'ong nyams dang ldan// gzi brjid nga rgyal skyes pa ste// de gsum
119b2(mngon brjod): khyod 'phags dag dang ldan// go bin+da khyod khyim 'ongs la// ding bdag dga' ba skyes pa gang // dga' ba 'di ni slar yang khyod// dus kyi 'ongs nas 'byung bar 'gyur// de 'dri'i dga' ba be du ras// gzhan las min zhes
119b3(mngon brjod): rnyogs par smras// de les gus pa tsam gyis ni// rab bsnyen 'phrog byed shin tu da gyis// zla ba nyi ma rlung sa mkha'// sbyin sreg byed pa'i me dang chu// zhes pa'i gzugs rnams rab bzlas nas// lha khyod lta bar nged kyis
119b4(mngon brjod): nI// mngon sum byas pa'i lha la/ ni// rgyal po rgyal po'i go cha yis// dga' bla rab tu gsal byas gang // de yang dga' bar rjes rtogs bya// / she 'o zhes phra pha rol du// glang dang lo grogs phyir bdag
119b5(mngon brjod): 'chi 'dod da// a bon+ti de bdag gris ni// skye 'di nyid la thob ci ltar// dga' ba nyid ni sngar bstun te// ngo bo che ba nyid ldan pas// dga' blo sgeg pa nyid 'gyur 'di'o// de phyir 'di ni nyams ljon tshig/ gang gis nog mo
119b6(mngon brjod): bdag mdun nas// sgra nas gzung ste drangs gyur pa// bstan dga' sdig can thob pa 'di// skad cig 'tsho bar 'gyur ram ci// zhes pa 'jigs sde dgra dag la// lta bor khro ba mchog gi mthar// 'jebs pa drag po
120a1(mngon brjod): bdag nyid gyur// 'di ni ro dang ldan pa'i tshig/ mtshor bca sa sa las ma rgyal zhing // rnam mang mchod sbyin ma byas la// slong la nor rnams ma byin par// sa skyong du bdag ci ltar 'gyur// zhes pa
120a2(mngon brjod): spro ba khyad 'phags bdag/ dpa' bo'i nyams kyi bdag nyid gnas// nyams ldan nyid du gnas pa la// tshig 'di dag ni dbang ba yin// lus 'jam gang la pad+ma yi// mal ston dag kyang rtswa ba byed ma// lha mo drin ro khang dag/
120a3(mngon brjod): ba sreg za ldan par ji ltar nyal// zhes pa snying rje 'os rgyas pa// rgyan nyid du ni rab tu bshad// de bzhin gzhan yang dam pa dang // gzhad gang rmad byung 'jigs rung ngo // rgyu mas brgyan pa 'i srin po rnams// mgo med ro dang /
120a4(mngon brjod): lhan cig tu/ lag pa sbyar bas khyod dgra'i khrag/ 'thungs shing 'thungs shing gar byed do// grogs mo me tog ma rnying ma// khyod kyi nu ma'i ngos la ni// san rjes sar pa chags pa 'di// s+t+ri dra g.yogs dag gis sgrib par mdzod//
120a5(mngon brjod): dga' tshal ljon pa 'a de rnams kyi// 'dab ma gsar pa gos bzang dang // me tog do shal la sogs rgyan// yal 'dab khang par gyur pa mtshar// rtse mo dag la me gnas pa// brgya byin gyi ni rdo rje gang // 'di ni dran na/
120a6(mngon brjod): lha min gyi// bud med mngal ni ltung byed pa// snyan la grong pa nyid min skyes// brjod bya yi ni nyams dag bstan// 'dir ni nyams brgyad dbang byas te// tshigs rnams nyams dang ldan par bshad// bdag ni gnong pa
120b1(mngon brjod): byed po zhes// khyod kyi snying la 'jigs ma byed// bdag gi ral gri phyir phyogs rnams// nam yang 'joms par 'dod ma yin// zhes pa skyes bu dregs ldan 'gas// g.yul du gzhan ni bkag byas nas// gtong ba de lta bu
120b2(mngon brjod): la sogs// gzi brjid ldan par shes par bya// / 'dod na dngos su ma brjod par// de nyid 'grub par bya ba'i phyir// rnam pa gzhan dag brjod pa gang // de ni rnam grangs brjod par 'dod// sa hA kA ri'i snye me ni//
120b3(mngon brjod): gzhan gyi so 'di za bar byed// de ni bdag gis bzlog par bgyi// khyed gnyis rang dgar 'dug par mdzod// grogs mo skyes phran phrad byas nas// de dag dus sar dga' ba yi// dga' ston sgrub tu gzhug 'dod pas// 'ga'
120b4(mngon brjod): zhig de nas song bar gyur// bya ba 'ga' zhig brtsom pa la// skal pa yi ni stobs las kyang // de yi sgrub byed phun tshogs gang // de ni kun du phan par brjod// khengs pa gzhom phyir de yi ni// rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal ba//
120b5(mngon brjod): bdag la phan phyir dga' ba yi// 'brug gi sgra ni sgra ni glag par gyur// // bsam pa 'am ni 'byor pa yI// chen po nyid ni bla ma dang // dri ni rgya chen zhes pa yi// rgyan du mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod// ro ba Na yi mgo
120b6(mngon brjod): gcod pa'i// bya ba'i khur yang bzod pa gang // ra g+hu'i bu des bla ma yi// bka' las 'da' bar nus ma gyur// rin chen rtsig pa la 'phos par// gzugs brnyan brgya yis bskor gyur pa// lang+ka'i dbang phyug de kho na//
121a1(mngon brjod): any+dzan bus dka' bas shes// snga ma rA bsam pa'i bdag nyid che// 'dir ni mngon par 'byor pa brling // rgya che gnyis po 'di dag kyang // gsal bar rab tu mtshon pa yin// // bskyon pa dag
121a2(mngon brjod): ni bsnyon byas nas// don gzhan cung zad ston pa ste// 'dod pa dag ni ma dar lnga pa// ma yin sgro ldan stong phrag yod// tsan+dan zla 'odra dal bu yi// lho phyogs dri yi bzhon pa 'di// ma yi rang bzhin spro ba ste// gzhan gyi ngor ni
121a3(mngon brjod): bsil zhes grags// 'dod ldan gyis ni gzhan la dr-i// bsil bar khas blangs bdag nyid la// che ba nyid du rab bstan phyir// 'di ni yul la bsnyon pa'o// bdud rtsi zag pa'i 'od zer can// zla ba zhes par bdag cag 'dod// don
121a4(mngon brjod): gyi bdag nyid 'di ni gzhan// dug zag zer dang ldan pa nyid// ces pa zla ba'i zla ba nyid// bzlog nas don gzhon bdag nyid ni// 'dod pas gzir bas brjod pa'i phyir// 'di ni rang bzhin bsnyen par 'dod// dpe yi bsnyon pa sngar
121a5(mngon brjod): nyid dudape rnams la ni rab bstan to// de yis bsnyon pa'i dbye ba rnams// mtshon bya dag la rgya cher mtshon// // sbyar ba gzugs gcig ldan pa'i tshig/ du ma'i don can yin par 'dod// de tshig tha dad min
121a6(mngon brjod): pa dang // tha dad tshig mnga' rnam pa gnyis// 'char ba la gnas mdzes pa can// dkyil 'khor lo chags rgyal po 'di// 'jam pa'i dpya yis 'jig rten gyi// yid ni rab tu 'phrog par byed// rgyal rigs lAm+ba l+ya mI gnas
121b1(mngon brjod): pad+ma/ rgyalnga po skyon gyi 'byung gnas dang // bsdongs nas skyon mang dag gis bdag/ dga' med 'di ltar cis ma mnar// rgyu skur lam la gnas pa dang // mtshan mor byed pa dang bsdongs nas// srong la yis ni bdag 'di ltar//
121b2(mngon brjod): dga' bo med par cis ma mnar// dpe dang gzugs can 'gog pa dang // ldog pa can sogs spyod yul can// sbyar ba gong du bstan zin te// gzhan pa 'ga' zhig bstan par bye// 'ga' zhig bya ba tha dad min// gzhan
121b3(mngon brjod): pa bya ba 'gal min yod// 'gal ba'i lus can dag kyang gzhan// sbyar ba nges pa can yang yod// nges pa 'gog pa'i gzug sde brjod dang // 'gal min 'gal ba can yang ste// de dag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// dpar brjod
121b4(mngon brjod): dgo la gsal bar 'gyur// 'khyog cing yid 'ong rang bzhin can// chags pa gsal bar ston byed ma// mdzes mas bskul ba'i mig dang ni// pho nya mos kyang mdza' bo 'gugs// yid 'ong chags pa 'phel bar byed// 'jam
121b5(mngon brjod): zhing myos pa'i gdangs sbyin cing // khru byug sgra ni thos bya sdu ste// dka/ ra min+da mig can+da drag li 'khyud// chu ma dang sbyar 'phel ba yi// dmar ba rab tu ston byed cing // tshe zar n+dan ni nub gyur te// lus skyes dag ni
121b6(mngon brjod): rnam par rgyal// ral gri nyid la nas ting shaM/ gzhu nyid la ni 'khyog po nyid// mi dbang 'di yi mArga Na// mda' rnams nyid la gnas pa yin// khyod kyis bsrungs la tshir ma ni// pad+mo'i yu ba nyid la'o// 'on kyang chags
122a1(mngon brjod): can 'khrig pa la// 'khyud par gyur pa rnams la'ang mthong // sa 'dzin ka Ta ka mang zhing // gzi brjid ldan pa nges par dar// mkhas pa skye rgyu'i bdag byung ste// rje bo nus pa 'dzin yang de// nyams med
122a2(mngon brjod): yin yang chos gcod min// rgyal po yin yang zad mi shes// bde byed yin yang lag 'gro med// shes so lha yang mkhas bral mi ni// khyad par rab tu bstan pa'i phyi ra// yon tan rigs dang bya ba sogs// gang zhig ma
122a3(mngon brjod): tshang nyid ston pa// de ni khyad par brjod par 'dod// me tog gzhu can dag gi mtshon// rtsub ma yin rno'ang min// de lta na yang 'di yis ni// sa gsum rnams las rgyal bar gyur// 'di dag lha mo yi bu mo mina?// dri za'i rigs las
122a4(mngon brjod): byung ba'ang min// de lta mod kyi tshangs pa'i yang // dka' thub gzhom pa sgrub par nus// khro gnyer dag na ma bsdus shing // so yi g.yogs kyang ma bskyod la// mig kyang dmar por mi gyur par// drug yi rigs ni nyams par
122a5(mngon brjod): byasar+tha/ shing rta med cing glang po'ang med// rta mang rkang thang med pa TIr yang // zur mig nyid kyis bud med rnams// 'gro ba gsum po dag lus rgyal// shing rta 'khor lo gcig pa dang // kha lo ba nyams rta mi mnyam/
122a6(mngon brjod): de lta ni yang gzi brjid can// nyi mas 'gro ba gsum po mnan// gzi byin can zhes khyad par las// 'di ni rgyu yi khyad par brjod// rim pa 'di yis gzhan gyi ni// dbye ba rnams kyang brtag par bya// brjod 'dod yon tan
122b1(mngon brjod): khyukhyad 'phags dang // mtshungs par byas nas 'ga' zhig ni// stod smad la sogs bsgrags pa gang // de ni mtshungs par sbyor bar bshad// gshin rje lus dran chu lha dang // mig stong pa drang khyod nyid kyang // 'jig rten
122b2(mngon brjod): skyong ba zhes pa'i sgra// yul gzhan med pa rnam par 'dzin// ri dgas mig dang 'grogs pa dang // glog gi rtse dga' dag dang ni// sprin gyis rtsom pa'ang rang bzhin gyis// skad cig gnyis par mi gnas so// khyad par sgrub
122b3(mngon brjod): byed slad du ni// gang du dngos po 'gal ba rnams// yang dag 'grogs par rab bstan pa// de ni 'gal bar bshad de dper// ngang po'i rgyal po rnams drag gi/ myos pa'i gdangs snyan ca co 'phel// rma bya rna mas kyi
122b4(mngon brjod): sgra dag ni// yeng 'ong nyid dang bral ba nyams// dbyar skyes chu 'dzin dag gis ni// na mkha' yul ngan lta bur spyod// chags pa yis kyang 'gro ba yi// yud ni kun du chags par gyur// rked pa phra zhing ro smad sbom// mAnu
122b5(mngon brjod): dmar mig ni dkar ba min// lte ba dma' zhing nu ma mtho// bud med lus kyis su ma bcom// pad rtsi'i lag pa chu shing brla// pad+ma'i gdong dang ut+pal mgri/ khyod kyi gzugs kyis bdag cag rnams/ gdung nus min
122b6(mngon brjod): nam lus can ma// skyed tshal rlung gis rab bskyod pa// tsu ta tsam+ba ka yi rgal// reg pa min yang 'gron po yi// mig la mchi ma rib zag byed// snyan par sgrogs ma khyod kyi mig/ nag dkar rjes su dmar ba yang //
123a1(mngon brjod): rna ba dag la ba brten pa ni// su yi yid brtan nyid du 'gyur// de ltar rgyun 'di rnam pa ni// du ma nyid du rab du rtogs bya// skyabs min 'dod pa bstod pa ni// skabs su ma bab bstod pa yin// gzhan
123a2(mngon brjod): mi bsten pa'i ra dgras rna mas// 'bad med rnyed pa sla ba'i nor// chu dang rtsa yi myug sogs kyis// nags rnams su ni bde bar 'tshe// rgyal po'i rjes 'brang nyon mongs pas// yid byung ying dang ldan pas ni// skabs
123a3(mngon brjod): su ma bab nyid du 'dir// ri dgas spyod tshul la de dag bsngags// gal te smad pa bzhin bstod nas// skyon ltar snang po'i yon tan nyid// gang du nye bar thob gyur pa// 'di ni zol gyis bstod par bshad// rA ma dka'
123a4(mngon brjod): thub pa yis kyang // 'byung po 'dzin ma 'di las rgyan// de nyid rgyal po khyod kyis kyang // 'di la khyod ni skyugs ma mdzad// sngon gyi skyes bu las bcad nas// dpal ni khyod kyi yongs spyod pa// rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i rgyud//
123a5(mngon brjod): khyokhyed kyi 'di ni rigs sa ma ci// khyod kyi btsun mo sa gzhi ni// lag 'gro longs spyod dag la chags// ci slong khyod kyi nga rgyal ni// ma tshig gi mtha' ru 'jigs par gyur// de ltar nye bar mtshon pa las// sbyar ba n+dan dang
123a6(mngon brjod): gzhan dag gi/ zol gyis bstod pa'i rnam pa ni// rab tu rgya che ba mtha' dang bral// gal te don gzhan 'jug pa yi// de dang mtshungs pa'i 'bras bu 'ga'// mchog gam mchog min ston byed pa// da ni nges par
123b1(mngon brjod): bstan pa yin// nyi ma 'char ba nyid kyis ni// phun tshogs rnams kyi 'bras bu dag/ grogs po rjes 'dzin bstan pa'i phyir// pad+ma rnams la dpal ster byed// zla ba'i zer gyis reg pa na// 'phral la rgyal po dang 'gal rnams// /
123b2(mngon brjod): ngan pa'i mthar 'gyur gsal byed cing // mun pa'i 'phreng ba nub par 'gyur// yon tan las rnams lhan cig gi/ da ngos po brjod pa lhan cig bA rdzi // don rnams bsnol ba gang yin pa// yongs brjes yin te de dag
123b3(mngon brjod): dper// da ni mtshan mo 'di dag rnams// bdag gi dbugs dang lhan cig ring // zla ba'i rgyan ldan ma rnams kyang // bdag lus nyidri dang lhan cig skye// 'gron po rnams kyi rmongs pa dang // lhan cig tsu ti'i dog pa
123b4(mngon brjod): rgyasaH/ de dag dbugs rnams dang mnyam du// ma la ya yi rlung drag 'brib// khu byug sgrogs pa'i skal bzang dang // nags kyi rlung ni dri bzang dang // dpyid nyin skye bo'i kun dga' dang // lhan cig dag tu 'i phrel bar
123b5(mngon brjod): 'gyur// de ltar lhan cig brjod pa yi// dper brjod 'ga' zhig 'dir byas te// yongs su rjes pa'i rang bzhin yang // nges par bstan pa cung zad bya// so spyod rnams la mtshon basbyin pa// ster byed khyod kyi lag
123b6(mngon brjod): pa yis/ de dag grags pa ku mud dkar// yun ring dag tu bsgrubs pa phrogs// mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po la// smon pa shis pa zhes bya dper// dag yid spyod yul ma yi na pa'i// snong po da ma pas
124a1(mngon brjod): khyed la bsrungs// rjes 'gro med dang the tshom can// dag ni dpe rnams nyid la bstan// dpe yi gzugs can dag kyang ni// gzugs can rnams la nges par sgrags// rab rtog cha shas 'di yang ni//
124a2(mngon brjod): rab rtog dag gi dbye ba nyid// tha dad rgyan rnams bsres pa ni// spel ma dag tu brjod pa ste// yan lag yan lag can dngos kyi// skabs dang thams cad stobs mtshungs nyid// ces pa'i lugs gnyis spel ma yi// rgyan
124a3(mngon brjod): dag la ni mtshon par bya// mdzes ma khyod kyi bzhin gyi dpal// pad+ma dag gis 'gog par byed// mdzod dang yu ba pun tshegs pa// 'di la bya dka' ci zhig yod// rang bzhin brjod dang 'khyog ces brjod ces// dgra
124a4(mngon brjod): gi rang bzhin tha dad gau nyis// 'khyog por brjod pa thams cud la// phal cher sbyar bas dngol rgyal byed// snyan dngags mkhan bsam dgongs pa ste// snyan dadags grub par gang gnas pa// rgyun gyi yul yod yon
124a5(mngon brjod): tan can// de ni dgongs pa can zhes brjod// dngos po yi ni tshogs rnams kun// phan tshun phan par byed pa nyid// don dang bral ba'i khyad par rnams// ma byas gnas su bsngags pa dang // bri rjod ri ma stobs
124a6(mngon brjod): las dngos po rnams// zab mo dag kyang gsal ba ste// de kun dgongs pa'i dbang gyur phyir// de dag dgongs pa can zhes rig/ gang yang mtshams spror yan lag dang // 'jug pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid
124b1(mngon brjod): sogs// lung gzhan dag tu brjod 'di yang // rgyun nyid du ni bdag cag 'do nga// rgya che mtha' yas rab bsdus tshad du gyur pa yi// rgyan rnams ngag gi lam 'di nyid ni rnam par bya// rjod pa'i yul las 'angs
124b2(mngon brjod): par yongs su gnas pa sa/ khyad par rnams ni goms pa nyid kyi dbye bar nus// snyan dngags kyi me long las don gyi rgyan gyi yongs su bcad pa ste gnyis pa'o// // bar mchod dang bar chong bdag/
124b3(mngon brjod): yi ge tshogs pa bskor ba ni// zung ldan de yang rkang pa yi// dang po bar mtha' spyod yul can// gcig gnyis gsum bzhi rkang pa yi// zung ldan rnams kyi rnam rtog ni// thog ma byar mtha' bar dang mtha'// bar dang
124b4(mngon brjod): thog ma thog mtha' kun// yang dag dbye ba las skyes pa// de rnams dbye ba shin du mang // de la bya sla bya dka' yang // 'ga' zhig dag ni bstan par bya// grogs mo mdza' be'i skye bro la// khengs pa 'di dang 'grogs
124b5(mngon brjod): ma byed/ bslus pa'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa'i// de nyid ngo tshwa ldan par gyis// dad pa rnams kyi dregs 'joms pa// sprin gyi sgra yis myos byed ni// dga' mra dang bcas bud med kyi// khengs bral yid la 'jug
124b6(mngon brjod): par byed // chu gter zhi yi ska rags can// sa yi lag dpya 'dzin la mkhas// khyod nyid thob nas de lta ni// skye dgu rgyal po ba zang ldan gyur// rkang thang shing rta glang po dang // rta dang bral ba khyod kyi dgra/ 'ga'
125a1(mngon brjod): zhig na gas dang gzhan dag ni// lha rnams dag ga gnas su song // chu skyes gdong ldan mig gnyis kyi// rnam 'phrul yid 'od 'di la ni// dpyid kyi bung ba'i rnam 'phrul gyi// co 'dri byed pa ci yin
125a2(mngon brjod): smos/ 'dod pa g.yul du dpa' ba yi// glang po'ang gzung dka' rta med kyis// gang phyir bdag cag mthar byas sde// de phyir khyod kyi rnam gnon tshar// g.yul du rno bas mdzes pa yi// mi bdag khyod 'dras nor 'dzin ni//
125a3(mngon brjod): rgyal bar gyur te nor rgyun gyis// tshim pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// sa hA kA ra'i me tog gsar// bdag nyid yid mchog tu sred ldan byed// khu byug myos pa dag gi sgra/ yid du 'ong ba 'dis kyang ngo // khyod la dmigs
125a4(mngon brjod): pa'i ra ba dag/ ma br-i la 'di la de 'dra yi// gnas skabs lus ni 'jig byed pas// bud med 'dzeg nus ji ltar min// yal 'drib gu ser pos mdzes pa yi// ljon pas drangs pa'i gzhon nu rnams// pad+mar mngon phyogs
125a5(mngon brjod): bung ba yI// mig nas bzung ste 'gugs par byed// myosra pa'i bzhad ni ra bo 'jug pa// rdzing gi chu la dkar ba yi// dang mo 'di yi tsa tse yis// bdag ni mthar byed zas su byed// dri phya la zla ba'i cha dag dang // lhan cig ma
125a6(mngon brjod): la ya yi rlung // bdag dga'i mi byed 'dod po ni/ mi zad dug gi rjes su 'gro/ bdag bstan mi 'dod khengs pa can// do shal dang ldan 'phrog byed ma// lus mod khyod kyi dong ba nyid// bdag 'gro bde bas phra mor
125b1(mngon brjod): mdzod// khyod kyi gdong gis bdag las rgyal// chu yi rgyan gyur bung ba can// 'dab ldan pad+ma gtam med las// ji ltar mi rgyal bdag dga' ma// nyi ma'i 'od kyis dmar gyur pa'i// chu lha mo bzhin pA Ta la//
125b2(mngon brjod): dmar ba'i gos can dri bzang gnas// bdag gi dga' mra dga' bar byas// de ltar rkang pa'i tho ga ma yI// zung ldan rnam rtog par chad med// da ni bar du chod pa de'i// rnam rtog 'ga' yang bsten par bya// se hA kA ra
125b3(mngon brjod): las 'khrungs nyid// yid 'ong dri bzang ldan pa yi// dpyid kyi a na'i mig can gyis// khengs pa sgra yi lhag mar byed// dga' ma'i lag pa shin tu dmar// rgyud mangs la bsnan rnam 'phrul dang // phrag dog
125b4(mngon brjod): ldan par dgra blo lnga'ang // rna ba'i ut+palA gyis bsnun byed// rlung gis glar bsgyur sprin gyi phreng // mtha' dag chu ni rnam par 'thor// de rjes 'jug mu rab bslang ba tI'i// 'jug sgro rje ldan ma gar dag byed// 'dod ldan
125b5(mngon brjod): me dag khyod kyi yid// khengs rtsod rang nyid nyams gyur to// nI pa'i ka li ka ma thong nas// gnas skabs tsi la reg 'gyur rAmA// rtse dga'i ri la zla shel gyi// thang 'di la ni reb 'dzagasA nas// mdongs mthe'
125b6(mngon brjod): sgeg cing rab mdzes pa'i// gtsug phud can 'di gar byed do// gang zhig sbrul mchog steng gnas shing // phag pas phyung ba'i sa 'di ni// rgyal po'i tshogs las rab blangs nas// da lta khyod kyi lag pas bzung //
126a1(mngon brjod): g.yul du dgra yi glang po rnams// khyod kyi lag pa mthar byed kyis// bsnun pas khrag ni rab zags pa// thun mtshams dag gi sprin bzhin snang // rlung gis re yi shing phreng bzhin// gzhan gyi
126a2(mngon brjod): sngon dpa' bos bcom// mtha' ni gu shed song ba bzhin// rdul gyis na mkha' khyab par gyur// lag sa ldan chu 'dzin gsar par 'od// lha mrin dag gi rigasde nyams byed// myos ldan glang po mchog btsem pa// khyo
126a3(mngon brjod): des khyad rtag tu srungs// khyed kyi mgo skra bung ba 'dra// gdodu ni pad+mar phrag dag byed// dpal gyis bzhin du ra'i myes la// khyed kyi su zhig rtsi mi byed// rgya che rin chen rgyan dang ldan// myos pas mig 'khor dza g+ha na/
126a4(mngon brjod): chung ba min pas mdza' bo ni// dga' ba ldan pa bye bar bzod // gzhan gso so rnams kyis bsgrags pa dang // khyed kyi ba rjed pa'i sgra dang ni// lho yi phyogs kyi rlung gis kyang // ba gro yid phrogs so pho nya ma// rked
126a5(mngon brjod): pa pra zhing rdul zags pas// gdong gi zla ba rab mdzes pa'i// bud med chang gis ngo tsha bcom// skyes pa'i lus la 'dzeg par byed// de ltar bar chod zung ldan gyi// rab tu dbye ba 'di yang bstan// bar rjod mchod
126a6(mngon brjod): bdag nyid kyi// rnam rtog kyang yod 'di lnga ste// kA li ka 'phyang yal gcan// sA la blta bar ngos mi nus// ba ku lar cha gos bung ba dang // grogs mes pad+ma can yang min// sprin nag chen po ldan pa'i dus//
126b1(mngon brjod): snang dang rgyu skur kun mi mtshon// gsang mthor dga' ba sgrog byed pa// dus 'dra blta b.rA su yis nus// thun gsum dbang gyur ring ba yi// mtshan mo yis ni bdag 'chir 'gro/ gang lnga bdag po srog gzir
126b2(mngon brjod): 'gro/ ni tho snyed bdag gis bcom// zhes rkang drang po zung ljon ni// nem dag lpags ni 'di 'dra ste// 'di ltar kho na rdung ldan gyi// rnam rnyog gzhan pa rnams kyang ngo // spros pas 'jigs phyir dbye ba ni// mtha
126b3(mngon brjod): drag brjod par mi 'dod de// de la bya dkar mngon 'dod nyid// 'ga' zhig yang ni bsten par bya// brten rgyas dbang po rab bsnams pa// khyod ni sdom brtson phyir mi nyams// sgyu med gyur kyang khyod kyi bde// 'jig par
126b4(mngon brjod): mi 'gyur de snyed slad// rgyal po mAdu na su ra sa yi lha rnams drug gi zhal// chang gis maM bco mo nor gyi mdzes pas rab bstod pa'i// khyod kyi yon tan rab gsal chags bdag skye dag la// phung po nyid gyur lha rnams
126b5(mngon brjod): su ni mi 'gro min// dam pa'i spyod la bag mi dri khyod kyi dga' ma gang // dga' ba'i dga' ston dga' ba'i khyad par gyis myes ma// de yis 'dir ni 'od ldan rgyan rnams bzung por 'os// bdag la mdzes ldan nyid kyi
126b6(mngon brjod): 'bras bu 'ga' yang med// mgon po khyod ltas 'dud pa'i ro ni mi mkhyen te// dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid dag ni nges par 'gal// gang zhig dman pa rnams kyis khyod la mgos 'dud cing // de dag kho na dman pa'i ro des mchog tu rgyu// /
127a1(mngon brjod): rol pa'i 'dzum dkar dag dang 'dzum por smra bra dang // chung ngu'i lta ba drang ni lci bA'i 'gro b+ha dang // rnam+ba prAR+Sha rgyasmra pa'i dza g+ha na dag ston pas des// bsnun pa des na bdag ni 'tsho bas dman par gyur// dpal+la wAn+da mi
127a2(mngon brjod): shong br-irtan ldan gang gis bdag nyid ni// 'chi med lam dang minyam pa'i tshad ldan rlab 'dud pa'i// 'gro ba rgyas byed mAchod ljin chad mod med can ni// mA tshungs mAng khengs ldan+da sAM dz+wal zhes bya thob de la phyag mdzod// bcud la zhugs
127a3(mngon brjod): thang gi sa dga' byed cing // snying por gyur pa'i bcud mang rab tu 'dzin// bzhid kyi rjes mtshungs sgra ldan 'og byog can// des ni bcud len snying po min par rig/ bArtan rgyus tshul dang tshul man po rtag po 'di yis ni// tshul med
127a4(mngon brjod): dge ba thob la long rnams rnam par thul// bzhon pas mi 'gro rgyal ba'i theg 'gro dag gis gang // tshul ma thob de thob pa dag la brtan pa skyed// mtshungs med lci ba'i mtshon ldan g.yul du sa skyes ni// rgyal mtshan la gnas
127a5(mngon brjod): dpa' bo bya yi sgra yis bros// nyi ma bzhin du drag po'i 'phrog byed 'di mdun du// 'jigs rung g.yul la dgra ni lug dang mtshungs par rig/ mtshan mo ched med thun ldan dpal med tshad meng+ge cing // mtha' ni bgrod
127a6(mngon brjod): bya min pas zang na de la brten ma// cha yi rang bzhin nad can 'bral ba'i nad kyis gzir// skal ldan ma 'di snying rje'i rang bzhin 'brel med mdzod// blo lang la med khyod kyi mnyam nyid bzlog pa nyid// ma yin bla med
127b1(mngon brjod): rjes su mi mthun rjes su 'gro ma yin// gdung med khyod kyis thob pa mchog gi rjes su mthun pa nyid// dgu/ med 'dod med rnams kyi bzhed pa drug las rgyal// dus kyi dus kyi mgrin nag de nag nag po nyid dag 'dzin//
127b2(mngon brjod): snyan sgrog drug gi sgeg byung bung tshogs sprin nag dus ltar nag/ dus kyis gzung min dus cha'i gtso bo chu 'dzin gyis mdzes su// dku bas 'tsho ba'i bud med lan bu'i phreng bas mgo nag bsten// rkang pa gnyis
127b3(mngon brjod): kyi mtha' thog ni// rab sbyor zung ldan gnas skabs 'di// brjod pa'i khongs su 'dus mod kyang // rang dbang nyid kyis 'dir bshad do// myos pas chags pa nye bar gnas kyang bud med des// bdag nyid ma sbyar
127b4(mngon brjod): bdag gi sdig pas khro bo yi// ro dang sbyar te lus med dag gis gdungs gyur kyang // bdag ni 'di snyed gdung ba'i slad du ma bsdad do// phyed bzlas yang dag sbyar ba yin// 'di la dbye ba gsum du 'dong // rkang pa
127b5(mngon brjod): bzlas pa 'de du ma yI// bdag nyid de dag dpes gsal bya// skyes bu brtan glang spang bya ste// khengs pa rab spangs snying stobs can// khyed kyi mchog tu 'bad pa yi// yid brtan bya'o slong brtso na ma// khyod kyi bgrod
127b6(mngon brjod): pa khyab bdag gzi byin gyis// yang yang rab sbyar mdzes pa med po yi// mi rnams tshul dang nga rgyal nyams byas na sa// ma bcom zhid kye ma byas zos rnam par zhig/ sgra yis sprin bgrong dbyar skyes rma bya yi//
128a1(mngon brjod): tshogs rnams mdzes pa nyid du nye bar gyur// rlung gi tshogs sdug bral bA chur sgrogs kyi// tshogs kyi sgra dngos bral ba nyid du gyur// 'tsho ba'i dbang phyug dud pa'i brang la kho mo ni// dman zhing
128a2(mngon brjod): khengs pa nges par bsgrubs pa'i dbang gyur ma// brtse ba'i spangs pa'i bdag nyid yid kyi 'o ma 'dzin// gnyis po nye bar gtad nas kun du ma 'khyud do// lha rnams 'dun pa stobs med khyab bdag gnas par na// khyod kyi
128a3(mngon brjod): yon tan pad+ma rtsa dri ma med pas 'dzegs// dwe n+ya grong bzang rnams kyi phun sum tshogs// brgyan pa'i bud med dag dang rnam par rtse zhing spyod// snyan ma lus skyed du de dang nu gnyis sam// khyod las gzhan pa su zhig ma
128a4(mngon brjod): bcom de yi phyir// 'byung po lus ldan skyon las grol ba khyod la sogs// ba grang ba la ni ming mang nye bar 'gro ma yin// khyod kyi dmag dpung khyab 'jug lta bu go bregros pa// mtshon rnon ldan pa dpa' bo drag gis phyogs
128a5(mngon brjod): rnams su// glags pa dang ni rdul dag rgyas byed g.yul gyis ni// dgra rigs lus bral gzi med rgyags la nyams par byed// dran ljin bdag las phan pa'i tshig gcig mnyan par mdzod// khyod kyi lag pa drapal
128a6(mngon brjod): dang lhan cig lag 'gro yi sa// sa yi dkyil 'khor rnam 'dzin de phyir sa gzhi 'dzin// rang lag rig nas rgyags pa rgyas par yongs ma byed// 'dod pa'i me gang khengs pas rab bsgrubs pa// skad cig/
128b1(mngon brjod): dang mnyam rgyas des pad+ma'i mig/ ro med khyod kyi bde ba de dag ni// kun nas nyams pa nyid du cis mi byed// ma dus khyod ni 'jig rten bdag gyur tshe// mthu yis mthu ldan rin chen mang 'dud byed// de phyir sar
128b2(mngon brjod): pA'i btung ldan mchod sbyin ni// nges pa nyid du chad par ma gyur to// dpung gi glang po rnams ni gzhan dang gzhan// stobs ldan sgra sgrogs rab tu brgyud pa yis// thang las rdul bsgrubs na mkha' 'gog byed
128b3(mngon brjod): cing / g.yul gyi stobs bzlog mchog tu gzhan la rgyu ga/ khyod lnga mnyam par ma gzhag srid par ni// rnam gnyis mi mnyam phan pa mod kyi tshig/ ldog par gyur pi sgrub byed mi mnyam pa// sbrul bgrod
128b4(mngon brjod): mtshungasA la mi drang ngo tsha med// dgra yi mdzes nyam swa rgyal po'i sde yis btud// u mes phan zhing dpal med mAn zla can// sde ldan mi btud rdul gyi min+da rje'o// skyes mchog mchod thob gyur pri go
128b5(mngon brjod): bgos mi mdzes min// de ltar rkang pa lhan cig dang // gnyis dang gsum yang bzlas pa bstan// tshigs bcad gnyis ni don ldan pa// tshigs bcad bzlas pa yin te da par// zlum zhing rgyas pa'i dpung
128b6(mngon brjod): pa can/ grogs min rab tu 'joms byed pa// rnam 'dren khyod kyis bsten pa yi// mi mtshungs sa 'di 'jigs pa med// 'dren pa dag dang bral gyur cing // lag pa sreg khang nye gyur pa// rang
129a1(mngon brjod): grogs kyis btang dgra yis ni// mtshungs med sa 'di mngon par bsten// rkang bzhi rnam pa gcig pa gang // zung ldan chen por brjod pa yin// de la'ang bzlas pa mthong ste dri// zung ldan bya
129a2(mngon brjod): ba gzhan yin no// mnyam med dpal med ma ldan mtshungs med ma// khengs ldan ngal ba dag dang ni// khengs pa mnyam ldan tshul min dag/ dor ba'i tshad 'dis 'grogs par mdzod// 'dzin ma 'dzin po'i rnam
129a3(mngon brjod): 'dzin 'dzin ma spyod rnams kyi// lag pa rnam gnon mi dman 'phral la dgra 'joms ma// myur ba dang ldan mchod pa'i khur 'di bsten pa yis// sa gzhi dag ni rim pas bsrung bar bzod pa yin// rkang
129a4(mngon brjod): phyebyed tshigs btsa da spyod yul can// lugs las bzlog pus bskor ba ni// zung ldan+da lugs las bzlog pa'i phyar// lugs las bzlog pa zhes par bshad// gang la 'badra byas phra mo nyid// de ni bdag
129a5(mngon brjod): gos thob mdza' blo// ra 'dod med pa byed med lha// bstod pa thob khyod 'gro gyur cig/ nA da ldan bdag rang gi blo// myos min 'dod pa 'ga' yang med// dul ba 'joms pa'i 'dod pa yi// rang dbang gdung
129a6(mngon brjod): ba dag kyang med// yang 'gro bdud skyong lcags mi dman// gang zhig dbang gyur skye bo 'joms// gang la bdag song yid 'ong brgya'i// dbang gyur nga la byin zhes smras// ston 'di yis ni gzir gyur
129b1(mngon brjod): cing // gtan 'di shes pa de yis ni// nyin mo'i nangad kun ma thob min// mya ngan bral slad khengs mi byed// gal te phyed kyi yi ge rnams// gcig gis bar chod gzugs gcig nyid// de nyid byA dka'i de nyid
129b2(mngon brjod): rig ba lang gcin zhes smra ste dper// chang 'dra'i mig ldan zur mig gi/ mtshon can 'dod pa 'di rgyal te// gal te bdag kyang sdig zad na// 'dod pa la ni thal mo sbyor// gal te tshigs bcang phyang
129b3(mngon brjod): 'khor na// byed du 'khor ba zhes par brjod// gal te kun tu 'khor ba na// kun du bzang po zhes par 'dod// ma dud yid byung khyod dur phyir// sde ni khengs ldan ma min min// 'dzugs las dpag
129b4(mngon brjod): med nad mang mo 'am// bdag cag sdig pa'i rang bzhin no// zla dang lhan cig nad rang min// dga' ma bdud kyi rgyar ma lhung // bya grong bzlog sgo med stibs ldan me// sgras rtsen ma da 'chi slad du'o// dbyangs
129b5(mngon brjod): drang gnas dang yi ge rnams// nges pa gang 'di bya dka' la// bzhi la sogs pa rab bstan 'di// gzhan ni bya sla dag tu 'dod // rig byed rnam thar tshig smras pas// glu dang bgegs 'jigs dga' ba
129b6(mngon brjod): yis/ longs spyod nad dang dga' dang rmongs// dge ba'i yul du sems 'dod gzung // sa las rnam rgyal lugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// brtul zhugs la dga' mchog rtogs ku ru pas// g.yul du
130a1(mngon brjod): rang gi sgra dragra yi rigs rnams ni// che bar bkag cing lci bar 'dur bar byas// dpal gzi ngo tsha grags dang // blo lugs tshig dang dga' dag khyod la 'phel ba gnyis gang // 'di gnyis
130a2(mngon brjod): lha dbang la med// zla dang nang+ga rim cis min gang // dga' ma bdud kyi rgyar ma lhung // bgrod bzlog dgro med dpal med ma// stobs lhun rgyu gnas 'chi slad du'o// 'dren byed kun dga' skyed byed ma// rgyu skar tshogs
130a3(mngon brjod): rnams dag gi gnas// smin med mkha' la lus can ma// lhan cig mag ni sbyin par mdzod// nu sdug khyod gdong lan bu yi// 'khre shi/ nga bung ba lhar skyo zhing // 'dren byed pad+ma'i gzugs brnyan can// zla ltar
130a4(mngon brjod): mdzes paswa su mu bcom// rtag tu sde med kun dga'u mchog/ lus dud dag da 'grogs la rlugs// baitsun mo lus med kyis dgongs te/ 'jigs pa du mas reg par gyur// hA ha mi 'grogs mkha' 'gros
130a5(mngon brjod): mtshan/ ri 'gro dbang 'khyog ldan me chags// 'khyog sgrogs gad+hI'i chur 'jug sdig/ bya rog 'joms pa mtho rIs 'gro/ kye kye sgra sgrog ru ru'i brang // 'joms sdig po ri ri tsher 'gro/ nga can ma 'ong bdag gi
130a6(mngon brjod): canatatabya rog rma bya'i sgra sgyur ci// lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i lha// rig byed la smod 'gog pa pos// lha min dga' byed bcom pa na// sgra yis mtho ris gang bar gyur// mkhas pa lha dang lha min la//
130b1(mngon brjod): 'gro stobs ldan pa byin legs can// rang gi ro ldan gshol 'dzin de// bzhed kyi sgra ldan mtshe ru song // 'di yis bdag cag rnams kyi bzhin// bzhin gyis nges par ma bcom min// bdag srog dman med dang sbyor zhing
130b2(mngon brjod): rje'i skyes mi ni sdig med min// de ltar bya dka'i lem lha yang // rim pa cung zad kun tu bstan// gab tshig rna ngag gi rnam pa yi// lcags kyang rab tu bstan par bya// rtsed mo'i 'dud sngar bzhad gang dang // de shes tshogs
130b3(mngon brjod): su gsang sgra dang // pha rol kun tu rmongs byed la// grub tshig dag ni nyer la kho ldan// tshig mtshams sbyar bAs don sbas pa// kun tu tshogs pa zhes par brjod// gzhan la grags pa'i sgra dag gis// glang du slu bla smra byed
130b4(mngon brjod): nyid// sbyor bu shin tu 'khrungs pa yis// rmongs byed rim pa dral bya ste// gang la don rtogs dka' ba yi// tshig phreng de ni rab bcom yin// phal pa'i don bkod tshig dag gis// spobs pa dag ni mthun pa'i gzugs//
130b5(mngon brjod): mtshan nyi da yod tsam nges tshi gra dang // ldan pa'o tshig na rtsub mo'o// gang du grangs kyi kun rmongs par// byeng pa grangs nyid ces bya ste// gang du dag don rnam pa gzhan// snang ba de ni rab brtags nyid// gang du med
130b6(mngon brjod): la sna tshogs don// brtags ste ming du 'dus pa nyid// tshig ni chos mtshungs la reg pas// don gzhan pa sgribs pa bsgrub pa'o// sgra yis rnam grangs bkod pa yis// bsgrub pa dag ni mthun pa'i sgra// gang
131a1(mngon brjod): zhig dngos su don bstan yang // rmongs byed de ni rmongs zhes bya// gang la sbyor phreng bdag nyid kyi// ming can de ni yongs su 'phrog/ gang du rten ni rab sbas te// brten bu gsal byas gcig bsgrims
131a2(mngon brjod): ba'o/ gang du gnyi ga sbas gyur pa// de ni gnyi ga bsgribs pa yin// gang zhig mtshan nyid sna tshogs 'dres// dA ni yongs su 'dres zhes bya// 'di dag gab tshig bcu drug ste// sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bstan//
131a3(mngon brjod): gab tshig du ni ba gzhan dag kyang // bcu bzhi de dag rnams kyis brjod// dran pa mtshan nyid med gang de// skyon ni yongs bgrod bya min parau// rig nas slar yang bdag cag gis// legs pa kho na brjod par bya// mI
131a4(mngon brjod): yAHgo ro sems kyis ni// shes pa med lA ci slad khro/ gnas min ngu ba 'di yis ni// ci byed kun tu mig dro mar ma// kub+dza bsten pa khyod kyi ni// dga' ba ji ltar 'phel bar 'gyur// 'chi med bud med co 'dri mo// mi mo
131a5(mngon brjod): spyad pas de lta min// yu bar 'o byed pad can gyi// ngang pA tsher ma rtsu bra mo can// bzhin la sgra snyon sgrog byed cing // lus nri 'drer bar byed cing mchus// bu mo khyod kyi rkang mdzes la// rkang gdub rgyas pa sgra snyan sgrog/ mngon
131a6(mngon brjod): sum nyid du gyur pa 'dir// bdag gi srog ni bstan ma yin// gang gi yal 'dab la// me tog dog pa snom pa can// 'khri shing yal 'dab lnga pa ni// skyed mos tshal 'dir bdag gis mthong // chang ma rnams ni chang khang
131b1(mngon brjod): du/ so yi 'od kyis dzi garA 'khyam// da ni myos par gyur te rnams// chang btung rdzing bur bying ba bzhin// sna ldan dbus na grasal byed bzhis// yongs su rnam par brgyan pa yi// grong khyer 'ga' yod gang zhig na// myi bdag
131b2(mngon brjod): mdog brgyad ming can yod// tshig rnams rab tu 'khrulnga pa dang // mgo bo dud cing mig dman pa/ 'dug kyang 'dir ldan bdag la ni// rgan mo rjes su maM brtse'am// migra mi brtan ma sa ldan dga'// dang po rA dza zhes pa sgrogs//
131b3(mngon brjod): sa nA ta na yang ste 'di// rgyal po ma yin khyab 'jug min// rdzas bral mi ni btang byas nas// no ra ldan rnams can bgrod pa gang // sna tshogs thabs brgyas 'jig rten 'gugs// bzug dka' smad 'tshong ma yin no// khyod
131b4(mngon brjod): kyi sri mIn ming mthun gang // rab gyur sgo min can las rgyal// de yi ding bdag ma rnyog tu ni// sred ldan byed do snyan sgrogs ma// 'dod ldan dgra ni mal stan la// khro bas phyir bzlog nyal bar 'gyur// chags las da
131b5(mngon brjod): bzhin nyid nyal te// ngal bu yis ni khe dag sbyar// bya rgyal zas skyes dgra yis ni// bla ma'i 'od kyis bcom skye bo// khwa 'joms grogs min 'dzin pa yis// khyab pa'i mkha' la mngon par dga'// nam yang mtshon
131b6(mngon brjod): dang bud med kyi// nu ma'i dkyil 'khor la ma rig/ mi ma yin pa 'ga' zhig gi/ lag 'di 'bras med yin no lo// su zhig gang dang 'grogs pa yis// bya ba thams cad nye bar ni// thob cing zas kyi dus dag tu// gal
132a1(mngon brjod): te mthong na 'dor bar byed// ha ya ga dza b+ha Ta can// ste 'di gal te ma rgyal na// mU tri ka med dred kyi bu// 'di ni yi ge shes kyang blun// de ni ming du 'dus pa bsres// bslus pa yis ni gzugs dang ldan
132a2(mngon brjod): de bzhin nyid du gzhan gyi yang // 'dres pa'i rim pa shes par bya// don nyams don bral don gcig pa// the tshom can dang rim pa nyams// sgra dri man gcod mtshams nyams pa dang // sdeb sbyor nyams dang mtshams
132a3(mngon brjod): sbyosbyor bral// yul ngas sgyu rtsal 'jig rten dang // lung rigs ngag dang 'gral ba ste// skyon bcu de dag snyan dadwags la// snyan dngags mkhan gyis spang bar bya// dam bca' gtan tshigs dpe nyams pa// skyon
132a4(mngon brjod): no ma ma yin zhes pa 'di// phal cher dpyad pa dka' ba nyid// sbyar bA de yi 'bras bu ci// tshogs pa'i don gyis stong pa gang // de ni don nyams zhes par 'dong // myos pa bsnyon pa byis pa yi// brjod las gzhon la
132a5(mngon brjod): de skyon no// 'di ni rgya mtsho 'thung byed // bdag ni dri ring rgya ba sro gzir// sprin 'di rab tu sgrog pa ste// 'phrog byings srung dag la dga'// 'di sems rnal du mi gnas pa'i// mngon par brjod la smad min ste/
132a6(mngon brjod): gzhan du de lta bu la sogs// snyan dngags mkhan po su zhig sbyor// ngag gcig gam ni rab sbyar la// snga ma phyi ma gzhan 'joms pa// 'gal ba'i don can nyid kyi skyon// don bral zhes par rab tu brjod// dgra
132b1(mngon brjod): rigs mtha' dag 'joms pa dang // sna tshogs khuru 'di rgyal gyur cig/ 'byung po kun la brtse ba can// khyod la dgra ni su yang med// mngon par chags ldan sems la ni// skabs de 'ga' zhig yod pa na// gang la
132b2(mngon brjod): 'gal ba'i don can gyi// tshig kyang ma ngon par 'dod par 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med la sred pa// 'phags pa dag gis gra la rigs// de yi so sgrib ga yo ba dag/ bdag ni nu ma zhig 'thung 'gyur ram// don
132b3(mngon brjod): nyid dam ni sgra la yang // khyad par med pa srur brjod pa// gal te slar yang rab bsgrags pa// de ni don gcig par 'dod dper// sred pa srad byed bu mo rnams// de yI lan bu'i 'od zer can// chu 'dzana? glog dang
132b4(mngon brjod): ldan pa ni// zab mo sgra sgrogs 'di dag go// rjes su brtse sogs khyad par las// gal te 'ga' zhig brjod 'dod na// yang brjod la yang skyon med de// 'di ni rgyan du rigs pa yin// 'dod pa skabs man 'khon
132b5(mngon brjod): pa yis// bud med mchog de bcom par gyur// yan lag kun mdzes bcom par gyur// 'jam par sgrogs ma bcom par gyur// nges pa'i dron du rab sbyar ba'i// tshigs rnams kyis na galpa te na// the tshom skyed
132b6(mngon brjod): par byed na 'di// the tshom can zhes rab tu bsha // re 'dod dga' ba blta ba yi// ro la mig g.yo grogs mo dag/ rgyang na 'dug pa'i ma ma 'dis// 'di 'dra blta bar bzod ma yin// 'di 'dra the tshom slad nyid
133a1(mngon brjod): du/ gal te 'ga' zhig tu sbyar na// 'di ni rgyan nyid du gyur gyi// de la skyon med 'di lta ste// ma smad de ni lus min skyes// 'jigs pas gzir cing nub mo yi// dus nyid kyis ni gzung ba mthong //
133a2(mngon brjod): bdag cag khyod la re ba med// 'dod pas gzir ram che bas gdungs// zhes pa ngas med byed pa'i tshig/ rtse 'dzams skyes bu 'khrug par ni// bya phyir pho nya mos smras so// mdor bstan rjes su mthun par don// gal
133a3(mngon brjod): te rjes bstan ma byas na// rim pa nyams par mngon brjod pa'i// skyon du de ni bshad de dper// 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas pa dang // sbrel dang 'jig rgyu ma skyes pa// bi de 'byung srang myang chu skyes kyi// skye gnas can gyi
133a4(mngon brjod): khyad rnams srungs// 'brel ba ngas pur shes pa'i rgyur// gang yang gol ti 'bad byas na// rim pa 'das kyang skyon meng par+ya// mkhas pa rnams ni smre ste dper// ga nyani gtong bla dang lus gto ngo dang // yul gtong
133a5(mngon brjod): gtang zhes pa gsum po la// dang po tha ma nyon mo ngas ri// bar pa skad cig gdang ba'o// mtshon bya mtshan nyid lom mya mtshon// tshig sbyor mchog mi ni 'dod pa ni// sgra nyams yin te mchog rnams ngag/ 'dod
133a6(mngon brjod): pa nyid ni skyon ma yin// sa gzhi rgya mtsho'i ska rags can// rgyal chen khyod la dpung pas srungs// zhes pa shes 'dod meng pas na// tshig 'di la ni nyams yong min// lho yi ri las nyer btung pa'i// rlung gis
133b1(mngon brjod): tsu ta'i rkang 'thung ni// yal 'drab rol par bskyod pa yi// myu gu mdzes dang ldan par byed// ces sogs bstan bcos bdag nyid che// lta la g.yel ba'i sems ldan pa// sgra nyams bzhin du snang mod kyi// skal
133b2(mngon brjod): bzang nyid ni gtong ma yin// tshigs bcad rnams la nges pa'i gnas// tshig gi gtsod mtshams gcod mtshams rig/ de nyams gcod mtshams nyams pa ste// nyan pa dga' min bskyed pa dper// bud med
133b3(mngon brjod): rnams kyis yang dag brjod pa'i cho ga ro nyams mang la 'dir// mchog rnams dang 'grogs mi dbang nyi ma'i rigs 'di lta byed ces sogs skyon// bya dang bya min ma tshang med la lung nyid kyis ni lta byed cing // ma bdag
133b4(mngon brjod): 'di yi dbang 'gyur sa 'dzin zhes pa de ltar sbyor ba yod// ji ltar tshig mtha' phyis pa la// lhag ma tshig nyid du nges pa// dri bzhin mtshams sbyor rnam 'gyur mtha'// tshig nyid ces ni brjod pa yin// de lta na yang
133b5(mngon brjod): rna bar rtsub// snyanra dadwags mkhan rnams mr-i sbyor te// rgyal po de yi rgyal mtshan tsAn// tog gri chu 'dzin bskul zhus 'di'o// gang du yi ge/ chang lhag dang // lci yang ji lta bzhin mi gnasa?// de ni sngab sbyor nyams
133b6(mngon brjod): pa ste/ skyom 'di shin tu smad pa'i// zla ba'i 'od zer rab bsil bas// rag ces yi ge nyung ba nyid// sa ha ke rI lo 'dab gsar// snyim zhes yi ge lhag pa'o// 'dod pas mnga' rnon ri dgas mig can la//
134a1(mngon brjod): rnam par 'phangs zhes lci ba ji bzhin min// mdzes pa'i mig can dag la myos byed kyi// mnga' rnon lhung zhes yang ba ji bzhin min// bsdus pa brjod par mi 'dod ces// tshig la mtshams skyer med pa gang // yang phyis la
134a2(mngon brjod): sogs rgyu med pa// de ni mtshams sbyor bralA zhes bsnun// mkha' dang bdag gi yid la yong // rlung na ral bu rgyu ba yis// bud med 'gram pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rdul gyi chu rgyas sel bar byed// mtshan mo la de la shes
134a3(mngon brjod): 'di 'dra/ mkhas pas nyams par rig mi byed// ri nags yul 'khor la sogs yul// nyin mtshan dus drug la segs dus// 'dod pa'i nor la brten pa yi// gaR+Sha dang glu sogs skye rtsal te// 'byung po rgyu dang ma
134a4(mngon brjod): rgyu ba'i// 'jug pa 'jig rten ming can no// rigs pa gtan tshigs rig bdag nyid// thos bcas gsungs pa lung nyid do// snyan drangags mkhan po bag med las// de der ji ltar gra gas pa bzhin// mi ni bar
134a5(mngon brjod): gai lI te rab zhugs na// 'di ni yul sogs 'gal zhes brjod// ga pur rkang la reg pa yis// ma la ya rlung dri bzangs can// ka lid+l-i yi nags skyes pa'i// glang po dag ni ri dgas rigs// tsI la kA be ri drogs sa// a
134a6(mngon brjod): ka rA ni nag po sa sngo// zhes pa yul dang 'gal ba yi// tshig gi 'jug pa 'di 'dra ste// pad+ma can ni mtshan mo rgyas// nyin par ku rung ldan pa gsal// dpyid ni nai tsu la rab rgyas// so ka dag ni sprin gyis gtibs// ngang pa'i
134b1(mngon brjod): sgra ni dbyar mnyan 'os// ston ni rma bya myos pa ste// dgun stong nyi ma dri ma med// dgun ni tsan+da nu bsngags par 'os// zhes pa 'di 'dra dus dang ni// 'gal ba'i lugs drug bstan pa yin// sgyu rtsalnga dag dang 'gal ba'i lam// srung
134b2(mngon brjod): zad bston par bya ste dpyang // dpa' bo sgeg pu drag gi dngos// brtan pa khro dang yi mtshan no// dbyings bdun rdzogs pa 'di dag ni// tha dad lam du rab tu 'jug/ 'di ltar spyi rtsal drug cu bzhir// 'gal ba legs par rtogs
134b3(mngon brjod): bar byat+te/ sgyu rtsa l-i yongs su bcad pa li// dre yi rang bzhin gsal bar 'gyur// glang po dag ni rol pa ga yau// rta yi rA ni rno ba yin// e rat+na 'dri snying po lci// seng ldeng ljon pa snying po med// ces pa 'di nI 'jig rten
134b4(mngon brjod): ba// nying rdzi dang 'gal ba kun gyis slang // rigs pa zhes bya gtan tshigs kyi// rigs pa dad 'gal bstan par bya// bde gshegs 'dus byas 'jig parwa ni// gsung ba bden mo de de lta na'ang // tsa kro ra yi mig can de//
134b5(mngon brjod): bdag gi snying la da dung granas// sar skyes gnas la yong pa nyid// rab tu skye brla nye bar brjod// med pa nyid ni bdag tsog gis// rab tu skye bar gang phyir mthong // rigs pa dag dang 'gal bA ya// lugs 'di kun tu blta bar bya// de
134b6(mngon brjod): nas lung dang 'gal ba yi// 'jug pa dag ni bstan par bya// me ni bzhag pa ma yin yang // bu skyes bram ze ma nyams pa'i// spyod pas brgyan pa 'di dag ni// be shwa na ri mchod sbyin byed// de ni cho ga ma byas kyang // bla ma dag las
135a1(mngon brjod): rig byed bklags// rang bzhin dag pa'i shel dag ni// 'du byed gzhan la bltos pa med// 'gal ba mtha' dag 'di la yang // res 'ga' snyan dngags mkhan mkhas pas// skyon gyi grangs las rab
135a2(mngon brjod): bzlas na// yon tan lam ni rnam par 'dzin// rgyal po de I mthu yis nI// de yi sgying tshil lha rnams kyi// ljon pa yal 'dab gos dmar dang // ldan pa dag ni gnas+t+wa~M su gyur// rgyal po 'jigs pa gong la byed pa// ka dam+ba yi
135a3(mngon brjod): rdul dang 'gregs// 'dab bdun las 'khrungs skyong byed cing // drag po yi ni rlung dag rgyu// khyogs kyi rab bskul skrag pa yi// skye bo bud med khas brjod glu/ stobs ma mnye ma pas 'dod ldan gyi// chags pa drag ni 'phel bar
135a4(mngon brjod): byed/ zla ba'i 'od zerA las bsil na// bsreg byo 'dzin par 'dod ldan ni// bud med dang bral nyon mongs kyi// 'khrug/ sa pa 'di yis rtsi bar bye de// gzhan bya yin yang gzhal bya min// chu ldan yin yang cha ldan
135a5(mngon brjod): min// gcig nyid yin yang gcig nyid mino// sna tshogs gzugs khyod la phyag 'tshal// skya bseng bu lnga dag gi na// chung ma lnga len+da bu mo ste// dgu pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// 'odi 'dra lha yi sgrub byed ngo // sgra don
135a6(mngon brjod): rgyan gyis bkra ba dang // bya sla bya dka' dag dang lam// snyan dngags dag gi yon tan skyon// de ltar mdor bsdus rab tu bstan// sgrub byad bsten pa'i lam 'dis skyon dang yon+tan dag/ rab tu rtogs pa'i blo can skal bzang dbang gyur pa'i// tshig
135b1(mngon brjod): rlung mngon par 'grogs bsku chung myig ma drug dang // lang mo can bzhin dga' dang grags pa thob par gyur// // snyun dngags kyi me long lhas byA ng+ga/ rnam par bcad pa ste gsum pa'o// // snyun dngags kyi me lo//
135b2(mngon brjod): slob dpon dbyug pa can gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // dul du byung ba'i yon tan dpag tu med pas spras pa// bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che ba dang // dpon tshanI shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis// rgya gar gyi
135b3(mngon brjod): mkhan po snya nu dngags mkha na chen po shri lar+thi ka ra dang // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba de ge slong shong ston gyis dpal ldan sde skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por legs par bsgyur ba'o// slar yang shong ston de nyid kyi bka' drin gyis legs par
135b4(mngon brjod): sbyar ba la brda sprod pa'i tshul rig pa dbang lo Dits+tsha ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas// slob dpon chen po ret+na shrI yis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par 'gyur btsas su rung ba rnams bsgyur te// zhus chen cung zad g.yar
135b5(mngon brjod): khrol du 'tshal ba'o// /
136a1(mngon brjod): rje rgya chem chen 'byung gnas zhun /

136b2(mngon brjod): rgya gar skad du/ ts+tshan+na rat+na ka ra nA ma/ oM na mo wA g+ni shwa ra ya/ dzi nA yA mu ni sUr+thA ya pA ra mA dz+yo tI r-Idz+nyA naM/ an+ti shi bI mai tra r+d+ha mAn+ta dzin kri t+te nA maH/ ba r+g+haM nituSh+ma dIHbr-id+d+hi dzA ti

136b4(mngon brjod): pra b+h+re ta to dI bi d+h+waM/ ak+ShA rA saM khyaM b+h+raM d+h+waM/ mA trA saM khyA b+ha ba ti dzA tiH/ hra sAHsa ro la g+hum+l-i dzaH/ pa dUn+te Shab h+ma laM gu rag+ha k+ShaH/ pAr+thaHswa ra ra hi ta byany+dzanAts+tsha/ dIr+m+map+sA taM tsib/ b+hU gu ru tI ka miSh+Ta ma?
136b5(mngon brjod): nam gnyis dbye/ yi ge 'grang ba brid+d+ha yin/ phyi ma bgrang ba rde tir 'gyur/ dbyings thung ngu ni yang ba dang la ste drong pa'o// rkang po'i mtha rnams su mang po zhig spyi ba dang grwa dang 'khyog pa'o// dbyings dang bral ba'i gsal byed las snga ma'o// ring po dang brU nyid sde // gsum gyi thog la lci ba D+ha tu 'dzang
136b6(mngon brjod): dzan+targu ru/ lan+ta gu ru/ ma shaM Sha gu ru/ yA di la g+hu tsa/ ran+tarma g+hu/ tan+ta la g+hA/ na she Sha la g+hu/ ts+tshan+taM si bi duHShaT+Te rA ra b+h+ye kaM ka br-it+te b+hiHbA daMH// gA ya d+h+yany+dzi ga nuny+dzA ba br-i hA tI paM k+tistA thA triny+tsu pa// dza ga tI
136b7(mngon brjod): da ma gyi/ sam bar phyi'o/ me kun sri mchos me ba/ dadams 'di/ tatshe/ dkri yang ni chu sa pa ba tsoche ba'i nangs mi dras byor ram sa rtags par byed // tu tho pa mengs des rtsi pa ti/ sdezhi ma den sngon po
137a1(mngon brjod): shat+kaR+shaSh+Ti d+h+waM ta yaHbr-i thak+ke ba lA a ti pa rAsh+tsa/ shud+d+ha prA bi sa ma b+hUta pa rA tsakr-i tiH/ i tiSha DaSh+Ta ha yAH/ sa ma mar+d+ha sa maM b+hi Sha maM tsi ti tI bi d+haM pra tsak+Sha te br-it+taM/ ta nu ma d+hA di ka mA pa tsi tra kA di bak+ShA di tAt+tha
137a2(mngon brjod): ma shaH// sA na ya ti riSh+TaH/ an+te tsa ra NA nAM/ tad+ba ru ti b+hA ngiH/ glAHwAH/ pa ti pA daM/ tsit+ti nu ma d+hI/ ku mA ri lo li tAM dz+r-i ga/ gr-i tsi t+yeHsaM me h+ye sau hi/ la gau tsi tuMHpra mI N+ya sau// tsi tr-i pe dA yangi b+hU
137a3(mngon brjod): rje rnams cig parjod/ rnams bre na/ b+h+rUM sogs ung+yas de ldan no/ TI ba la 'ang bka/ na // gal te ti yang bu la sbyin na rlos par stu ga ste yang drini 'di masus/ sa ga bzhi pa deg la dpag/ ga lu twe thA ga ga dgra na
137a4(mngon brjod): gai/ mau go tsat+sa bi trun+na lI/ b+h+r-it+ta laM gI mA Ne bi kiM/ r-i na saM yaM di he laM mu khI/ b+hU dza gaM shi shu suM tra maH/ dzI yAM shud+d+ha bi rIr+thaM so dzi gaM/ s+t+r-i yAMd+h+waMHkhaM lu pi Nai biHkhI ti/ srAn+daM yU ra sA ra NI r-i dz+r-i
137a5(mngon brjod): te ma dag pa klog phreng / b+ha ses tam gi bram pa'i shu/ gi pa ter mas nas gang/ ni dog man la / pu so gdag pa'i snying shes par bya/ mA na yA las sgyings la ba bang / ngar dang ga n+ti chos yin/

137b5(mngon brjod): ngan thag rnam pa dang lci bas legs 'o so// nan sa gas/ sa bya ba zlum par 'gyur// na na ra la gnyis bya ba bcang ldan nyid// ra dz+wa ral dang ni skye ba dkar mo 'arjod// dzas ta nga gag rnams ni nyer gan sa 'gyur/ narnapas rje zhing 'khor shA zla 'i la/ dz+ha tang 'di ro rigrAs
